"N-now Peachy," She stammers, flailing her rear hooves to escape, "L-let's not do anything hasty!"

You don't respond. There is no mercy left for her, and even if there was, you honestly don't think you could stop the momentum now. Pinkamena is engulfed up to her thighs now, her face wincing from the pain of your enormous bulk.

"P-Peachy, please, don't do thi- MMPH!" Her sentence is again cut short when you roll over her chest, multiple tons of flab forcing the air out of her. Her face turns from pink to blue, before finally disappearing beneath the vast horizon of your own belly.

Beneath you, you can just barely feel her moving for a few moments, hardly a tickle on your bulk, before falling limp. The bitch is dead. Ding dong! You try and smile, only to realize there's still a hose taped in your mouth. And you're still a gigantic blob. What next? Sit and wait until your body digests all this fat?

Before that can happen, the door to the basement opens, revealing
11231111221.title: If you use every once of strength, you could cr...

choices: Try to get Pinkamena to help you.
Roll a little more and crush Pinkamena for good!
11231111222.content:
Pinkamena giggles at your despair and trots back to the milking machines with a bounce in her step. You shift your focus back to your belly. You were completely full already! You would have trouble fitting another single pastry down, let alone a colossal tank of pure lard! You start to think about what would happen if she just kept on pumping... would you explode?

"Alright, my little pig! Ready for meal-time?" Pinkamena shouted from the other end of the room. Even if you could have said 'no', you doubt she would have listened.

She pushes a lever up on the milking machine, and it starts up with a low whine. For a few moments, nothing happens. You almost relax.

Then, you feel a torrent of goop erupt from the end of the pipe, already bypassing all of the muscles in your throat by travelling down the thick tube. You realize this is why Pinkamena had shoved it down so far; so that you wouldn't be able to resist the filling.

You already feel crammed-full, but somehow more lard keeps flowing in, and you shift uncomfortably on the cushions. Pinkamena trots up to you, licking your flabby love-handles and kneading your growing fat with a crazed smile.

"Good little pig... eat all your slop..." she purrs.

Your belly grows bigger and bigger by the second, and you feel yourself growing heavier and heavier. A few moments later, your belly has grown so large that you roll over to your side to let it grow further. Pinkamena jumps on you and starts rolling about on top of you, nuzzling every little fold of flab she can find, hissing and moaning in delirious pleasure. You're shocked at how much lard you can take, and you still fit more in, even though now you really feel as though you might burst at any moment.

Pinkamena squeals in delight as she hugs into your rapidly-expanding belly, nuzzling into its warm fuzziness. You're staring to reach your absolute limit, and you look back at your body. It's now simply a mass of pony fat, spilling out over all of the pillows shapelessly. Your flanks have turned to balls of blubber, jiggling and rippling with the slightest jostle. Your back is now just a series of huge love-handles, stretching on to the enormous mountain of fat that is your belly. Your neck is gone, hidden inside the flaps of fat spilling up from your withers and shoulders, and buried underneath your multiple chins. Your hooves have been enveloped in body-fat, now completely invisible, the only indication of their existence being the ripples of jiggling fat that travel from them with every twitch. Your belly feels fit to burst with creamy fat, and it is uncomfortable, but you also find yourself incredibly turned-on.

You look back to Pinkamena to see that she has buried herself under your titanic belly, and you can hear the telltale, wet 'schlick'-ing of her self-satisfaction. You blush in alarm and feel your own wetness begin to build up in a place you can't even hope to reach...
11231111222.title: Give up. Become Pinkamena's little pig.

choices: Get back there and satisfy her pig!
Fill herself up with some lard!
112311112221.content:
You moan as loud as you can with the pipe stuck down your throat, and Pinkamena looks up from your rolls of fat. Looking at her, you can see she's changing back to the Pinkie you know, hair turning poofy and cotton-candy-like again and her colors returning to their bright, normal strength. She squirms across your belly, creating ripples across your flab, and nuzzles around where your neck should be, lovingly.

"Is it getting uncomfortable? I'm sorry, I don't know what got over me..." she apologizes, rolling off you and trotting back to the machine. She lowers the lever, stopping the flow of lard. You immediately feel more relaxed and you mentally exhale deeply. Pinkie bounces back and carefully peels the tape off from around you, the tape hurting a little as it pulls at your fur. She then pulls the pipe out, and it comes easily, already lubricated by excess lard and your sticky saliva. Somehow, you don't gag as the huge length is drawn out of you, and our eyes go wide at how long the pipe was. If that was how long you could now deep-throat, you could take any stallion!

"Can you ever forgive me for doing all that horrible stuff?" Pinkie asks you sadly.

You crane your neck forwards and nuzzle her neck. "Of course. I actually... really like this..." you admit.

Pinkie looks up at you and beams. "Really? Y-You do?"

You nod, the flaps of fat around your neck jiggling against each other.

Pinkie jumps onto you, cuddling all the fat she can wrap her hooves around. "I want you," she growls into your fur, but this growl is a cute, loving, lusty growl. You giggle in response.

Now, what do you want Pinkie to do?
112311112221.title: Try to get Pinkamena to help you.

choices: ...Drink up their milk!"
...Gobble them up!"
1123112.content:
You can even figure out why you're still hesitating, you're practically starving! You snatch up the eclair in one hoof and cram it in your piehole, splattering cream all over your belly. You don't have a moment to clean it off though, because Pinkie Pie gives that rope another tug and sends more confections your way. This time it's a whole mess of donut holes! You scoop up and armful and pile them into your gaping maw.

"Mmm, jelly-filled!" You say, while chewing nosily on the puffballs. You grab the last few out of your feeding bowl and shovel them into your mouth, spilling half-chewed wads of jelly and dough out onto your gut as you do. You're slowly becoming absolutely filthy, but you're too busy with your sugary bliss to ever care. One pudgy hoof sweeps crumbs from your mouth while the other taps your feedbowl. Pinkie receives your message loud and clear. Another tug of the rope sends more sweets your way, this time a strawberry shortcake and a baker's dozen of chocolate chip cookies.

While you munch away Pinkie Pie takes the liberty of swapping out the tank on her milking machine. Incredibly, your swollen crotchboobs were able to fill the entire six-gallon container easily and from the looks of things there's plenty more white gold in those puffy orange mountains. Pinkie can only watch in awe as your mammaries effortlessly fill the next container at an even greater pace. Every squeeze of the pump extracts more milk than either of you thought possible.

"Holy Toledo, Peachy, you sure can make milk!" Pinkie says. She can't resist dipping her hoof into the still-warm milk and sampling it. It's sweeter than choclate milk from all the pastries you've been downing. Definitely a winning formula, with this Sugarcube Corner is gonna be the hit of Ponyville!

You don't share Pinkie's delight, because you've been deprived of sweets for at least three minutes! You feel like you're going to simply shrivel up and die if you have to wait any longer.

"Pinkie! Huff, huff," With all this extra weight you're finding it tough to breath, "I neeed more food! More fooooood!"

You start slapping your hooves against your belly like an oversized toddler and shout about how you're starving to death. Pinkie quickly tugs on the rope and sends another treat down the chute, a blueberry pie. You shove the whole thing in your mouth, chew it, then spit out the pie tin. Now you've got blue sauce on your mouth, further adding to your slobbish looks.

"More! More!"

Pinkie tugs the rope again, sending more sweets, but you down those just as quickly and Pinkie finds herself pulling again, and again. Eventually the rope snaps from her tugging and a cascade of pastries begin to rain down on you. Ever the master of improvisation, you simply pull the metal chute upwards to your mouth and let the pastries funnel in. Oh yes... Now this is more like it! Sweets and candies of every shape and size just pouring into your mouth. You hardly have time to chew and instead just swallow most of it whole. It's impossible to tell flavors apart now. Everything is just chewy and creamy and sweet and doughy and peppermint and chocolate and pumpkin spice and delicious all at once. But eventually even you have to stop, and you knock the chute aside when you've had enough, letting the pastries pile up behind you. You'll just eat them later.

You're more blob than pony now, just an enormous dollop of orange, buttery fat sitting on a throne of pillows and drenched in spittle and sugar. You've got more chins than hooves and the thought of ever moving again seems impossible. It looks like you're here to stay. Not that you mind of course. This place is perfect. Music, a warm bed, all the pastries you can eat...

Although. Although you would feel better if you weren't so sweaty right now. Probably from all this newly acquired ponyflab, or maybe the milking machine going into overdrive. Either way you're sweating like a pig. And on top of that you're especially parched. You know what would hit the spot right now? A warm glass of mare's milk! And it just so happens that you're making gallons of the stuff! Pinkie's already got at least ten tanks worth so far.

"Uuuurp!" You belch, just to let some of the pressure out of your gut, and then address Pinkie, "Hey, gimme some of that milk!"

"No way Jose! Are you loco in the coco?" She leaps in front of her milkjugs, "We need all this!"

You pout, "But I want it! I want it now!"

Pinkie doesn't budge. Apparently she realizes that you're not going anywhere whether you want to or not. You give a huff of frustration and say,

"Fine! Keep all my super-delicious milk! See if I care. I don't, and you wanna know why? Because you're gonna get me another pony or two! Is that too much to ask? I want you to bring me more ponies! More ponies so I can..."
1123112.title: Pig Out!

choices: Pinkie returns to you with the two fillies
She doesn't quite make it, someone catches her on the way over!
11231121.content:
Pinkie is shocked by your proposal, "But, but Peachy! You're here to make us milk. We can't risk getting another pony down here. Not everypony likes being milked like you, you know?"

"But I need it, Pinkie, I need milk! A whole pony worth of milk!" You jiggle your enormous girth and shake the room with your crying. Pinkie has to run to each of her tanks of milky goodness to keep them from falling over. She's so flustered she might even agree to your demands.

"Peachy, stop! You'll knock over the milk!"

"I want milk, I want it I want it I want it noooooow!" You pound your tub gut like a pudgy drum and kick and shout. You look like a schoolfoal throwing a temper tantrum. A two-ton, orange blobby brat of a schoofoal, but a schoolfoal nonetheless. All your shaking stirs up your gut, sending a burbling bubble of intestinal byproducts up out of your stomach and up to your throat. You purse your lips and part them just slightly for a loud, fudgy burp that sends the memories of your earlier meals over your tongue.

Pinkie clearly doesn't enjoy the scent as much as you do. Her nose crinkles and she has to cover it with one hoof to keep from retching, "Oh yikes! Peachy-weachy that is a smell! Look, I'll go right now and get you some milk, okay? Just stay put and don't make too much noise. We're really deep down here but somepony still might hear you. After the whole mishap with those two we have to keep this operation a secret. Okie dokie Lokie?"

You're too busy shoveling snacks into your piehole to hear her, but you nod your head and return to stuffing some snicker doodles into your mouth. Your tongue is so terribly dry, you'd drink your own mucus if Pinkie wasn't going to get you some milk right now. While gulping down the last peanut butter cookie in your short reach you spot Pinkie ascending a ladder on one end of the room. You hope she returns soon, you're dying here!

...


Far off in the Everfree Forest there is no maniacal munching or hungry slurping. The woods are peaceful, aside from the gentle chirping of birds and insects. The only thing that would sound out of place is a slight mechanical humming coming from the hut of Zecora, the enchantress. She paid the noise no mind, though. The zebra was far too concerned with her latest potion brewing over her fireplace.

"Cream of wheat and bumblebee wings, sparrow's feet and scorpion stings," Zecora hums as she prepares the potion, "Toadstool scrapings and a flower azure, and the milk of two fillies, in love but pure."

She stops stirring when she hears a knock on the door. Placing her wooden spoon aside Zecora makes for the door. The humming is still going full force, but she doesn't seem to care.

"Who could be at my door while I prepare this drink of allure?" The door swings open, revealing the precocious pinky pony herself. "Why, if it isn't Pinkie pie? What is your cause for this pleasant coming-by?"

"Hits Zec, I gotta talk to you. Remember those two sourpusses I dropped by here last week?"

The zebra seems quite pleased, "Ah yes, the two spoiled teens, I put them in the back to harvest their cream."

"You have milk?" A wave of relief washes over Pinkie, "Goodie! We need some. Actually, we need a lot. Y'see we got this new girl and she's making a whole lotta the cream, but she wants milk too. And I figured the best place to get come would be here."

"Hmm," Zecora taps her chin a bit as she thinks, "If it's filly milk you lack, then you may the both of them back!"

"Really? Wow Zecora, that'd be super! I mean, I don't wanna take your milk-makers away if you still need 'em."

"Not at all, the milk I have will suffice, I've milked eight gallons and I can keep it on ice. Their milk sacs produce plenty with a bit of magic, and to separate them again would be tragic."

Zecora guides Pinkie towards the end of the hut, where a little doorway partitioned by a bead curtain stands. She pulls it aside to give pinkie a good look at what she was keeping back there. Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon are bound to the floor. Their legs are spread by bars and they each wear a thick iron collar. The humming that permeates the air is coming from the milking machine that has been milking them raw for weeks. Underneath the mechanical whirring there is a light sobbing. Diamond Tiara seems to have fallen asleep, but her friend, no her beloved Silver Spoon is laying on top of her and crying softly.

"Oh, they're not looking so good," Pinkie remarks.

"I would say not, it took much time, I needed to beat them to keep them in line." Zecora's voice carries a bit of venom, "A reed against the flank to stop their talking and a chain around their neck to prevent them from walking. But if you wish to take them today, I will fetch the cart and we shall load them up right away."

"Yeah, that'd be good..." Pinkie is starting to feel a little bad about leaving Diamond and Silver alone here, they look skinnier than usual and the bruises are obvious. Pinkie doesn't say much else to Zecora as the zebra uses a reed, most likely the same reed, to prod them and get the two onto a small cart so Pinkie can haul them away. The poor things are silent for the entire ride.
11231121.title: All for a glass of milk

choices: No good! Sour milk! Pinkie needs to get another pony
The milk's delicious, and Silver and Diamond are here to stay
112311211.content:
"Those things are supposed to keep me fed?!" You cry as Pinkie carts in the battered ponies. "I could eat them like snacks!"

"Peachy, I told you! Who else are we supposed to get, silly billy?"

"I need milk, now!" You cry, banging your nearly useless hooves against your mounds of belly fat, causing a miniature earthquake. Pinkie rushes up to hush you, promising you she'll get them into shape soon enough. That's when Silver Spoon moans and wakes up. She tries to pull herself upright, but can't seem to manage. Her eyes widen as she recognizes the place.

"No! Not here! Not again!" she cries. You roll your eyes at her. What she's getting worked up about? After all, getting ponynapped worked out pretty alright for you.

"Okay girls, I'm sure you're quite hungry for your first feeding!" Pinkie says, though Diamond Tiara is still out of it. You instantly see Silver Spoon's lips tighten, preparing for the battle to come. This wasn't going to work. They'd take forever to fatten up in their current state, especially if they were going to fight it. Then an idea comes into your food-obsessed brain.

"Hey Pinkie. You said that grumpy ponies made sour milk, right?"

"Yep! But what choice do we have, Peachy?"

"Feed 'em some of my milk." You reply. Pinkie turns to you with a quizzical look.

"Peachy, the whole point is-"

"I know, I know." You cut her off. "Look at it like an investment. Feed them some of milk just this once, okay? Trust me."

"Well..." Pinkie roots around in the room, and comes back with a baby bottle. You don't want to consider why it's there. But she takes a tank of your milk and fills up the bottle, then approaches Silver Spoon. You get it now - even with her lips pursed, Silver can't really fight the bottle, which pushes pass thanks to its smooth rubber shape. Pinkie squeezes the bottle and forces milk down Silver's throat, who tries to weakly squirm away. At least for the first few moments. You watch, munching on an odd pastry (it's hard to stay 'full' for more than a minute, even if you're so parched you can barely stand it) as Silver stops squirming and downs the whole bottle.

"Sweet, so sweet.... more...." She whines as Pinkie pulls back the empty bottle. Pinkie stares at her, then turns to the tankards of milk beside her.

"This stuff must be good!" She fills the bottle again, and forces it into Diamond's unconscious mouth. The filly moans in her sleep, suckling readily. You can see Silver eying the bottle hungrily too. Diamond Tiara rouses as she finishes the bottle, a sudden hunger in her eyes.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

After a little more of your milk, Pinkie convinced both girls they'd only get more after finishing their meals. Already addicted to your milk, they couldn't help but comply, and you got to watch as Pinkie forced sweet after sweet down their gullets. It was exciting to watch, nearly as exciting as fattening yourself up. You start to really get horny imagining what effect your milk will have on the rest of town. Speaking of milk

"I don't care anymore, just get me some milk!" you cry. Both fillies are tiny compared to you, but their feeding session rounded them out quite considerably, showing no signs of their former emaciation. Pinkie's busy making sure they have plenty of food within reach of their stubby little arms, and turns to you.

"One second Peachy, coming right up!" she rushes to get the milk machine onto the other girls. You salivate at the thought of finally getting your drink.
112311211.title: Sweet temptation

choices: Yeah, now seems like a good time for a nap.
No! The glut doesn't end til I say it ends! More! MORE!!!
1123112112.content:
Drool drips down your chin as you watch Pinkie attach the freestanding hoses to the fillys’ bloated teats, the sweet scent of their milk filling your nose and only making you more and more eager.

“Come on! What’s taking you so long?” you shout as Pinkie grabs both the hoses and starts to scramble up the cliff of your gut. “My throat’s drier than Saddle…” you manage to choke out before your mouth is filled with the rubber taste of garden hose and you reflexively start sucking at the hose. The two fillies squeaking and moaning as the suction of your mouth milks them harder than any machine could.

“There you go, Peachy, one double order of silly-filly milk straight from the tap, or should I say teat.” Pinkie says, winking at you as milk dribbles out the corners of your mouth.

You can’t respond. This milk, it’s too fucking good to let you speak. All you can do is moan incoherently as milk splashes into your churning gut and your tongue demands more of the sweet white ambrosia.

The fillies moan louder as you take another mighty pull from their teats, the flow of milk bulging the hose and spraying out from the corners of your mouth as you swallow, gulp, and moan with each mouthful of milk.

You barely notice as Pinkie crawls along the wobbling mound of your chins and neck to stop by your face. The pink mare staring down at you as you drink from Diamond and Silver like a mare possessed, before she leans down and starts licking at the dribble of milk leaking from your maw.

“Oh wowza!” Her eyes snap wide as she starts to lick harder and harder, her tongue scraping at your food and milk stained fur. “I know I said those two silly-fillies were super-duper sour before, but this is amazing.”

You moan in response, your belly groaning and grumbling with how full it was as you take one last grand pull at the hoses, before they fall from your mouth. Your stomach gurgling ominously as pressure starts to build.

“Peachy, what’s wrong?” Pinkie stops licking at the side of your face as she sits back on the jiggling cushion of your flab. You can only moan and wheeze, taking short, laboured breaths as the pressure continues to grow.

“Does my little Peachy Piggy not want any more yummy milk?” A pink hoof pats at your belly, jiggling the plush layer of flab which only makes the sensation of fullness stronger. You can feel whatever it is rising back up your throat and you desperately clench your throat muscles in a valiant attempt to keep it down, before, with a final pained wheeze, your mouth flies open.

“BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP”

The stentorian belch sets your flabby body jiggling and wobbling; snacks that had fallen in between the folds of your many chins and flabby neck escaping as they were shaken loose, and Pinkie bounced down the slope of your stomach as if it were some sort of demented bouncy castle.

Panting, you lay there, your bellowing eruption of gas taking the last of your energy with it as you felt your eyelids start to close.
1123112112.title: Sweet little fillies

choices: The Bound and Powerless Trixie
Diamond Tiara & Silver Spoon
11231122.content:
The moment the words are out of your mouth, you brace yourself for the immediate rejection. In the past, you've toyed with the idea of cannibalism, but you never got an opportunity to actually try it out. And really, this was as good of a chance as you were ever going to get! An incredibly strange (but fun) mare with experience in stealing away ponies without anyone noticing? You'd never forgive yourself if you didn't try. Besides, if she's disgusted with you, what's she going to do? Throw you out the door? Hah!

As for the rejection, it doesn't seem to come. Instead, Pinkie seems to be seriously contemplating your proposal. She begins to think aloud, "Hmm, we've only used sweets to make pony milk. But... it's not really pony milk if it's not even made from ponies! Peachy, you're a genius!" If this weren't a dream come true, you'd question her 'logic'. Before you can even express your appreciation, she's on her way out. "I'll be right back with a delicious, meanypants pony!"

------

And so you waited. Granted, nabbing a pony isn't nearly as easy as a trip to the store, but the moment was so close at hoof! This wasn't about filling your belly anymore; you wanted to have an actual equine being sacrificed for your simple craving! To know that another sentient being was snuffed out to satisfy your hunger!

Your hopes are raised for a moment when you hear hoofsteps approaching, only to find that it's not Pinkie Pie. Rather, it was an older married couple that introduced themselves as Mr. and Mrs. Cake. Your thoughts a million miles away, you paid them almost no regard, as the only thing they had to give you was water. While distressingly plain, it relieved your thirst all the same. They also cleaned up your face, with promise of a more complete spongebath later. That was the last thing you bothered to remember about the encounter; eventually they said some form of farewell and went back to the store proper.

------

It had been forever (Okay, a half hour) since Pinkie left, and you were starved! Yes, there was a pile of junk food within reach, but you wanted a relatively cleansed pallet for your very first pony meal. With disappointment, you then feel the milking machine drain your last. Now hungry and bored, you spend the next few minutes idly slapping your belly and watching the resulting ripples until you hear hoofsteps again. Is this it? Could it be?

YES! In walks Pinkie Pie with a large crate labeled 'STREAMERS' on her back. Without hesitating, she throws the crate to the floor, and out sprawls out...
11231122.title: Why 'Pony Milk'? It's not made of ponies... *yet*!

choices: "I bet I could swallow that morsel whole! Bring her over here!"
"Take her to the kitchen. I can't wait to see what you make out of her!"
112311221.content:
As Pinkie prepares an empty tank labeled 'Super Special Pony Milk (Made from Ponies)', you take a good look at the mare she had presented to you. Blue coat, silver mane... you recognize this as the traveling magician Trixie. You wonder for a moment why she doesn't use some of her magic to escape until you notice that there's a broken stub where her horn should be. The most power she can manage now is a few frail sparks. Her legs are bound with what appeared to be ropes made of licorice, leaving her laying helplessly on her back. As she regained her composure, you noticed that if she had a gag, it must have fallen off.

"Ugh, what is the meaning of this!? Trixie returns to Ponyville for her vengeance on Twilight Sparkle, only to be assaulted by a random psychopath!?"

Pinkie laughs at this, "Oh, Trixie, I can't just sit by and watch you ruin Twi's day! So we're making sure you don't make another pony miserable again!"

"Why? Trixie does not even remember yo- DEAR CELESTIA WHAT IS THAT!?"

As much as she tried to point, all Trixie could manage was a mortified stare in your direction. Pinkie happily slipped under Trixie, and was soon carrying the prone unicorn on her back, explaining, "That's my newest-bestest friend Peachy, and you get to be her dinner!" Given your current girth, Trixie immediately believed this, and found herself searching for something to say. To her, however, remaining silent came more naturally than the thought of begging for mercy.

Cheery as ever, Pinkie asked, "Well, Peachy? What do you think?" You answer...
112311221.title: The Bound and Powerless Trixie

choices: "Well, I see one tasty-looking pony right here!"
"You did say you had friends, didn't you?"
1123112211.content:
"Looks great," you chuckle, "She looks like she'll go down niiiice and easy."

Trixie is clearly mortified at the idea, the very thought that she would be disgraced like this, to be tossed into the bile of another pony and digested, that she can't even muster enough strength to struggle in Pinkie's hold. Your little servant passes the bound magician into your hammy hooves and you lick your lips in anticipation.

"Looks like this will be your greatest urp disappearing act yet!" You snort, "One night only, The Great and Powerful Trixie disappears down my esophagus for good!"

The poor, powerless whelp gives you a look like a scolded puppy, but unfortunately for her you were far too hungry for morals. You smacked your big, flabby mouth a few times and then opened your trap impossibly wide. Trixie is treated to an awe-inspiring view of the sticky cavern that was your mouth, overflowing with drool and reeking with the wet stench of digesting dairy. She was so terrified that her mouth hung open as well, although not nearly as wide as yours, as you slowly lifted her up and lowered her, head-first, into your awaiting maw. Her terrified face touched against your tongue and you slowly enclosed her inside the entrance to your belly void.

It was only after your lips were wrapped around her neck did Trixie fully realize the gravity of the situation and come out of her shock. It was, of course, far too late by then though. It was all over for Trixie, she was destined now you become nothing more than your snack and an additive to Pinkie's new brand of milk. You decide to play with her a bit, rolling your tongue up around her head and sticking it in her ear and her mouth, but Trixie certainly didn't like that. She started kicking and flailing about, even trying to get a few screams out to anypony who could hear her. Shame that, between your chubby cheeks and the walls of Pinkie's basment, that there was no way in Equestria that anyone would hear her.

"Ha! hahaha! Look at her kick Peachy!" Pinkie laughed at Trixie's awkward struggles, "Fighter to the end, that Trixie!"

You have to admit, it is pretty cute that the pathetic thing still thinks she can get away. You decide to put an end to that way of thinking with a single slurp that sucks Trixie's body into your mouth all the way to her flank, and a second right after it that fully sucks her down. You slurp up her silver tail like a bit of spaghetti and she tumbles down into your stomach, where she joins the truckload of half-chewed pastries that you had eaten as an appetizer.

Your gut gives a heaving gurgle and finally, for the first time since you met Pinkie, you're full. Not only that, but your belly is kicking and struggling, something that soothes you even more when Pinkie attaches the milking tubes back onto your horseteats. The machine sucks and sucks, but your titties never seem to shrink. The containers fill with milk, and it seems that only your belly is shrinking, as Trixie is magically converted double-time into sweet milk. Well, you think it's double time, but you've been down here so long you're starting to forget about most time. Except feeding time, of course.

When your supply is finally exhausted, Pinkie can't help but taste some of the new milk. It seems to be a light blue in color, and glimmers in the dull light of the basement. She pops the lid off, dips her hoof in, licks it and...

"Wowie Zowie! Peachy, this stuff is Sen-Sational! We gotta get you more ponies so you can make more of this incredible milk!"

You tap your chubby chin with one hoof and smile a malicious smile...
1123112211.title: GULP!

choices: Eat her and send for more help, she looks like a tasty one!
Let's not press our luck, have her get you somepony else.
11231122111.content:

You can’t believe it... She actually has friends who approve of this kind of abuse?! You trot towards Berry as she claps her hooves, allowing her to take the other cup.

“You’re flattering me Octavia,” she says, taking a sip. “You were always the smellier pony... Better than me!”

The grey pony shakes her head. “No, no, I have to admit it. While I could always equal, sometimes even better you in terms of smell, volume is another matter entirely. I mean, creating enough gas to alter the scent of another pony? Quite the feat.”

“Heh, yeah,” Berry says while grinning proudly. You find nothing to smile about in this conversation; The knowledge that this mare is comfortable with you smelling like an incontinent skunk coupled with the disturbing fact of her being able to compete with Berry’s rancid farts sets you on edge.

“Tell me, what is your name?” Octavia asks you. You have to think for a second, wondering if responding with your actual name would offend Berry.

“S-S-Stinky, Ma’am,” you respond quietly. She giggles and smiles at you.

“No, I meant your real name.”

“Oh...Umm... Clementine, Ma’am,” you say while blushing, feeling like an idiot. Octavia turns back towards Berry, placing her cup on the table.

“She’s obedient too,” she says. “You’re lucky to find somepony like this willing to be with you.”

“Actually, she’s not volunteering or being paid,” Berry says, giving you a scowl. “She tried to eat me!”

Octavia glances at you; You can tell she’s intrigued, but her face looks unamused. “Is that so? Come over here,” she says, beckoning you over.

You obey, trotting to stand directly in front of her. She turns around on the couch she sits on, pointing her rear end at you. Before you can react, you see her tail lift up and her pucker expand for a microsecond. The impact is as silent and swift as it is deadly; The few particles of flatulence that enter your nostrils begin to cling and multiply, attacking your sense of smell in the most violent manner possible with the horrendous stench of digested plants and fresh manure. You step back, choking on her tiny dose of gas. Compared to Berry’s, you’d rather take an endless stream of the drunkard’s gas than be subjected to another second of Octavia’s vile fumes.

She turns back, taking the cup on the table and having another sip. “Imagine if you had tried to eat me. Do you think that you could handle those on a daily basis? Luckily, I am incapable of creating such bursts as often as the stinker over there, at least not without some outside assistance, so I have to find more... creative ways of humiliating my servant.”

Berry is busy laughing at your misery. “Good one Octavia! Now she’ll be thankful that she lives with me-”

She suddenly stops, her eyes lighting up. She has that mischievous look on her face again.

“I’ve got an idea! How about...
1131111212111.title: Not exactly silent, but nonetheless deadly...

choices: “...Tavi, you’d better use more of those pills. I want some of that gas!”
“...Berry, do you think you’ve got seconds left for me?”
11311112121111.content:
Octavia gives Berry a sly smile, and you don’t like where this going already.

“I suppose we could test my new toy on your dear Clementine here,” she says, “although I’d need to take my special pills first.”

Berry claps her front hooves together. “Ha! The tank’s empty huh? No worries, our guinea pig will get ready for testing while we both fill ourselves up.” She turns to you. “Stinky! Remove your uniform and head up to the bedroom. You’ll know what to do from there. Put this on as well.”

She tosses you a small red ball with a buckled strap attached to it, which you catch and briefly inspect. Oh god, a ball gag. Now you definitely don’t like where this is going. But all you can do is reply “Yes ma’am” and nod meekly as you obey, trotting up to the bedroom. You wonder what fate has in store for you, but soon you wish you never knew.

As you open the door, your eyes widen as you see a black pony-shaped suit of sorts lying on the bed. As you move closer to inspect it, you gulp as you see that it’s made to cover the entire body from head to flank. What disturbs you more, however, are the two pipes that connect to the face... the nose! Oh god, you know exactly what this is and, more importantly, what it’s for. It’s a ‘Friendship is Fart-tastic ScentSuit DeLuxe (tm, all rights reserved)’, and you’re the unfortunate victim!

This particular model is made for two ponies. They insert the ends of the pipes into the plothole and let rip onto the third pony trapped inside the suit, gassing them with their flatulence! This would be bad enough if it was two ordinary ponies, but with Berry and Octavia...

You have no choice. You resist the urge to break into floods of tears as you strip your reeking maid outfit and place the gag into your mouth, securing the strap (presumably to stop you from breathing through your mouth). You then unzip the back of the suit and climb inside, the rubber stretching as you place your legs into the holes. Once they’re in, you grab the headpiece and pull it over your face, positioning the pipe exits onto your nose. The faint stench of pony gas comes from the holes... has Octavia used this before?

Finally, you pull the rest of the suit around your body. You were too busy worrying to notice, but there are two glass covered eye holes for you to witness your torturers from. They enter the room as you finish squirming about to get comfortable. Something’s not right about them... Berry and Octavia look a lot fatter than before.

Then it hits you. That’s not pony pudge. That’s pure pony farts, primed and ready to be released!

“Aah,” Berry moans, her voice slightly muffled from the rubber, “those pills are great gas makers but they kill my insides!”

“Enjoy them while you can,” Octavia says, patting her belly. You can hear an ominous gurgle coming from her afterwards. “They’re not exactly legal or cheap. We’d better get started before we explode, and then your maid would be left to clean up the mess!”

Without wasting any more time, Octavia takes one of the free ends of the pipe and tells Berry to present her plot. Wincing slightly, you watch as Octavia inserts the thick, phallically shaped plug into Berry’s hole, noticing the blissful look on her face as it makes the tight squeeze. Berry does the same with Octavia, inserting the second pipe into her butt. Both of them look into your eyes once they’re ready, and they smile at you wickedly.

“You know, this could permanently alter her smell for years,” Octavia says as she zips up the back of the suit. The tight confines are beginning to make you sweat, along with the perspirations of terror.

“I know, that’s exactly what I want,” Berry says. She leans closer into your latex-covered ear. “I want her to remember my smell for the rest of her life...”

You’re pretty sure you could have done that without this horrific ritual, but that’s beyond your concern now. All you can do is brace yourself by holding your breath as Berry and Octavia nod. They present their rears to you and squat.

Nothing could have prepared you for the relentless torrent of gas that follows. It came without warning, and it hit you like a two tonne truck smashing into your brain. The farts flow like air being blown through a straw at an impossible speed, and all about you is an echoing, thunderous rumbling as both of the ponies release. The smell is way too intense; Berry’s sweaty, wet and eggy flatus is raping your left nostril, while Octavia’s considerably less violent but even smellier, veggy based gas takes care of the right.

Combined together, it would be as if you were sentenced to spend eternity in an enclosed room of twenty... no, thirty diamond dogs who were only allowed a diet of sprouts, baked beans, onions and cabbage. They would work all day in their mines to build up a major sweat and subject you all night to their gassy, unwashed bodies. They would take turns to rub their asscracks in your face on at a time as you’re tied down, your mouth taped and nose held open as they happily blasted gas on you. Then, they’d drink to their successes in the mines by having a large tankard of milk each, resulting in you suffering through a horrendous torrent of canine farts due to their lactose intolerance (they’re very forgetful creatures too... you’d be suffering this a lot).

Back inside the suit, you screw your eyes shut as they begin to burn from the extreme odor. The latex around you begins to inflate as the farting continues, your body becoming enveloped in the stinking miasma. You can’t help but peek at your tormentors... What?! They’re just chatting to themselves as if this was everyday business! You can’t tell what they’re saying, but you can tell by their casual expressions that this is just idle banter. Their stomachs have also deflated to their normal sizes, the gas almost emptied from their systems.

The worst part, you think, is the aftermath. This is definitely going to make you the smelliest pony in all of Equestria without a doubt. This is, by far, the most humiliating experience of your life. Ever. Worse than the time you were caught clopping by your younger brother. Worse than the time you were tricked into trying on diapers ‘just for fun’ (as your college friends said it would be). It’s even worse than last night when Berry was sitting (and farting) on your face!

Just when you thought that it was never going to end, the stream suddenly dies as you hear both ponies grunting. Oh thank Celestia... it’s over. The stink still clings to your nostrils, like it will for many weeks, and the suit is now filled like a rubber balloon. The eyeholes are fogged up with a green condensation too. All you can hear is somepony say...
11311112121111.title: Double The Dosage

choices: After some time, they release you from the suit.
After hours upon hours of being in the suit your mind snaps!
113111121211111.content:
“...Tavi, you’d better use more of those pills. I want some of that gas!” You can just barely hear Berry's voice through the thick latex suit now filled with pony gas, though her words only served in making you tremble in fear. They had already most certainly altered your scent, their horrendous fart stench would be clinging to your skin like the cheapest perfume for possibly years, yet Berry still wanted to torture you! If you had known she was such a smelly, sadistic bitch you would never have tried to eat her.

"Well, as I said Berry their not cheap..." You faintly hear Octavia mumble in response. Now that their deafening flatulence had ceased your hearing was slightly returning to you, though you cared very little as currently you were struggling with the simple act of breathing. Every breath you took was nothing but pure, foul pony gas. Their farts refused to dispensate and instead hung strongly in the small, cramped insides of your latex prison. You silently curse the sick, twisted bastard that created this horrible instrument of torture. The suit was designed so no air could get in our out; meaning their awful flatulence stayed inside, and the clean, refreshing air that Octavia and Berry were currently enjoying stayed out.

"Aw come on girl! Just a few that's all, I'm not saying we need to use the whole bottle!"

Octavia sighs as she looks at her gassy friend. "Surly that digestive system of yours hasn't failed you, there must be some gas left in that gut of yours!"

"Well..." Berry mumbles as she relaxes her anus, letting a rather ripe fart flow into your restricted breathing space. "I still got a bit left in the tank, but those pills would really make this fun!"

"Fine... I suppose we can take a short break and re-fuel... Besides, this cannibal deserves it..." Through the foggy eye holes you can see Octavia glare at you, she certainly had something against you. This of course would only result in more torture, as these two bitches seemed completely merciless...

The two mares pull the pipes out of their plots, another blissful smile crossing their lips as they did so. After giving you another twisted smile they left the room, leaving you to suffer silently in your smelly prison. You merely sigh against your ball gag and closed your eyes, trying in a vain attempt to enter some sort of unconsciousness. It would have been nice to get some sleep, at least so you wouldn't have to continue smelling their rank farts. However you were the situation you were in was just too uncomfortable, and thanks to the combined attack on your nostrils and the warm, sticky latex around you it was impossible to find rest.

After what felt like an eternity of huffing stale pony farts, Berry Punch and Octavia re-entered the room. Their stomachs were once again pudgy and bloated, and you merely whimper quietly to yourself in response. "I can't believe how quickly these things work, I can already feel a killer one on the way!" She chuckles as they once again get into position.

"Well if there's one thing for certain..." Octavia says as she wiggles her plot against the pipe. "She's going to be smelling like farts for the rest of her life..."

With that horrid statement they both start farting again, filling the already unbearable suit with fresh gas. You can only wonder now how long they're going to keep this up...
113111121211111.title: “...Tavi, you’d better use more of ...

choices: Eat her!
Give her a taste of her own medicine!
1131111212111112.content: You hear an audible -SNAP!- after who-knows-how long, and you scream bloody murder as you thrash about wildly. The latex rips open, and you glance about feverishly, trying to spot somepony, ANYpony to eat. You spot Berry coming in the room, and you lunge at her...
1131111212111112.title: After hours upon hours of being in the suit you...

choices: Octavia is coming!
Something is happening inside you!
11311112121111121.content:
With the speed of a starving cheetah, you half-run, half-leap at Berry Punch as she opens the door. She doesn't have time to scream before your impossibly gaping maw envelops her head. She struggles to escape, screaming obscenities down your throat as you slowly swallow her whole. You taste her bitter, dirty fur as she passes over your tongue. Not exactly high cuisine, but after all that, she's practically a veal cutlet. Her shoulders are a tight fit, and you have to widen your jaws to get past them and her forelegs, followed by her belly.

Berry shrieks as her head enters your stomach. She kicks and fights with a strength borne of desperation, but it's simply not enough to deter you, the hungry and furious predator. Revenge is best served cold, but yours would come at the hands of your hot, burning stomach acid, capable of turning a grown pony into a layer of fat and a load of crap overnight. You moan around her midsection at the thought of turning your tormentor into a pile of steaming shit, sprayed across all the nice furniture in the house.

The anus that caused you so much grief was finally inside you! She let off a single, bitter fart as your jaws passed over her hips, but you don't care. With a final slurp, you force her tail down to your stomach.

"Mrmrgmgt! Grrbmrgt!" Berry shouts, thrashing wildly inside your distended stomach. You take no heed, simply laying a hoof upon your belly and stroking it, savoring the feeling of fullness. You glance around laconically, looking for a place to rest while digesting, and settle on a nice, comfy chair in the corner. You plop down on it with a yawn and begin to doze off, not realizing that...
11311112121111121.title: Eat her!

choices: You start farting uncontrollably
Octavia comes in
113111121211111212.content:
"No... No... No!" Berry shouts, thrashing around inside you, "Please! Not like this! Not like th- *URP*!"

The acid around her begins frothing like a hot tub as the pills she'd just taken begin to kick in. Her intestines feel uncomfortably full as it swells full of gas, slowly growing into a pot belly. She kicks and screams, fart bubbles rising to the surface of the burning liquid before bursting, not exactly comforting the panicking, swelling pony trapped in her own tomb. Her belly looks nine months pregnant... Ten... Twelve... Bigger than she'd ever been, and she just couldn't fart it all out! Her cheeks bloat with gas, infringing on her vision and forcing her mouth shut, causing her swelling to speed up that much more.

Berry moans through swollen cheeks, her belly bloating even further until it touches the side of your stomach. She couldn't even scream as your acid began dissolving her body, starting with the thin, taut skin of her belly.

*BLOOSH*

Berry's tight, gas-filled belly bursts inside you! You're jolted awake as the explosion shakes your entire body, nearly knocking you from your chair. Your belly is twice as big as it was before, preventing you from even getting up as the remains of the bloated pony slowly digest. All that gas has made it so tight... Gingerly, you poke it with a hoof, causing the entire thing to jiggle like a bowl of jello. You can only hope she'll digest soon, and all those pills won't have any lasting effect on your body.

Belching contently, you begin to drift back to sleep when suddenly...
113111121211111212.title: Something is happening inside you!

choices: "Let's crack this one open, shall we?"
"Let's go. We still have plenty of rooms to see."
11311112121112.content:
"Berry, I do believe you read my mind."

Octavia stands and clops her forehooves together(How is she even standing like that? Such poise.) and from some corner of the room you weren't paying attention to, a skittish looking pink filly scoots out. She moves by hurriedly shuffling her hooves, keeping her head level at all times, and quickly makes her way to Octavia's side. She's wearing a maid's outfit, similar to yours, but hers is topped with a lovely pair of rabbit ears.

"Ma'am?" She looks up at Octavia, but her mistress is more focused on you.

"Clementine, this is MY slave. State your name dear."

Without missing a beat, the filly responds, "Diamond Tiara ma'am. Miss Clementine, it's lovely to meet you."

"As you can see, Clementine, she is very well trained. She was to me by her father, who feared that she was becoming a bit of a brat, and I agreed with him. I kept her in my abode, where she learned the finer points of servitude and slept with the help. She has learned quite nicely, and in fact she's earned the privilege to sleep in my bed with me. Perhaps, since you will be a guest in my home, you may have the same chance."

Berry approached from the side, threw her hoof over Tiara's side and laughed, "Y'can sleep with me anytime you want Tiara sweetie!" And she punctuated the thought with a wet fart that she then fanned over to her new captive. "Smell that. You'll be smelling it a lot."

Without flinching, Tiara took a deep sniff. Her eyes watered, but she merely curtsied and said, "It was lovely ma'am. If you have another I would certainly accept it."

"Ha! Perfectly trained, Tavi!" Berry leaned in close to Tiara's face, "You and me are gonna have a ton of fun. In fact, go upstairs and fluff up the sheets. I'll be up in ten."

Tiara shook a little, in a barely visible way, and nodded. She sprinted upstairs, almost whimpering. Once she was gone, Octavia checked the clock on the wall, then spoke to her friend,

"Well Berry, if it's alright with you I'm going to take our little dear to the manor. I've much to show her."

"Of course. Have fun with her," Berry chortled, then addressed you, "especially you, Stinky."

With that horrible thought in your head, Octavia takes your hoof and leads you outside to where a stage coach is waiting. She points to the door, meaning that you are to open it for her, and then the two of you climb inside and are off. All the while, you're terrified that Octavia would unleash a foul discharge inside the cramped coach. That sort of hotbox, given her fumes, would mean sure death. But, she doesn't. The whole trip she sits, staring out the window and contemplating.

Once you reach her manor, she signals you to open the door and the two of you exit to her manor. You wouldn't exactly call it a mansion, but it's certainly a large home on a fair sized property. Aside from the stage coach puller, you seem to be her only help, which adds up considering how modest her manor is. You open the front door for Octavia and she signals you to follow. Instead of heading up the stairs or into the parlor, she brings you downstairs.

"I have something very special to show you, Clementine." she tells you, stepping up to a wooden rack. Oh! Wine racks, she's got a wine cellar down here. She's probably someone who can really enjoy wine, unlike Berry Punch. Octavia continues to talk while you watch her,

"Right here I have some very special bottles. Most are filled with some of the finer brews from Canterlot. This shelf, however."

She takes a corkscrew to the bottle, snaps off the cork and offers it to you. Being well versed in wine etiquette, you lean forward and sniff. And then you nearly white out and spend the next several seconds gagging. The bottle was filled with a horrendous stink, like her- Octavia farted in that wine bottle! What the hell kind of fancy pony is she?

"I've been experimenting in these sort of bottling experiments for some time. Trying different foods, fermenting them for different times. That one was a tried and true brew that always has powerful effects. This, however," she fetches a dusty bottle "is a very... very special vintage. It is my masterpiece fragrance: A powerful biological cocktail that I've spent years creating in my bowels. I've actually never let anyone smell it because I'm afraid the shock of the stink would cause their brain to shut down."

You can't believe what you're hearing. You're contemplating running for you life, getting raped by prison guards HAS to be better than this. You were just about to juke it out of there, when Octavia smiled and said...
11311112121112.title: Trading Bitches

choices: "I believe it's time I show you the dungeon I had custom built!"
The front door can be heard unlocking and opening, interrupting Octavia.
113111121211122.content:
You slowly let out the breath that you had been holding in your lungs out of fear, relief washing over you instantly. Though your dignity, courage, and any hope of ever smelling like a normal pony again are all still at risk, your life is safe for the time being.

"Come with me, pet," she says sternly, tilting her head towards a door and beginning to walk towards it. You follow her mechanically, the threat of her bottled flatus and whatever other "creative punishments" she spoke of still hanging at the forefront of your thoughts. The more you contemplate the fact that you're in the presence of a pony who is able- and supposedly willing-- to kill you with her gas, the more every window and long hallway you pass seems to look more and more like an escape route.

On the subject of Octavia's home, it is undeniably lovely. As you emerge from the stairwell to the wine cellar, you're greeted by warm sunlight and plushy carpets that your hooves practically melt into. The cellist guides you through the nearest hallway, and while you nervously walk to the side of her lethal hindquarters in fear of a surprise gassing, the two of you pass several rooms that Octavia explains to you. A small but comfortably decorated kitchen, a small study filled with scattered music notation, a guest bathroom... Thankfully, nothing seems unusual in this house yet, aside from the wine cellar and the occasional unexpected pairs of headphones or other electronic devices belonging to her roommate, Vinyl Scratch. (How anypony would have the stomach to room with Octavia is a mystery. You certainly hope she's not in on her roommate's bizarre hobbies.)

"And up this staircase here are the bedrooms: mine, Vinyl's, and the guest bedroom." Octavia points a hoof to each door respectively.

"Will I be sleeping in that one?" You ask politely, even though you get the feeling you already know the answer.

Octavia turns to you and stares quietly, disappointment practically radiating from her amethyst-colored eyes. "Are you a guest?"

"...yes?" You were tempted to answer in the negative, but whatever fleeting pride you had left still forces you to present yourself as a fellow pony to her. Besides, she asked that question kindly enough, perhaps she was being sar--

A quick swipe with a forehoof connects with your chin and catches you off guard, causing you to fall to your haunches. "Perhaps I should establish several ground rules before we proceed. First, you are not a guest nor a friend. You are property, and will be treated however I so choose to treat you."

Just when I was finally being treated with some civility, you think to yourself, nursing your jaw as you look up at her. For an unassuming earth pony, her stare is icy and commanding. You can't help but feel exactly like a pet being chastised, which you're quick to remember is exactly what you are to her.

"Second, my orders are your law now. I'm sure you already know what the primary component of my brand of punishment is, but I promise you I can get much, much more cruel than just a little gas to the face. Third, you will be sleeping..."

She grabs your foreleg and yanks you up, dragging you into her bedroom. With her hoof, Octavia gestures to a large cage in the corner of the room, a pony-sized pet bed filling the surface area of the floor.

"...here. Any questions?"

You're going to be sleeping in a cage? You already feel your disbelief fade into humiliation, the familiar warmness of shame heating your face as you stare at your new bed.

"Now then..."
113111121211122.title: A tour of your new home

choices: You borrow her for your show tonight?"
We go get your slave?"
1131111212112.content:
"Bitch sounds much more appropriate, it fits this pathetic slave." The blue coated mare declares, her voice stern and having a hint of maliciousness to it. Had you not been so terrified of her piercing gaze you probably would have looked her over a bit more, thoroughly... Her luscious silver mane dangled down the sides of her face, the majority of it being covered by a blue wizard's hat that was adorned with stars. Her eyes were a beautiful shade of purple, and her body was slim and full of supple curves.

"Well, Bitch," Berry snickers as she glares at you. "This is Trixie, she's a traveling magician."

"To you that's either Mistress or The Great and Powerful Trixie." She orders and you simply nod your head weakly in response. "So Berry, how did you come to acquire this girl? I never would have thought that you'd be able to find a willing slave to put up with that gas of yours."

"That's the best part, she isn't willing at all! She tried to rape me!"

Trixie glares at you again, although this one was of complete revulsion. "Disgusting, to think an ugly creature like that tried to violate you! I'm glad she isn't willing however, domination is far better when the slave is forced to go through it." You swallow loudly at that, it seemed this mare was really a sadist. If Berry was going to let her torture you, (which you are sure she will) then you're going to be in for a very long and painful night.

"She deserves every minute of it, maybe that'll teach you not to rape ponies!" Berry snapped at you, causing you to grow even more fearful. "In not even a day I've already got her reeking like my farts! I think before long it'll be permanent."

"Hopefully, and speaking of farts, I've been absolutely pulverising this poor couch since I got here. I hope you don't mind." Trixie gave her friend a grin before pausing, a deep rumbling resonating under her flank as a sigh of relaxation passed her lips. A scowl of disgust crossed your face, of course you get stuck with another gassy mare.

"Not at all, but don't waste them on the couch when we have a perfectly good slave right here!" You almost broke out into tears at Berry's statement, though when Trixie smiled at you reluctantly paced over to her.

"A marvellous idea!" Trixie exclaims as you walk over, she merely points at the couch and you understand. You lie down and rest your head where her flank was previously and you almost throw up. The still lingering stench of farts told you she really had been letting it rip, and immediately after she sat her blue ass onto your face. You struggle and moan as the disgusting smell of her crack invaded your nostrils, somehow she smelt even worse than Berry. You hear Trixie strain above, before a rippling fart replaces the fresh air in your lungs. Somehow, even her farts smelt worse than Berry's rancid gas.

"So Trixie," Berry said after laughing at your predicament, "why don't...
1131111212112.title: Gassy Magician

choices: She gases you mercilessly until her show.
You try and escape!
11311112121121.content:
"I would love to, it gets so boring performing in these dead end towns..." Trixie scowled as she wiggled her flank on your face.

"Perfect! Hopefully you can teach her a lesson..." You couldn't tell, but you were fairly certain that Berry was glaring at you. Geez, she sure was making a big deal out of you trying to eat her.

"Well Berry," Trixie paused to release a rank fart into your nose. The smell was burning your nostrils, and you tried your best to keep your struggling to a minimum, though it certainly wasn’t an easy task. "I'd love to stay, but I'd like to get a little acquainted with my new slave."

Berry gave a cruel laugh before grinning at her friend. "That's fine with me! Just try to keep her from reeking completely of your farts, I'd still like her to have at least some of my scent!"

"I'll try my best, though I can't guarantee anything..." The magician smiled before ripping another fart in your face, causing you to nearly vomit. It reeked of digested vegetables, eggs, and... You couldn't quite make it out at first, but after a few more forced sniffs you noticed the disgusting undertone of alcohol. Had you known Ponyville was filled with this many drunks, you probably would never have visited, and you wouldn't be in this mess.

“Well, let’s get going bitch. You have a long night ahead of you.” Trixie states as she finally gets off of your face, allowing you to breathe in the semi-fresh air. “Goodbye Berry, thank you for letting me borrow you’re slave… We’re going to have a lot of fun together…”

You swallow loudly at that, she sure sounded sinister. With a sigh you followed her out of Berry’s house and onto the street. With a smile she led you through town, finally stopping at a carriage set up in an open area.

“Get in bitch, we only have a few hours before my performance, so let’s make it last.” Trixie grinned at you, before you slowly complied. You step into the carriage, first noticing the major lack of space. There was a bed on your left, and the right was a small kitchen. Other than that, there was practically nothing in here.

Trixie followed you in, promptly closing and bolting the door behind her. An ominous gurgling filled the air, and before you could even cringe Trixie tackled you onto the bed. You merely whimpered as she turned around and dropped her plot onto your face. “I try and let out all of my gas before my shows, so I'm lucky you're here!” She let out a maniacal laugh before releasing an awful, wet fart onto directly onto your nose.

Ugh… Her gas is definitely getting worse... As if to support your thought, Trixie let out another atrocious smelling fart, the burning stench of digested alcohol now much more noticeable.
11311112121121.title: Trixie's Slave for the Night

choices: Shrinking you
Making you part of the show
113111121211211.content:
As Trixie's gas gets even worse-smelling, your restraint begins to give out, and you squirm pitifully under her, halfheartedly trying to find a way out with your will slowly being sapped by her stink.
