You can't hold out any longer, and you hold her up above your mouth, dangling her by her tail. You lower her into your throat head first, and have her halfway down before you start chewing on her. You don't puncture the skin, you're more or less gumming her, but you really only want it for the texture. And she is so tender, like a prime cut of veal. With one last gulp, you send her off to see her mother in your stomach.

You doubt you'll be seeing anyone else around here, considering how late it's gotten, so you manage to pull yourself up and lay down on Berry Punch's sofa to spend the night.
113122.title: Morals are for suckers, I want dessert!

choices: Time to let those two out the back door!
Hungry. Must eat more ponies
1131221.content:
Dawn's light filters in through the windows of the Berry household, and morning finds you sprawled out on the couch, comfortably sleepy with your hearty meal nearly gone. Your tummy juices have done their job splendidly, taking only one night to reduce two ponies to only a nutritious paste in your stomach and whatever is going to come out of your rear later. Your belly is much smaller now, only a slight paunch. Nopony would be able to tell just how much you ate.

You decide to get your day started, and hop off the couch to stretch your sleepy limbs. You put a bit of pressure on your back legs, and feel your gut start to grumble. You lean back, letting your tush hang in the air, and flip back your tail.
Fruuuuuuump!

A fart explodes out of your pert butt, and you taint the air with the heavy, wet stench of digested meat. Then another, long drawn out jet of gas eeks out of your butthole, further poisoning the atmosphere. You take dreamy sniffs of the flatulence, savoring the tones of beef and liquor, the odor of that trampy mother and her tender young daughter. Before you go, you make sure to contaminate the air as much as you can with your intestinal stink, as a final parting gift.

Anyone who tried looking for the missing pair of ponies in there would just assume they were long since dead, given the atrocious fumes you left.

As you are trotting through town, the locals completely unaware of your carnivorous ways, you feel your belly grumble. What is it?
1131221.title: A new day, a new meal!

choices: Knock her out and take her somewhere secluded.
Eat the pink bitch whole right there and now!
11312211.content:
You notice that your not hungry, but you need to use the bathroom. Looking around, and seeing no wear you could do your business, you decide to just say screw it and just go behind a house. You take one last look around to make sure no one is watching, and no one is. Pushing, you can feel the two very slowly coming out. It takes about 20 minutes but their both finally out, and luckily no saw you do it. Walking back on to the street, no one still has noticed anything! This is turning out easier than expected. You start thinking about the nasty bitch and her daughter that had for a tasty meal from the night before. Now your getting hungry again, so you decide to stop at a bakery called SugarCube Corner. The first thing your greeted to is a very energetic pink pony.

"HI, I'M PINKIE PIE! I've never seen you around here before! Where you from!? What's you're name!? Do you like parties!? Cause I do! Do you want anything!? We've got muffins, big cakes, little cakes, huge pies, small pies, and even cupcakes!"

So many questions coming from that damn pink pony! Does she ever shut up? You could tell easily that she was a very talkative one. You were getting winded by just listening to her. But she eventually stop asking so many damn questions and gave you time to say something...

"Well, I'm Orange Sherbet, and I came here for something to eat..." Was all you could say.

"Well you came just in time! I have these freshly baked cupcakes I'm giving away a free samples!" Pinkie Pie said while bouncing up and down all around SugarCube Corner.

Free samples? Well that's good cause you didn't have any bits on you right now. So you nod and look at the cupcakes. They all look so good! But the one the seems to catch your eyes really well is the rainbow colored one (I made a Cupcakes reference. So?). So you go a grab it and take a bite. You can't believe how amazingly awesome it tastes! The amazing flavor tingles and bounces around your tongue.

"It tastes so good!" You say while swallowing the cupcake whole.

"Well that's good! Want another!?"

You nod in agreement. You are hungry, but you are very hungry. So Think of a way to get a little more then just another cupcake...
11312211.title: Hello my new meal.

choices: A old chair, would be perfect for some blunt force trauma.
Wait... Is that a bottle of chloroform behind the counter?
113122111.content:
Pinkie looks as tasty as a pony could be, but eating her here, in broad daylight would be dangerous. What if someone catches you doing it?
However as the pink mare turns her back on you to grab some more cupcakes from the kitchen, you get a very good look at the pink mare's swaying flanks. As you stare at the rocking hips you hatch a plan. Perhaps if you where to knock her out and drag here somewhere more secluded, then you would be able to eat that delicious flank, literary.
You take a quick peek around the store for something to help you with your sinister task, you find...
113122111.title: Knock her out and take her somewhere secluded.

choices: The kitchen looks well stocked, perhaps the basement?
Drag her out the backdoor into the dark alley.
1131221112.content:
Chloroform. Perfect, every would be kidnapper's best tool. While Pinkie is still looking away in some cupboards in the kitchen you quickly swipe the bottle and douse a napkin from the counter in it. Using your years of experience in stealth you quickly sneak up behind the mare without a sound. As you get just close enough to pounce her there is a sound. Oh no! You knocked over a ill placed measuring cup. Pinkie turns around to face you just as manage to hide away the napkin behind your back.

''Aw did you get impatient?'' She coos, almost mockingly so. ''Don't worry I know I had some of my super special cupcakes around here. Just be a little more patient for me Sherbet. Okay?''

Looking quickly left and right, and after a short delay you then gently nod. Is this mare really that naive? It seems so as she turns around searching through the cupboards again.

You don't waste any time and pounce her as soon as you are in her blind spot. With the napkin planted firmly on her muzzle she yelps out in surprise, although it gets muffled by the napkin and your hoof. The effect of the drug is almost immediate and soon enough you have a unconscious pony in front of you on the kitchen floor. As you take a moment of respite thanking your luck you contemplate your next move.

Where do you take your next meal?
1131221112.title: Wait... Is that a bottle of Chloroform behind t...

choices: Pony?
Nope, never mind. It's just another large bloodstain.
11312211121.content:
Figuring the basement would be the least exposed area you could go. Gently dragging Pinke down the basement stairs and into the large room. Its pitch black in there but there is a faint smell reminding you of something. Taking a large sniff you confirm you are familiar with this smell you just cant put your hoof on it. But that mystery will probably once you find the lights. Searching along the walls on the left and right side of the staircase you eventually find the light. As the light turns on moments later you wish you didn't.

Every wall, the floor and even the roof is caked in dried old blood, the room is decorated with furniture made out of bones and different body parts. The room is so grotesque that a lesser pony might have lost their breakfast.

In the middle of the room there appear to be a large free spin operating table with restraints, on it is... Wait, is that a?...
11312211121.title: Into the basement we go!

choices: The pink bitch.
The poor rainbow maned filly.
113122111211.content:
There is! There is a young mare strapped up on the table. You trot up to the mare to check her out. She seems to be a Pegasus with a sky blue coat and a rainbow colored mane. She seems to be breathing slowly, like she is asleep. Or perhaps drugged? Remembering the Chloroform.

But you want to find out what is going on here, and you just got an idea on how to do so. So you undo the straps of the table and gently lift the Pegasus down to the floor. Finding some rope on a tool table of to the the side you bind the mare's legs and wings so she would not be able to escape. You are not going to let a free meal like that simply run away will you?

Now that the table is freed, you can place Pinkie there, strap her in and then, you wait.

A few hours later.

Your stomach gives of a loud groan. You are famished. Even if you did sneak up and found those cupcakes Pinkie was searching for earlier.

Rainbow Dash had also woken up about an hour earlier, after which she had presented herself, lost her breakfast (told ya) and screamed loudly for help, not necessarily in in that order.

You had tried reassuring her that she was only bound because you didn't want her to run off and tell the authorities before she knew what was really going on. Frankly to say, she didn't believe it. But one can only scream continuously for so long before ones voice gives out.

Giving out another grumble, your stomach reminds you that it was a day since it last had proper sustenance. You impatiently slap the Pink pony and tell her unconscious form to wake up. To your great surprise this worked.

''Urgh, where am I? The last thing I remember was looking for a ultra delicious cupcake to give to my new fri...'' She looks over and notices you. ''...end. Aw great.''

''Good thing you woke up. I was getting impatient.'' You grin at the Pinkie. ''Now, I want to know whats going on here?''

''This is where I hold my special parties, DUH!'' You raise an eyebrow at that statement and you do a gesture to signal the mare to go on.

After a long and very graphic explanation of her ''special parties'' you look at her in disgust. Eating ponies, okay you do that too. But torturing ponies? and keeping them alive for as long as possible while doing so. that is just sick. and a quick look over at Rainbow confirms it. During the explanation she had lost the remainder of her breakfast and was now quietly sobbing.

Another wave of grumbling from your stomach comes back in force, telling you it needs food. NOW!

It's time for dinner so, after taking a quick look between the pegasus on the floor and the earthpony on the table you decide to eat...
113122111211.title: Pony?

choices: Sorry, no witnesses.
Be a hero!
1131221112111.content:
You decide to go for the psychopath. She deserves it.

''So Pinkie, you eat ponies huh? Well, how would you like to be eaten huh!?

You unstrap one of her legs and put it in your mouth. Oh so sweet. Pinkie is the most delicious pony you have ever tasted!

She gives you a nervous laughter. ''Hehe, thats funny... If you let me go I'll give you a dozen cupcakes. For free!'' You roll your eyes and unstrap her other leg and put it in your mouth together with the first and gives a gentle swallow. Ending with your mouth around her knees. ''Okay okay! Two dozens. Wait... your not going to swallow me whole are you? Nopony can do that, not even me.'' You give her a look that says ''try me'' and swallow again, this time your mouth stops around her thigh just before her flank. ''Free cupcakes for life! Please!'' One more swallow and you now have her up to her torso, there is nothing she can do anymore, so you unstrap her arms but you keep them in your firm grip and sit down on the ground. ''Muffins! Maybe you would prefer muffins instead of cupcakes! Anything, just please don't do this.'' she pleads. You shake your head to decline her offer. Or at least, you try to shake your head but the pony lodged into your maw makes impossible. Shrugging you shove her arms into your maw and gives another hard swallow. She is down to her head now. She have stopped her bargaining and is just crying waterfalls, literary. after a few seconds of contemplating on how a pony can shed so much tear water your lungs remind you that you cannot breathe while there is a pony in your throat blocking your windpipe. Forcing you to finish Pinkie quickly. After another hasty, hard and slightly panicked swallows you bring the last of the baker down into your gullet, leaving a salty aftertaste from the flood of tears.

Sighing and giving a small burp you lightly pet your full belly, and your belly happily gurgles in response. No pony had ever felt as filling as this mare, and it would be tough trying to down another adult pony. Looking over at Rainbow Dash you notice her staring at you, eyes large as saucers. She must be shocked speechless. Well that's pretty much how everypony reacts when seeing somepony gets swallows whole and alive.

But now that leaves you with two options. You could ether try to force her down to join her ''friend''. Or you could try to convince her that you are a good pony and let her go.

What will you do?
1131221112111.title: Town's only large enough for one cannibal pony.

choices: You finish digesting the two mares in peace.
Your digestion gets interrupted midway.
11312211121111.content:
Seeing how irrational this pegasus reacted earlier there is only one course of action. To force her down to join her compadre in your stomach.

Rainbow Dash starts to panic as you somehow manage to get to your hooves and slowly waddle over to her. She squirms and tries to scream but with her hoarse voice barely a sound comes out. So Dash settles with squirming against her bindings a bit more and then break down into sobbing. However you surprise her when you sit down gently strokes her mane. ''Ssshhh. Its okay now. The scary pony is gone. Its going to be alright.´'' You try to gently reassure her, and its working. ''If you please calm down a little so I can undo those bindings.'' She nods and you start working on the ties and knots. You don't want rope burns in your throat. You work fast despite your huge belly and within seconds you have freed the pegasus.

Despite being freed from the binding Rainbow lays still against your stomach while you stroke her mane. Is the entire town this naive? If so, then you will most definitely enjoy your stay here.

Taking another quick look over the mare it turns out she have fallen asleep in your embrace. Your stomach must be hypnotic or something, as it seems to make everypony fall asleep. Aw well, you're not going to skip out of this opportunity.

Opening your mouth wide you gently lower it over Dash's head before you grab her and lift her up above you and start to swallow. Half the pony vanishes into you throat in the matter of seconds. But it seems that your quick movements have awoke the mare from her slumber. However, even so she can't do much more than wildly flail her hind legs as you finish her. With gravity helping you the mare is gone in another few gulps. A moment of contemplating on why it was so easy to down miss Dash after how full you felt from Pinkie. A few seconds later comes your answer in the form of a huge burp. With all that excess air gone you can lay down and start digesting.
11312211121111.title: Take no chances.

choices: The evils of muggers
The evils of Government
11312211121112.content:
Suddenly it hit you! This was your true calling! You were never meant to hunt and devour the innocent! You were a Cannibal for justice!! You unstrapped Rainbow who being very frightened and panicked responded by slapping you. But you just take this as her obviously being your new love interest and kiss her on the lips before she runs off in a confused panic. Yes you were a great hero. But a great hero needed a great name.

Gurglemare! That would you would be called! Gurglemare the savior of Ponyville! No the savior of Equestria itself! For a moment you pondered that a hero should not eat innocents, but you figured that your sins had been absolved by eating Pinkie Pie. Besides if anyone asked you could just blame it on her, so why should it hang on your conscious.

Slowly you trotted up the stairs. Heroically you trotted up the stairs.No stairs could stop you!! Was what you thought as you dragged your bloated belly up the steps. Though all that pony in your belly was making your Heroic climb take quite sometime. In fact almost an entire hour passed before you made it to the top. But it had been worth it! As your quest to stop all evil had only just begun.

But now that Pinkie was gone where would you resume your quest to devour evil. There was always wandering muggers, but perhaps there was a more sinister evil you could fight?... What would be the best evil for you to fight now? As you decided you yelled. "I am Gurglemare! and I shall stop the evils of!!"
11312211121112.title: I am Gurglemare! Savior of ponyville!!

choices: You could definately use another Pony to munch on
No way, you're stuffed. Just sit back and digest!
113122112.content:
She holds out another one of those scrumptious rainbow cupcakes, and you have the the best idea. You licks your lips, and open your mouth wide,

"Feed me." You say.

Pinkie pie looks a little confused, "I beg your pardon?"

"Feed me!" You say again.

"Oh, okie dokie loki!" She smiles, and stuffs the cupcake in your mouth. You chew it a little, and open your mouth again, still filled with half-chewed cupcake. You point a hoof at your gob, and she obliges, pushing another in. You open your mouth wider, and Pinkie reaches her hoof into your mouth, deep. You're not gonna get a better opportunity than this to snack on her. Your lips slam shut on her hoof, with surprisingly strong grip. Pinkie tries to pull away, but, she can't get you lips off her. She gives a weak laugh,

"Hee hee, that's funny Sherbet, but... You uh, gotta let go. Okay?" She's as worried as she should be. You jerk your head back, and she is pulled deeper into your throat. Pinkie panics, and tries to pull you off, to no avail.

"Stop! Stop right now you big old Silly-Willy!" She's practically screaming now, and tries pushing against your face with her hoof to try and get rid of you. Big mistake. You open your mouth wider and lunge forward, snapping up her other hoof. She shouts and tries to pull away, slowly getting sucked down your gullet. Her face touches yours, and you briefly kiss, before you open your mouth and engulf her entire head. Her screams are muffled by your mouth, and her struggles start to grow weak as she runs out of oxygen.

The rest is easy as, well, pie. In a few minutes you're sitting pretty, patting the slowly digesting lump of sugary pony in your gut. It'll be a few glorious hours before you've completely broken down Pinkie's sweet morsels into a nutrious slurry, but in the mean time you'll have this enormous, squishy gut to play with. Of course, thinking about how quickly you're going to digest Pinkie only raises the classic question, are you really full, or are you going to need some seconds?
113122112.title: Pinkalicious

choices: One of the shop owners, Mrs. Cake.
A rainbow maned, cyan pegasus.
1131221121.content:
One was never enough, you had to find another pony to eat. Sugarcube Corner was strangely empty though, maybe if you wait a bit somepony will come. You wait for a while and hold off your never ending hunger with a few treats from the bakery. If there was one downside to eating ponies, besides the danger of being locked up in a dungeon for the rest of your life, it was the fact that everything else tastes just kinda bland in comparison. The cupcakes were sweet and tasty no doubt, but they lacked substance, were too damn small and they didn't wriggle for you on the way down.

You were pulled out of your reminiscing by the sound of the doorbell. Finally a new meal has arrived, you can barely stop yourself from running up to the newcomer and pouncing him. Instead you cheerfully greeted the newcomer. You licked your lips a little as you saw the meal in front of you.
1131221121.title: You could definately use another Pony to munch on

choices: You devour her without interruptions.
Her husband comes in.
11312211211.content:
You started to drool as you looked at the mare. Nice and plump, just the way you liked it and her pink, swirly mane even looked like a cream topping. "Hello there deary, have you seen Pinkie Pie? She was supposed to watch the shop for me and my husband today. Oh by the way, my name is Cup Cake, me and my husband own this bakery." Mrs. Cake went to the kitchen to see if Pinkie Pie was in there. "Oh this filly, she can be so irresponsible! And not even locking up the shop before the left." Licking your lips you follow the chubby mare into the kitchen where you two would be alone.

Mrs. Cake noticed that she was being followed by the obese mare. "Oh I'm sorry dear, is there something I can get for you? Maybe a cake or a few cupcakes?" There was precisely one Cup Cake you wanted to eat right now. "Oh I'm fine, in fact I can already see what I want." You say with a malicious tone in your voice. The plump mare looked around, clearly confused. There were only raw ingredients around you right now so what could you possibly want? Mrs. Cake got her answer as you grabbed her and held her tightly.

"What are you doing?" She asked while struggling in your iron grip. Eating ponies gives you an enormous strenght, you barely felt Cup Cakes movements in your grasp. Without a word you licked her over the cheek, giving her a little taste test. "Mmmh, this little cupcake tastes great, I'll take it." Cup Cake gasped as she heard this, wondering if the madmare in front of her was serious. Then she noticed something. There was something large inside of this mares stomach, the shape was kinda familiar to her. Mrs. Cake gasped again as she felt that the large object in your stomach was a pony. "Oh no, Pinkie Pie." Tears started to trickle down her cheeks, Pinkie Pie was eaten and most likely dead by now and she was next.
11312211211.title: One of the shop owners, Mrs. Cake.

choices: Up Stairs
Down Stairs
113122112111.content:
"Mmmhhhhh Don't worry dear your tears will only make you salty." Orange spoke with a wicked grin before it opened revealing the entrance to her cavernous belly. Before Cup Cake could so much as make a sound, you pulled her head into your gaping maw. Pulling her in with monstrous strength and speed. By the time Cup Cake recovered from the shock of the situation her forelegs were already locked to her side and it was too late to struggle.

With Cup Cake's Head and shoulders firmly locked inside Sherbet was able to relax and enjoy the feeling of the plump mare in her throat. Lying back against a nearby kitchen island she began the slow process of pulling in the delicious older mare. But as she came up to her haunches Sherbet realized that this was going to be harder then she first thought. This mares ass was HUGE. Orange had never even tried to swallow something this big, she had no idea how she was going to get her all the way down.

"So stupid" I shouldn't have wasted time enjoying this so much. Looking around frantically she needed something to ease her down or she would run out of air. Looking back and forth before her eyes locked onto orange oil extract. If her mouth wasn't full of mare then she would have smiled. Using her tail she knocked the bottle over, causing it to pour out. Holding out both hooves coating them in the extract. Rubbing her hooves together she moved them to either side of the mares generous ass before bringing them down with a resounding SMACK, and rubbing them all over covering her jiggling ass in oil.

This caused Miss.Cake to double up on her struggling kicking her legs out, but this only made it easier to get her down, With two resounding gulps Cup Cake was struggling around her belly bigger then it had ever been before.
"Ahhhhhh" That was the best breakfast ever,
"mmmmhhh thank you both" Orange said after rubbing her struggling belly.
"Aww now i am going to have to find a place to let you both settle" Looking around for a place to rest and not bee seen. there was the stairs with most likely led to the pink ones room, or a different set leading down most likely the storage room. But where would i be less likely to be found?
113122112111.title: Sweet Sweet Cake

choices: Shy Lunch in the Woods
Southern Home Cooking
1131221121111.content:
A loud knock at the door startled you out of your morning nap.
"Pinkie, Pinkie are you in there?" A decidedly male voice asks, shit you thought, it must be the husband looking for the two pony's you had for your breakfast. Looking down you notice that you seem to have digested them faster then ever, but you still have to let them out, you still look like your heavily pregnant.
"Pinkie are you there? Have you seen the missus around I cant seem to find her." Dam how do i explain this? Umm I have to try impersonate Pinkie, its the only way, I hope he falls for it.
"Umm no I haven’t." Your jaw drops as your voice sounds EXACTLY like the pink pony you just ate.
“Well alright then,” he said sounding suspicious, “well I am going to take the twins and look around town for the wife, take care of the shop for me.”
What had happened she had never been that good at voices had she? What about the other pony? Could she do hers too? Going back through all the pony’s she had eaten she could do only pinkies. But why what had caused this change? Looking back through your memories you notice something else too. Memories that aren’t YOURS! They seemed to come from the pink mare, having a quick peek show that that mare didn’t not have an ordinary life, Pinky and five others did all sorts of stuff. They must be the key, if she got those five mares too who knows what other powers she could get! Hearing the clock strike 12, she said aloud.
“Just in time for lunch too.”
1131221121111.title: Formed Plans

choices: Angry. Like the fires of Hell are burning in her eyes.
Aroused... Wait what?
1131221122.content:
You waddle out of sugarcube corner, hefting your new weight after eating that crazy pink pony. Looking around for a minute, you spy a park bench. Waddling over, you sit down on it with a small, thump. You smile, patting your bloated belly contentedly as you start to feel drowsy. Your eyes soon haze over and you drift off into a full sleep.

...

*tap tap tap*

You snort in annoyance as some pony starts incessantly tapping you with their hoof, slowly rousing you out of your slumber. Oh whoever this is is going to pay... Maybe you'll get some chives and sour cream for this next meal... that sounds nice.

you slowly start to blink open your eyes when you're suddenly met with the shock of your life

"HIYA!"

You're bowled over in shock, flipping over the back of the bench and landing in a heap on the ground. You stare up at the pink pony, flabbergasted and horrified.

"What?!" you sputter. "But... I... You... Ate!"

"That was a fun ride! I've never been through anything like that before! It was fun! Though a little stingy towards the end. That juicy stuff felt kinda hurty."

You rub your eyes with your hooves. How was this possible?! You ATE this pink pony. You felt her digest! She was broken down and made into sustenance for your body to work off of! How in the name of Discord was she standing here right now babbling on to you like nothing happened.

"...and then the oatmeal overlord said that he would cover the world in mushy destruction when I-"

"STOP!" You nearly scream. You grab her hooves. "How are you here?"

She blinks at you. "Well why wouldn't I be here, silly filly? It's not like I went anywhere."

"Yes you DID!" your anger starts to rise. "My STOMACH! I swallowed you whole! I felt you digest! How can you possibly be here, solid and alive, standing in front of me right now?!"

The pink pony giggles. "Didn't I introduce myself? I'm Pinkie Pie!" she says cheerily, as if that's supposed to explain everything.

You sit back on your rump, your mind spinning with this new development.

"Oh, and hey! You'll never guess who I found down there!"

No.

"Come on out, girls!"

No. WAY.

Out from behind a tree stepped a familiar maroon mare and a timid young, lilac filly.

Ohhhh... F-

"Yeah, it was the weirdest thing! When I was down there I found Berry Punch and little Pinchy down there too! I have no idea what they were doing down there but they didn't seem all that happy."

"NO!" You sudenly shout. "I CANNOT believe this. This does NOT compute!" You point a hoof at Berry and her daughter. "I digested you! I broke you down! I saw you come out of my own body as a brown pile of mush! How in the nine circles of hell does this even WORK?!"

Berry Pinch shrugs a little. "She's Pinkie Pie" is all she says, again as if it explained everything.

You're sitting there, about to tear your own mane out when suddenly, a now completely sober Berry punch strides up to you. You gulp down a whimper. This doesn't look like it's going to end well for you. You look up into her face and she looks...
1131221122.title: Reality has _No Meaning_ for this Pink Pony!

choices: Berry Punch who has escaped from pinkie and is still mad.
Princess Luna!?
11312211221.content:
You flinch as her hoof moves to strike you however you never feel the blow, you open your eyes to see the pink pony restraining a very angry Berry Punch "I'll kill her for what she did!" Berry punch shouted and it looks like she's not exaggerating. Seems Pinkie Pie holding her down is the only thing between life and death for you.

"Now, now, Berry getting Punchy won't solve anything" Pinkie struggled to say, still managing to giggle at her own pun. "You may want to get out for a little while I'll try to calm her down." she continued as though it would be the easiest thing in the world. Well you need no other invitation you dash away.

You run as fast as you can and quickly find yourself in the middle of a forest, dark and menacing, with vines hanging down every tree and a thick fog rolling along the ground untouched by the light of the sun thanks to the heavy canopy above. You take little notice wondering instead how they survived and possibly more shockingly why the pink one would help you escape. After some time you find yourself in a clearing well what you think might be a clearing the fog is really starting to obscure all vision. You sit on your haunches panting to get your breath until you hear a snap of a twig someones here you turn to see...
11312211221.title: Berry Puncy.

choices: Bindings; wherever you are, you aren't leaving anytime soon
Bandages; somepony else must have found you
113122112211.content:
You turn to see Berry Punch yet again. That is to say, you see her hoof rapidly approaching your face. Without any time to react, you immediately find your world replaced with tumbling blurs and searing pain. You fall and fall... there must have been a steep hill or cliff or something. And rocks. Or thorns. You're in no condition to take in the specifics of the scene as you eventually black out...
...
...
...
...

         You feel warm. And comfortable... No, that's not it... You feel bad, but you certainly don't feel like you've been left outside for hours. Consciousness returns to you gradually, but you can't bring yourself to open your eyes just yet. It sounds like there's some ponies talking in the next room, but you can't make out what they're saying. Eventually, you move a little bit experimentally, and find that your limbs are bound by... something. Trying to ignore the searing pain, you slowly open your eyes and look upon yourself.

"You want me to do what with the who now?" Your utter confusion bypasses your fear for a minute and you stand with your head cocked to the side.

"We understand you confusion," Luna says, "But listen to us. When you swallowed the Pink One, she escaped from your stomach and she saved the souls of ponies you had digested. That is the power of the Elements of Harmony. But your stomach is unique, you possess powers beyond any other voracious pony. When she passed through your system, you severed the link between Pinkie and her Element. She may not know it now, but in time she will lose her joyous attitude and find herself unable to crack a single joke."

This is all a lot for you to take in, so you take a seat and start rubbing your head just to stop it from hurting. Luna pokes your belly with her horn and it starts to glow. Inside your glowing belly you can see the outline of a pink balloon. The Element of Laughter. Your jaw drops, Luna wasn't lying.

"What does this mean?" You ask.

Luna chuckles, "This means two things, my dearest. You have gained her element and her powers. And it also means that, should you feel the need to devour her again, Pinkie would not survive a return trip to your stomach."

"Whoah." You pat your belly, "I am feeling a bit peckish. So what do I do now?"

"Now you shall find the remaining Elements of Harmony and consume them to gain their powers. Bring them to me and we shall control the Rainbow of Light! Nopony, no creature in the universe could challenge us! Not even Celestia!"

"Um." You didn't really sign up for this, but Pinkie did taste scrumptious. Maybe it was the Element that made her so tasty. Those other five might be just as delicious, "One condition. When you've got the Rainbow of Might or whatever, I get to eat anypony I want. Deal?"

"Ahahahaha!" Luna throws her head back in delight, "We admire your impetuousness Orange Sherbet! Bring us the Elements and you shall devour anypony you please, even my sister!"

Whoah, you never dreamed you'd have a shot at eating Celestia.

"All you must do, my dear, is take some of this," From behind her mane Luna pulls a small flask of blue liquid, "Devour the bearers and you will take their Element. Wash each of your meals down with a gulp of this and you will digest them permanently."

You nod and take the potion from her. Luna gives you one last respectful bow and then you are off to...

1131222.content:
A surprise visitor?

Make that twenty.

The bright lights of unicorn aura shone through the shutters of the windows, shocking you out of your sleep.

"Open the door, we have you surrounded!" A voice blared. "You are to be arrested for murder!"

How did they find out? You must have been too obvious- leaving numerous clues around your many temporary homes.

You dared to take a peek through the window, and you heart skipped a beat. Many heavily armored unicorns and pegasi dotted the outside, wearing the colors and insignias of the Princess herself. Damn. There was no way to face these guys head on, there were to many. The armor would be too solid to digest as well. You would have to find some other entrance, to ensure that you will eat ponies another day, not rot in some insane asylum.

You look around. There is no escape route from the first floor, so you hurried trot up the stairs to the second. A large, circular window faces, the front. You can take your chances, dive out the window, and maybe you will catch the forces off guard. You turn around, looking for another entrance. In another bedroom, most likely one lived in by Berry Pinch, is a air vent, big enough for you to crawl through. However, it is uncertain as to where it will lead... Where will you go? The window, or the vent?
1131222.title: You're interrupted in the middle of the nig...

choices: A scrumptious looking hobo pone!
A lone guard! (Maybe you can take 'em?)
11312221.content:
The choice is clear: the window. Your oversized gut, stuffed with half-digested pony meat, would certainly never fit through that vent. All that climbing in there would accomplish would be making you look like an idiot for when the guards catch you.

With a warrior whoop, you charge the window and leap. Shattered glass and bright lights graze your eyes, but you remain steadfat and focused in your goal of escape. The guards are lined up, almost as if they were expecting such a risky move from a dangerous perp. You're going to have to trust in your ability to fly-

Wait. Earth Pony. Fuck.

You fall like a blubbery orange wrecking ball and land belly-first on the front most guard. Your landing is surprisingly soft, save for a warm splattering of something on your gut and the sound of broken- Oh Celestia.

Somepony screams out in agony. A another pony quickly joins in on the shouting, though theirs is of clear disgust. Finally having found your bearings, you hoist your gut up and brush it off. You feel something sticky underhoof and take just a moment to examine what it is:blood. Horrified, you look down at your victim.

The once proud Equestrian guard is now a crumpled heap of broken armor and broken bones. Whatever isn't badly bruised or twisted out of place on him is coated in fresh blood. All he can do now is suffer and gargle out broken screams. You've completely destroyed him. Even for a cannibal it's a gruesome scene.

You look to the guards to gauge their reactions. Neither is looking at you; one is staring at his crushed comrade and the other is holding his head to the side and trying to suppress his overwhelming need to vomit. In all their years of service to the Princess, they've never seen anything more horrible than the sight of a fellow guard mangled under a two-ton pony.

You guess there's only one proper thing to do: haul oversized ass out of there. You break into a full sprint, knocking aside the two guards before you and you don't look back for a second. Behind you you can hear vomiting and cries of "Get her! Follow her!". Soon after, a dozen sets of hooves are hot on your trail. There's no way a fatass like you could possibly escape them. They draw closer and closer still.

Your heart races every time you hear that awful clopping grow louder. Every alley you duck into, every street you turn on does nothing to lose them. You're certain now that you're not going to escape. You hear a guard behind you shout,

"Cease and desist, monster! You cannot escape the royal guard!"

The proximity of his voice sends shivers down your spine. He must be right behind you! You start to sweat harder, your face glows red in exertion, and your bowels twist in horror. You feel like you're going to shit yourself on of fear. You feel-

Frreaaaaptbbb

From your rear a triumphant fart echoes out and billows backwards toward your pursuers. Suddenly the air is devoid of the sounds of a chase and instead full of gagging, coughing and vomiting. You look over your shoulder, still running, to admire your work. The entire cadre of proud, strong royal guards have been reduced to a writhing mass of stallions struggling to breathe past the scent of digested pony. Perfect!

You duck into an alley some blocks down, completely convinced that you've lost them. The lack of hoofbeats from either side reassures you of it. You sigh, letting down your guard for the first time all night. Of course, once you do, something catches you off guard. You spin around in place to see that someone has knocked over a trashcan. It's...
11312221.title: Freedom!

You find yourself frozen in place. The trash can finishes rolling over on its side until it nudges against you gently on your bloated stomach. Before you, a colt is tapping about the area with his hooves. He presses against the can and mutters something under his breath about it moving again. He doesn't seemed bothered that you've stopped dead in his path. He continues to attempt to be stumbling about in the dark when you realize inches from you that he's not seeing you because he is blind.

He stops just as he's about to touch you and he asks, "Who's there? There is somepony there, right?"

You choose not to answer, but your stomach does the talking anyway. It groans a bit, filling that awkward silence. You feel a bit of hunger again coming over you. All this running around and trying to elude the guards has helped burn off some of the energy from eating that mare and that filly. However, that Vagabond, while an easy meal, isn't clear cut clean. At this close range, you can smell the rank, putrid stench of his unwashed body emanate like a bad perfume. His clothing, while mostly rags, do little justice other than to serve as a way to carry what little possessions he carries with him. His scarf and cloak, cover him to keep him warm on nights like this.

The blind hobo asks again, "I hear you, no sense of hiding. I can tell your hungry, but I have little to offer. If there is something I can help you with..."

You feel that...

1132.content:
You can't very well swallow her whole, now can you? That would be simply ridiculous.

You leave Berry Punch, just for a moment, to look about the house to the bathroom, you'll need the tub. You can't seem to find it downstairs, although you do poke your head into the kitchen to preheat the oven and take out a few ingredients. Leaving the kitchen lights on, you head upstairs, looking into one of the rooms on your right. The door was open just a crack, and you can spy, underneath a thick, fluffy comforter decorated with colorful birds, is a sleeping foal. She couldn't be more than ten, and you assume that the drunk snoozing on the couch is her mother and only guardian.

Shame that the little one will have to be put up for adoption soon.

Finally, you spot the bathroom at the end of the hall, and head back downstairs to retrieve your prey for tonight. Berry's alcohol-soaked nerves don't even register her head bashing up against the hardwood floor, or when the knocked repeatedly against the staircase as you drag her behind you. She only manages to stir when you toss her into the tub, and even then she only murmurs in her sleep and rolls about a little.

You retrieve your implements for tonight, a sparkling clean set of cutlery with which you'll butcher the unsuspecting mare. But first, you decide you'll need to wash the sweaty stench off her, to make a suitable meal. You position her under the faucet and pull, letting the warm water run over her. The suds wash over her, and run down the drain, dyed dark with sweat and dirt.

Once she's thoroughly clean, or at least slightly cleaner, you turn the water off and prepare your anesthetic. It's a special brew that you purchased from a back alley witch doctor over in Manehattan. The elixir slows heart and bloodrate to a crawl, as well as dulling the senses to near-uselessness. Ideal for your work.

You put the lip of the bottle to her lips and tip it back. Berry swallows subconsciously, sealing her fate. She won't be waking up for some time.

You prepare her forelegs, carefully shearing them clean, then dabbing with a bit of lotion to soften the skin. A quick cut around the joints with the scalpel will make it much easier for the bonesaw to slip in. Your deft hooves move the bonesaw quickly, cutting apart the tendons , while leaving the scrumptious muscle mostly intact. Then you go to work on the other leg, severing it even quicker than the first.

You pause for a bit, examining the two pony legs before you. You're honestly not that hungry, these two would be plenty for yourself, even another pony. You carefully wrap Berry Punch's legs, and leave her to sleep. She won't be up for some time, and the blood loss is minimal. You'll finish her off later, or perhaps not. Maybe you'll just leave her like this after your meal is finished. Imagine the sight! A pony with no front legs, you'd laugh your head off!

With Berry Punch sleeping away, unarmed, you head down to the kitchen to prepare a scrumptious stew. A few carrots, cabbage, peppers, and of course these delectable hooves and you are all ready to simmer up a meal for one. Although, it seems a little much for one pony. You could even share this meal with somepony, but you wouldn't know who to ask. They'd have to have a very open mind. Or be very naive..

Thinking it over, you decide that,
1132.title: Taking Your Cut

choices: Lay it out straight.
Hide the truth, at least for now.
11321.content:
Berry Pinch was snuggled up in her bed, completely unaware of the atrocious acts you were commiting upon her mother. Above her, on the headboard of her bed the name Berry Pinch had been painted in neat script. The unicorn foal looked so peaceful laying there, you didn't even wake her as you took her out of her bed. You picked her up by the scruff of her neck and brought her downstairs, she slept through the whole trip, only stirring when you placed her by the dinner table. Her big, beautiful eyes opened up, and she rubbed the sleepiness from them.

"Where am I, who are you?" She looked around, "Where's mommy?"

You did your best to appear friendly to the foal as you took the stewpot from the oven.

"I'm one of your mother's friends, dear. Don't you remember me, Berry Pinch? I knew you since you were a little bitty foal."

"I'm sorry ma'am," She avoided eye contact, probably too embarrassed.

"Oh, it's fine, little fillies can be very forgetful sometimes." You removed the lid from the pot, letting some steam rise off your concoction. You have to stifle a giggle when you see Pinchy sniff the air hungrily.

"I-Is that for me? I'm awful hungry, on account of mommy going out late to get her medicine. She forgot to make dinner again."

The poor darling, thank goodness you were there to be her guardian angel. You decide to answer her by ladleing out a portion of your Ponyhoof stew into a bowl, and putting the steaming hot brew in front of her. She's practically drooling, but polite enough to ask you,

"Aren't you gonna have any?"

"Oh, not yet, sweetums. I'm not very hungry, you just eat up!"

You give her a reassuring smile, which she returns, before digging into her stew bowl. She has no idea, absolutely no idea. She just happily munches up the stew, not asking a single question. She's so naive, so, innocent. You feel yourself losing your willpower. Your hoof climbs lower and lower, until you're clopping underneath the table. You move slowly, carefully, so as not to tip off Pinchy while she eats the meat from her own mother's hooves. She looks up and notices the pained expression and slight breathlessness on your face.

"Ma'am, are you okay?"

"F-fine, I juuust... Just have a little, nng, cold. Are you eh-unh-enjoying your meal?"

"Oh, of course! It's so tasty, the carrots and peppers and broth, I don't know what these lumpy grey parts are but they're super tasty!"

She's hooked. By Celestia she's hooked. A pony that gets a taste for pony never goes back, you never did. A rush of possibilities comes to you, you'll never have to eat alone now, you could teach her the intricacies of filleting pony flesh, you could finally have a daughter of your own. Or maybe, a lover. You become so giddy that you reach a speedy, albeit unsatisfying orgasm. A few drops of female fluids leak onto the floor, but you doubt Pinchy heard it. She was too busy licking her bowl clean. Your eyes narrow on her, you lick your lips and ponder just what you'll be able to do, and you realize the biggest snag to your plan is obvious. She has no idea she had just eaten part of her own mother. She might be hysterical, it could spoil everything.

I guess that means you have a bit of a choice to make. Should you be honest and upfront with her, or lie and ease her into her new life of cannibalism?
11321.title: Dinner for two!

choices: ...starts to have sex with her mother's corpse!
...starts to eat the pieces raw!
113211.content:
"So, did you enjoy your meal?"

Berry Pinch licked the last bits of stew from her bowl before saying, "Yes, thank you so much!"

"I made it special for you, your mother was happy to lend a hoof as well."

"Oh, really?" Pinch said, looking away, "That was nice of her..."

"Is there something wrong Pinchy dear?" You reach across the table to rub her cheek with your hoof. You could hear something like disappointment in the little filly's tone.

"Well, Mom doesn't usually... Never mind."

"Please, tell me."

Punchy sighs, and pushes her bowl away, "Mom usually never makes dinner. She's usually not home to make dinner, so I end up going to bed on an empty belly."

"Oh sweetie, that's terrible. But she's still your mother!"

"I wish she wasn't." Pinchy said it to the ground because she was too ashamed. You pretended to be shocked, even giving a shocked gasp to seem surprised. In reality, though, you're giddy. This is all too perfect. You lean across the table and wrap your arms around her head in a loving embrace.

"Pinchy! Please don't stay things like that!"

Berry Pinch shoves you away. She has to struggle just to keep her tears down long enough to say, "No! She's awful! She just goes out and drinks and drinks and then she comes home and forgets about me! I hate her!"

You hug her head again, "No, shh. Shh Pinchy."

You feel Berry Pinch start to sob against your chest. You rub your hoof back and forth in her mane, soothing her as best as you can. She's clearly distressed, now would be the best time to strike. She's nearly yours.

"Sweetums? Did you really like my stew?"

Berry pulls away, tears still in her eyes, and nods. She has no idea where you're going with this, but she'll see in time.

"Pinchy, come with me. I want to show you something special. I think it'll make you happy."

Pinch lets you lead her away from the kitchen and upstairs. You take your sweet time on the hallway toward the bathroom, letting Pinch rest on your side as you walk. You need her to be able to trust you, and the fact that she's willing to lean on you is a very good sign. You nudge the door open and let your filly guest walk first into your makeshift butchershop. Her eyes are immediately drawn to her mother, still unconscious and lying there without her forehooves. But Berry Pinch doesn't even blink.

"What did you do to mom?"

"She was the special ingredient in the stew, Pinchy. You ate the meat from her hooves. Wasn't it tasty?"

"Yes." Berry is completely deadpan.

"She's still alive Pinchy. But if you want we can make the rest of her into a meal. It'll be tasty."

"Let's do it."

In the end, all you can do is watch in horror as the door opens to reveal an orange mare in a cowboy hat.

“Pinkie, ah hope yer’ not botherin’ the patients in-”

Immediately, she’s hit by the overwhelming force of the diaper’s smell which hits her hard on the nose like a sledgehammer. You struggle to watch as she suffers under the cloud of stink that you and Pinkie have created together, forcing her to cover her muzzle with her hat. As she manages to regain her bearings, your cheeks explode into a fiery flush as the room falls into silence. After a few tense seconds, a loud *frrrp* escapes Pinkie’s backside as she finishes pooping, the sound of which echoes around the walls of the room. It also causes the manure in your diaper to bubble again like a filthy hot-tub.

“Oh, I... erm... ah’m sorry ma’am,” Applejack says, her voice muffled by her makeshift gas mask,”ah never realised you were doin’ yer’ business! Pinkie, what the hay are you doin’?”

“Hey Applejack!” Pinkie yells, forcing you downwards so she can get a better look at your surprise ‘guest’. As she does this, the contents of the diaper begin to seep out of the sides and onto your legs. Applejack widens her eyes at the sight of this, and quickly looks back and forth between the diaper and Pinkie. “ This is Orange Cream! Or was it Creamy Orange? Or maybe... What is your name by the way?” she asks you.

“P-P-Pinkie?! Are you... Are you inside that with her?!” Applejack asks her, her hat falling away from her face. As you’d expect, her face is aghast.

Pinkie giggles, probably unaware of the unbelievably awkward situation she’s created for both you and Applejack. “You should try it, AJ!” she says. “Trust me, it’s super duper pooper fun!”

Sweet Celestia, did she honestly just say that? You have no idea what Applejack is thinking right now, but you can sure as hell guess...
122121.title: Enter, Applejack

choices: You an’ me should go together!
Let's do this at Sweet Apple Acres. But let’s make gettin' there interesting...
1221212.content:
“Well we were goin’ to try it, but you just had to go an’ drop yer load into this pony’s diaper, didn’t ya’?”

You think that you just forced out another massive chunk of manure upon hearing that from the shock hitting you that hard. They were going to do this together?! You double take between the two ponies, glancing back and forth between the cowgirl’s irritated glare and Pinkie’s blushing face.

“Aw, c’mon AJ!” the pink pony says. “I just couldn’t hold it in any longer!”

“Ah’m awful sorry ‘bout this ma’am,” Applejack says to you, “but Pinkie can be miiighty forward when it comes to other pony’s private business. Ah learned that the hard way when she found me in the barn, hiding behind a bale o’ hay. You know how it is... Bein’ surrounded by family, you jus’ want someplace nice and peaceful to clop, ‘specially if you take a fancy to diapers like me.”

“Anyway, I was doin’ my business in the barn when I hear Pinkie callin’ from somewhere. I panicked, divin’ behind a hay bale. Ah dropped an extra large bunch of apples when she sniffed me out, but nothin’ could prepare me for what she did next.”

“What did she do?” you ask, even though you’ve already guessed the answer. Applejack smiles at you, picking up her hat and placing it on her head.

“Why, the same thing she’s doin’ right now!”

Pinkie giggles and wriggles about in the squishy diaper. She stayed silent for so long (well, the best of thirty seconds but that’s still long for her) you forgot she was there. “Yep! I just hopped right into her diaper and joined the party!”

“It was probably the strangest feeling Ah’d ever felt in my life... Havin’ two ponies goin’ at the same time in the same diaper, the humiliation of gettin’ caught, the thrill of knowin’ we could get caught again... It was liking takin’ a bite into an orgasmic apple pie of some kind!”

What a strange similie. But you understand; You’ve been denying it the whole time, but going with Pinkie did feel pretty satisfying. Applejack walking in on you two only made things more exciting, the embarrassment of getting caught awakening a part of the masochist inside of you.

“Well,” Applejack starts, “since Pinkie’s decided to go right here, right now, Ah guess Ah should go too.” She looks at you, stroking her chin before nodding.

“Actually...”
1221212.title: A Bushel-Sized Surprise

choices: ...did anypony notice the filly starin’ at us in the doorway?”
...Ah think we’re stuck in this thing!”
12212121.content:
The very thought of tripling up with Applejack excites you, and your body automatically responds to her suggestion with a powerful fart that blows that slop in your diaper up Pinkie’s belly. You blush and apologize, but she just wipes it back inside while giggling.

“Guess that’s a yes!” she squeals. “C’mon in AJ! The diaper’s fine!”

She reaches in front of you and pushes out the straps on the miraculously stretchy garment. Looking down, you’re amazed by the mushy mix of manure and pony pee which melts together into a spectrum of browns. The smell is even more interesting as the stench of your’s and Pinkie’s poop is released like a mushroom cloud.

“Gee... Ah don’t know if Ah’ll fit, bein’ such a broad pony an’ all,’ Applejack says, “but there’s only one way to find out!”

With that, she positions herself in front of you, placing her hind legs through the tight leg holes. You can hear her insides gurgling as she slowly sinks into the mess; How long has she been holding in? With a squelch and a sigh, she begins to make herself comfortable while looking back at you and Pinkie.

“Hold on to yer hats girls, this one’s gonna be miiighty messy!”

Pinkie hugs your body and winks at you, and you take this as a cue to do the same with Applejack. A few silent moments pass before she begins to grunt, and you feel her piping hot manure pressing against your crotch. You look down to see it beginning to flood around the diaper, which you can feel being lifted from the floor. The smell is intense too, cutting through the powerful odor you and Pinkie created together, and her volume is impressive as well; You didn’t anticipate the speed of her messing, and she shows no signs of stopping.

“This is... grunt... where it gets... grunts... intense!”

Suddenly, the flow increases at an alarming rate, the diaper expanding to a ridiculous size to about the same size as the three ponies inside of it! You see Applejack twisting her face as she releases several blasting farts which send chunks of her manure up her back and your belly, and the flow steadily decreases afterwards. Finally, she finishes her business by peeing, the warm piss flowing around your waists.

“An’ that’s how you fill a diaper ladies,” she remarks, tipping her hat at you and Pinkie.

“Oh my gosh oh my gosh oh my gosh Applejack!” Pinkie yells. “That was so amazing! Greatest party ever!”

“I have to admit, that was pretty good,” you say, “but I think we should clean ourselves up now.”

Applejack shifts herself forwards, managing to stand. Unexpectedly, you and Pinkie roll upwards with her, the contents of the diaper beginning to leak onto the infirmary floor. The three of you blush as you all see the diaper dragging you down with Pinkie stacked on you and you stacked on Applejack. You’re amazed at how she can support the weight of two fully grown ponies and a ton of manure.

But something else is bothering you, and Applejack has noticed it too.

“Ah’m not sure how to say this girls, but...
12212121.title: Three’s Company

choices: ... 'mud' wrestle her into submission and pull a nasty finisher
... just walk away, you're done with this!
122122.content:
"...And then I said, 'Oatmeal, are you crazy? Bran muffins are much better laxatives!' And I guess I showed them, eh Orange Jubilee?"

You nod, weakly. The amount of waste leaving your system and the thick odor that's built up in the small room has made you too lightheaded to talk. You grunt and squeeze one last time, but much to your surprise nothing comes out. Neither a fart nor a log of manure. Even your pissing has stopped completely. At least one good thing came out of all this nonsense, you managed to flood out your bowels and take care of your constipation. Despite the smell and the pushing, when all was said and done you have to admit it was kind of relaxing in a sick and twisted way.

"Hey Pooper," Pinkie Pie says as she shifts in her mess to turn and look at you, "You all finished? Because I'm done too! Where's the toilet paper at? And now I think about it we're gonna need some foal powder for our heiny rashes and a couple of lollipops for being such great patients!"

You felt like saying something snarky, but you don't get the chance because right then something like the sound of tearing tissue paper and plastic bags filled the room. You freeze up, terrified, and glance down at the diaper. The seams on both sides are beginning to give way and your immense pile of pony droppings is beginning to spill out. You gulp.

Pinkie Pie, nearly oblivious to the situation, chimes in with "Hey, did you hear somethi-woaaaah!"

The side of the diaper tears apart and hot mess spills out onto the tiled floor of the examination room. The squishy manure is unable to support either of your weights and you both sink inward before sliding through the shit and onto the floor. You can't believe this is happening, you're lying face down in a puddle of piss and shit, and half of it's not even yours! A bouquet of foul scents assaults your nose as you pull yourself out of the mess to breathe. A quick glance around the room and all you can see is shit smeared everywhere. But you can't seem to see that Pinkie Pie any-

"Weeeee!"

Pinkie leaps onto you and tackles you to the floor. You end up with you face back in the muck as she playfully dunks your head in and out of the ruddy, brown mess. You struggled for a second, but you manage to pull one over on her and reverse her hold so she's laying in the mess, but she doesn't care, she's laughing too much. Pinkie dips her head to the side and scoops up some mushy scat in her mouth, chews it for a bit and then spits the brown goop into your face, blinding and disgusting you. And just like that Pinkie's got the upper hand again. But this time she opts for a more humiliating maneuver.

"I hope your hungry!" She giggles and scoops up a hoof full of scat. You struggle, and manage to keep your mouth closed, but she still smears the poop all over your lips and cheeks. That's it, that was the final straw. You borrow a page from her book and lick the scat off your cheeks, spitting a wad of it back. This time, however, Pinkie is laughing and catches the muck in her throat. While she chokes, you reverse and wind up on top so you can...
122122.title: Flood Warning

choices: "Sure, just check in the cabinet"
"I'll give you a diaper...on one condition..."
12213.content:
While the pink pony blabbers on, you try to quietly relieve yourself. Giving a little push, you can feel your privates growing warm as a strong stream of urine trickles into your diaper. The front of the garment becomes puffy, and sags as it fills with your pee.

"Mango Sunrise? Wait, maybe it's-" Suddenly, Pinkie stops talking.

The two of you stand there in the relative silence, the only noise being the hissing of your peeing. You briefly wonder just how much you drank to yield this much urine. Though you find the pink pony's pause rather refreshing, you find yourself a bit concerned. "Is...something wrong, Pinkie?"

“Um…” suddenly, a gurgle emanates from the other mare's belly. “Oh yeah!” she perks up. “I’ve had this really bad tummy ache. It all started at this super-cool party I threw a couple of days ago. Oh, you should’ve been there! There was cake, and ice cream, and candy, and soda, and all kinds of goodies! I must've eaten-"

"Pinkie, focus," you politely tell her. By now you can feel your bladder finally finish emptying. Now the front and bottom of your diaper is very heavy and squishy with pee, in addition to all of the manure still in it. Briefly looking down, you can see the front of your diaper is a pale yellow color. You look back up as Pinkie continues talking.

"Oopsie, sorry. Anyway, I've been feeling all bloaty and crampy and-" Pinkie seems to finally notice what you've been doing. "Is that a diaper? Ohmygosh, I gotta go to the bathroom so badly! Where did you get those? Can I have one?" She resumes bouncing around, though you can't tell whether it's due to excitement or urgency at this point. What's your response?
12213.title: Taking care of business

choices: Get the diaper back, if you wait another second you'll blow!
You told her she could have it, you'll just have to find somewhere else to go.
122131.content:
The pink pony practically is over at the Cabinet before you can even blink, taking out the last diaper. Another moment more, and she has it wrapped around her flank.

As soon as the diaper is on her, Pinkie squats down on the floor and begins to push. You feel a little awkward with having to watch, but then again, you did invite her to take the last one.

...Wait. The last one? Oh no. Oh no no no. You are not empty. You are far from empty. Another rumble from the deepest parts of your bowels confirms this, and you clutch your stomach as you try to hold back. Your diaper is too full! It can't contain the mess if you let it out!

Panic strikes you, and just as you grow weak, you notice Pinkie is having a little trouble getting started. She hasn't messed her diaper yet, maybe there is a chance for you to get it back before she uses it! If she's having a hard time getting it out, than she can surly wait to find another place, right? Then again, you did tell her she could use it, and she might not make it if you take it back.

Another sharp pain erupts in your gut, and you double over in pain. Your body wouldn't last much longer, you had to make a choice NOW.

You feel the strange and curious desire to watch some one else......use a diaper.
"I want you to lie down with your plot facing me while you relieve yourself"

Pinkie complies. "Well.....not sure why but, Okie Dokie Lokie, Orange Soda! I just wanna get my tummy to stop being bumbly" Pinkie hastily grabs the diaper and lies down. She slides the diaper under her rump and tapes it up, making sure it's snug, despite that she's desperate to void her bowels. She lifts her hind legs up slowly and involuntarily sends a whiff of gas in your direction as she does so.

It smelled slightly sweet....

Pinkie gives you a look of sadness soon after she had begun grunting.. "Um....Orange Meringue....I can't go...."

1221321.title: Bogged down

choices: encourage her to fart some more
try to get her to poop
1221322.content:
"sorry....i'm really nervous" she said after a minuet of trying to go,
looking at her face you understood her predicament, doing something like this alone was one thing but doing it with somepony else who was watching your every move was entirely different

you decided to take small steps to build up her confidence, looking at her you say "pinkie...i want you to take deep breaths and concentration on your breathing..just relax"

pinkie did just that and her breaths became longer and calmer, "ok now come over slowly and just relax your butt on my face" pinkie slowly backed up so her padded butt was near your face allowing you to get a closer look at it, the padding was pulled in between her flanks from when she was laying down allowing you to make them out,
around her cutie mark area there was the slight tint of foal powder around the leg holes.

slowly pinkie lowered her butt down onto your face, your vision was slowly covered in white as pinkie slid your snout beneath her butt checks before letting out a sigh
