Gazing into the mirror you find your once-pony body has been dissolved into a lump of jiggling orange Jell-O. The only features that remain of your previous body are your large, beautiful eyes, and your mane, which is sticking out of your perfectly cubicle body. You're nothing more than a little, insignificant cube. A Gelatinous Cube.

This can't go on. You shuffle forward again, desperately trying to find Twilight, when you hear the distant sound of slurping. You follow it, and find Twilight, showing down on the contents of her fridge and simultaneously using her magic to scratch her smelly ass with the binding of a book. She belches again, and digs deeper into the fridge, finding a banana. She sniffs it, but it apparently doesn't meet her minimum fat percentage, and she tosses it aside.

Meanwhile, you're trying to communicate with her, managing only a burble. Then, the banana Twilight tossed away lands smack in the side of your cubic body. Your eyes grow wide, it was as if you had just gotten your vagina stuffed with the fruit. Sweet Celestia, your whole body is an orifice. The possibilities, oh my gosh the possibilities. You could take anything, EVERYTHING if you tried. Your whole body was made for penetrating! You, you-

No, what are you doing? You've become a slime, a literal piece of scum! You need to become your normal form, you need to get Twilight and yourself back to normal. This whole thing is perverse and wro-

You shudder as you feel the banana slip a little further into your slimy body. Maybe this might be a harder decision than you thought...
141211.title: Getting gooey

choices: Get out of Twilight!
Let nature run its course...
1412111.content:
No, there's absolutely no way you can go about pursuing filthy lusts while you're in the state of scum. You need to get back to normal and Twilight is the best damn bet you've got. You try to slide your way up to her, ignoring the banana stimulating your senses, and start burbling and shaking to try and get her to notice you. Unfortunately, she does.

"Wuzzat?" Twilight turns, shaking her enlarged posterior as she does, "Oooh, look at that." She raises a hoof to her mouth and calls, "Spike! Hey Spike! Is this orange jello for anyone? No? Good!"

She doesn't waste any time taking a large bite out of you, ignoring your panicked gurgling as part of you slides down her gullet. Mother of Celestia, you felt that happen. This is maddening, you need to get away, you need to flee! You try to squirm away, but she quickly scoops you up in her hooves and starts slurping at your gelatinous form. She's so hungry that she couldn't care less if you're alive or not.

"C'mere you, stupid piece of jellurp" Twilight belches, and her nasty breath actually manages to make a living puddle of slime disgusted. You don't have much time to think about it, though, because soon enough the slobbish nerd manages to slurp down the rest of you easily. You feel yourself slide over her tongue and past her tonsils. You actually really enjoy sliding around her esophagus. As bizarre as it is, the feeling of her internal muscles massaging your gelatinous form is strangely delightful. Not to mention you've still got that banana stuck inside of you. down into her stinking stomach and a pool of scalding belly acids.

You want to scream, but strangely enough the stomach acid doesn't hurt (besides, you have no mouth with which to scream). It's sort of nice and warming. You really like it, actually. Being in here almost makes you forget that you're a piece of slime that was swallowed by a pony. Almost like you want to stay here and melt inside of Twilight...

But, you can't. You need to escape!
1412111.title: Gulp!

choices: You turn back to normal
You change back to normal... Well not really
14121111.content: You feel sorry for your about to do as you soon find that you can absorb the liquids and undigested food to grow bigger you then start ripping through her body like tissue paper you look at twilights body she is now dead you ripped her into pieces but hey she had it coming you starts to make it to the door when a you start to feel weird
14121111.title: Get out of Twilight!

14121112.content:
You sit there as the last bits of you are consumed by your only friend in Ponyville. It stings, but somehow her belly acifs lull you into a form of sleep as Gloucester are slowly dissolved into oblivion. But it's strange.. there's no flash of light or life scrolling itself out as you die like in the movies... you shrug it off, and allow yourself too fall unconscious.

Of is several hours before the potions wear off, but by then its already to late. In horror of the realization of what she did, Twilight Sparkle threw out the remaining samples of the two potions before running back inside, sobbing her heart out. Spike enters her room, and tries to comfort her.. but it looks like nothing short of a memory-clearing sleep or time will be able to heal these invisible wounds. And somewhere, somehow you wish you could tell her to calm down, because your death had been painless and peaceful....

~END~
14121112.title: Let nature run its course...

choices: Teach this dragon a lesson!
Chow down on some jelly!
141212.content:
Though you feel like you're going to regret it, you chose the smellier potion. You just can't trust the other one, it's viscosity was too much for you to even think of swallowing. You slurp down the thin brew, holding your nose to so the smell doesn't make you vomit. Once you down it, Twilight does the same, and pulls out a small notepad.

"It's for writing down our observations, that way we have a good reference on these potions," She says, "I could lend you one if you'd like."

You shake your head, "No, I'm fine."

You couldn't bother yourself with writing notes anyway, especially considering that strangely strong itch you've got going on underneath your tail. You scoo back a bit and notice there's an end table nearby, right at the perfect level to give yourself a scratch. You poke your tush out and the corner of the table sticks right between your crack, hitting the itch. Your tongue lolls as you fervently scratch that stubborn itch, moving the table corner right over your ponyhole.

Just as the hard wood jabs your pucker, you realize just how rude you're being to your host Twilight. You're rubbing you ass against her furniture for Discord's sake! You open your mouth to apologize, but before you can speak you see that Twilight is gone, and there's only a purple sticky splotch on the table that she was standing at. You only ponder her fate for a second, because there are much more pressing matters at hoof.

For one, you're stifling in this heat. You're sweating your tail off, literally dripping with the oniony, reeking smell of pony B.O! You lift your hoof up and smell your legpit. The stench wafting off it withers a nearby hanging plant, and makes you gag. At least, at first it does. You're enticed to sniff again, and find it pungeantly pleasant. Of course, you can't sit here smelling your odorific self all day, you feel like you could eat a horse!

But you suppose that your new friend's refrigerator will have to do. You head into the kitchen, cutting playful(yet rancid) farts as you go, further contaminating the air of Twilight's library. With a flick of your hoof, you sling open the fridge shove your head inside to scarf up its contents. She doesn't really have any full meals in there, but you're so famished you couldn't possibly care that you're just eating leftovers and raw ingredients, all the while releasing burps so foul someone might mistake them for your backwind.

"Hey! What are you doing?" You turn around and find a tiny dragon admonishing you, "That's not your fridge, in fact I don't think I've ever seen you before? Are you some kind of th-Urgh!"

Her backs up, the stench of your nasty body hits him like a wall, and he's forced to hold his nose to keep from losing his lunch. He's kinda cute, choking on your fumes and all. You don't particularly like this scaly punk messing up your binge though, perhaps you'll need to show him who's boss around here. You could easily hold him down and-

Burbleburble

You look down at your hooves. Some sort of weird gelatin is sitting at your hooves. Maybe if you weren't so blinded by that potion you'd notice it had Twilight's mane, horn, and eyes. But right now you can't help but notice that this bitty blob of jelly looks especially delicious. You lick you lips hungrily, deciding which of these problems to address first...
141212.title: Simply Slobbish

choices: Finish him!
Mercy?
1412121.content:
No, no as delicious as that purple pile of Twilight Jelly looks, this pipsqueak dragon is really cramping your style. He starts getting up in your face again about eating from his mistress's fridge or whatever the hell he's talking about.

"I mean seriously dude, what do you think you're doing here? And where's Twilight anyway? Are you even listening to me-?"

You decide to shut him up by sticking your sweaty hoof right into his mouth, coating his tongue with the rancid taste of your sweaty underhoof. The poor dragon reels back and starts coughing from the taste.

"Ah! What the hay? That's just disgusting, I mean really! What the hay!"

"Hee hee, stupid lil' scalything." You jab him in the belly, "I'm large and in charge. So if you don't like it you can kiss my crack!" It would seem your voice has also gotten a bit more slimy and crude too, just to match your nasty body.

"Kiss your- That's sick!" Spike retorts, "You get out of here, you stinking mare! I mean really, who the heck do you think you are?"

You respond by leaning back and gathering up some phlegm in the back of your throat. Then, in what has to be the nastiest thing you've done all day, you hock a big, gummy loogie right into Spike's face. The dragon shrieks like a little girl and leaps backward. He starts pawing at his own face to try and wipe your nasty snot-and-spit mixture off his face, but the best he can do is smear it around and work it into his own scales like a foul lotion.

"That's it! I've had enough! Now I'm gonna, I'm gonna..." Spike has a surge of genius, "I'm gonna send you to Celestia! We'll see how your smug attitude and stinkiness goes over with the princess of Equestria!"

The little purple dragon leans back and inhales, preparing the green firespray that will transport you over to Canterlot, Celestia's throne room to be precise. Of course, two can play at that game! You inhale too, swallowing some spittle and your own bad breath. Spike freezes up when he hears your stomach grumbling. You lunge forward and roar out a thunderous belch right into Spike's awaiting mouth.

Bleeeeeeeeeuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuurp!

Poor Spike can only stand there, awestruck, as you fire off a twelve-second belch that visibly shakes the young boy to his core. When your guts finally settle down you smile proudly and survey the damage you dealt with your incredible eructation. Spike wobbles back and forth, the combination of half-digested veggie dogs and garlic salad is like a nerve gas to the unprepared dragon, not to mention you had fired it off right into his mouth. He's tasting the awful stink just as much as he's smelling it!

Finally, Spike's knees give out underneath him and he tumbles to the ground. He can only lay there, mouth wide open and nostrils flaring. He's taking quite the olfactory trouncing, but maybe you could one up this? Hmm. Aha! This would be the most disgusting act of your life! With Spike laying prone before you, you dip one hoof into the opposite legpit. You dig around in the moist, dank pit between your leg and get your hoof nice and covered in your most vile sweat.

"You're gonna love this pipsqueak, you're in for a real treat." You pull your hoof out, it's now soaked in your awful pit sweat. You hang it over his head, but you hesitate. This is torture you wouldn't wish on a manticore, can you really perform this most vile of acts on a dragon whose only crime was annoying you?
1412121.title: Fight fire with gas!

choices: "Yeah, it looked grape flavored! Yummy!"
"The what now? I'm just gonna go crash someone's house."
14121211.content:
No mercy.

You admire your stinking hoof for just a moment, it's glisten with fresh, pungent pony-sweat. My gosh, Spike is not going to like this in the least, but I guess that's the point. You reach and then shove forward, stuffing your sweat-soaked hoof into Spike's mouth. This is the closest thing Spike will get to suckling sweat directly out of your sweaty pit. Although, if he survives this you might have to make him do just that. It doesn't look like it'll come to that though, your sweat is already reeking havoc on his tastebuds already.

Poor thing kicks and screams in disgust, but you're far too big and can keep him comfortably pinned under one hoof all day. You decide to step it up a notch and start pushing your hoof in and out, basically fisting his throat with your filthy hoof. His struggling grows weak, and you pull out. The little dragon doesn't even try to escape while he has the chance. Your odors and tastes have left Spike completely beaten.

"Ugggh.." Looks like he's still conscious, you'll have to fix that. Hmm, if the taste of your greasy legpit sweat didn't knock him out, you'll have to resort to gas warfare. He's not going anywhere, so you take your time positioning your rear over his head. Spike's mind was so clouded by disgust that he doesn't realize what you're doing until it's too late. The dragon's screams are muffled by your sweaty crack.

"Mm, hope you're ready for the big bang pipsqueak!" You taunt him, rubbing his face between your cheeks a little. He starts kicking and struggling, but your size once again keeps him in place. Your stomach lets out a low rumble and the pipsqueak beneath you is paralyzed with fear.

"Fire in the hole!"

Your pucker pops open with a heavy, wet BLAT that is followed by a lengthy fart that sputters and pops against your scaly prisoner's face and flows into his nostrils. You're lucky you can't smell it from your position, the gas smelled of all those raw ingredients you scarfed down earlier. Digested daisies, alfalfa and garlic bulbs are just a few of the musky veggies that part from your digestive track and into the kid dragon's lungs. If Spike wasn't disgusted before, he certainly is now. Your fetid flatulence continues for at least a minute, and even then you're able to push out one last squeaker as the cherry on top. You don't even bother to check your victim when you get up, he's out like a light. You catch a whiff of your atrocious emissions and giggle

You know, all that farting left you particularly hungry and the delicious smell of farts is only making you hungrier. You honestly doubt there's a single morsel left in that unicorn's fridge. Maybe you could barge into somepony else's home and munch on their meal? Then again, there was that tasty looking jelly squirming around here. You remember that thing, right?
14121211.title: Fartality

choices: It suddenly morphs into a familiar face and stopping you from eating!
You gobble it up. It was delicious, but afterwords you feel very strange.
141212111.content:
You were almost ready to leave when you noticed it again. There on the ground was that strange purple jelly from right before you started consuming everything in the fridge. It looked delicious for some reason. Maybe it was just because you were so desperate for something to eat anything looked good. Plus it looked grapes flavored, one of your favorite flavors. Of course the potion did alter your taste buds, so now almost anything was your favorite flavor.

Soon you close in on the jelly ready to devour it and hopefully fill the bottomless pit your stomach had become. The jelly was still conscious though and it knew what you did to Spike and what you were about to do. It shook in fear as your mouth and hooves got closer to it. The jelly once know as Twilight Sparkle tried to say something, but alas, with no mouth she could no longer communicate. She was trying desperately to find a way to stop you before it's too late. She kept trying to think of someway to save herself from the hungry smelly pony she just met.

Once you are close to the jelly...
141212111.title: Twilight for dessert?

choices: Getting bigger!
Turning purple!
1412121112.content:
You wrap your lips around the jelly and quickly suck it down, not even bothering to savor it. The blob jiggles as it goes down, almost as if it's trying to get away, but you don't notice. You belch and look for somewhere to sit and digest your meal. Plopping down in one of Twilight's best armchairs, you release a rank wet fart that would forever stain the seat brown.

"Ah, this is the *URP* life," You say, patting your churning belly contently. Something feels strange, though. You look down and see that you're...
1412121112.title: You gobble it up. It was delicious, but afterwo...

choices: You give in and become Twilight
You manage to fight and save your mind
14121211122.content:
Looking down at your hooves, you see that your fur is covered in something purple, and wiping them on the carpet doesn't do much. Lifting one up to taste it, you notice the purple is spreading up your legs and across your torso.
I'm alive Twilight's voice rings out in your mind, I'm alive!

"Yeah?" You grumble, trying to rub the purple from your belly with a dirty towel, "So? Can ya stop makin' me purple? It's, like, the worst color."

I... I'll forget you just said that. But no, I'm sorry, I can't stop this.

"Well why not?"

When you digest something, it becomes part of you. When you digest a living pony, with as much magic as myself... Twilight sighs nonverbally, I'm afraid you're becoming me.

"Wait, what?" You shout, realizing what's happening.

"I'm sorry!" Twilight shouts, wrenching control of your mouth away from you, "But I have to live! For my friends! For Equestria!"
14121211122.title: Turning purple!

choices: Sugarcube Corner
Her house
141212112.content:
Scratching your belly, you wonder for a moment about slime, before immediately wondering why you wondered about that. The answer comes almost immediately, in the form of a massive yawn. Yes indeed, you have been awake for-You glance at the clock, taking a moment to understand it- Going on six hours now! No wonder you're having such strange thoughts!

You stumble out of the library, squinting your eyes against the early afternoon sun. The world comes into focus, and the multicolor blur before you transforms into people bustling about the town, busy doing something-or-other you don't particularly care about. Somewhere around here there must be a kindhearted pony willing to take in a stranger.

"Uhm, excuse me?" Comes a squeaky voice at your hooves. Looking down, you see a white unicorn filly carrying a book on her back. What book? Who cares, you're too tired and hungry to read. "Is the library open? Can I see Twilight?"

You chuckle in response. "Library's closed, kiddo."

"Oh..." She looks down dejectedly, "But this book is due back today!"

Suddenly, an idea comes to your slow mind. "Tell you what, kid, you find me some grub and a place to crash, and I'll make sure your book gets returned."

Her face lights up and she starts babbling. "Well, there's Sugarcube Corner! It's a really nice sweet shop down over there!" She points off in some direction, you don't really pay attention. All you know is that you're hella hungry, and your stomach growls loudly to support this.
"Or," she begins, hesitating before continuing, "You could come to my house. My sister Rarity is the most generous pony in Equestria!"

Where do you go?
141212112.title: "The what now? I'm just gonna go crash ...

1412122.content:
There is a lingering feeling in the back of your suddenly slobbish mind, that maybe, just maybe, you shouldn't be munching on a cube of jelly you found mysteriously appearing at your feet. Especially if you found it on the floor of the home of a unicorn who especially enjoys both magical and scientific experiments. But, that potion has marred any thought in your mind not related to eating, farting or belching.

You lean down to the cube and suckle one corner of it, slurping up the thick, rubbery sludge. It tastes delicious, and seems to fizz as it travels down your gullet. In just mere moments, you've gulped down the entirety of the jelly, leaving nothing but a few strands of hair that were sticking out of it. You burp loudly, and a few bright sparkles blow out your mouth. You giggle and hold a hoof to your mouth, faking modesty.

You make to turn back towards the fridge, but you never quite make it, instead you are pulled to the floor by a sudden gripping pain in your stomach. You grunt and squeeze your abdominal muscles, trying to force out whatever is inside of you. You belch, then you feel bile rising up in your throat. You puke, but that doesn't end it. You puke again, and a third time. The fourth, there is literally no stomach fluids left, and you look down to find you have upchucked a mouthful of blood.

Had you been thinking straight, you would have realized that slime was Twilight Sparkle. Her potion had morphed her into a gelatinous cube, which as any right adventurer would know is strongly acidic. You probably would have known that as well, had you not been so dumbed-down by your potion of Slobbishness. But now it's far too late to worry about what you could have done, because Twilight is alive and angrily digesting you from the inside out.

Spike is forced to watch in abject horror as you puke up more blood, the only thing your body can think to do. Eventually you start feeling lightheaded, though the agonizing pain in your stomach doesn't waver. You try to scream, but you can only make a gurgling noise. Your mouth is overflowing with blood. You writhe on the ground for only a bit longer, the pain blinding you to the outside world. Then, you are gone. The last thing you manage to do is blow one last foul fart out of your anus.

Eventually Twilight burst from your belly, coated in blood. In her jelly form she managed to procure a spell to return to her normal form, but the experience was so traumatic that both she and Spike agree to hide your remains and never speak again of their brief friendship with you.
1412122.title: Gluttony is a sin, you know.

choices: It worked! You grew! ... alot actually..
Those lines Spike ruined were important! You shrank!
14122.content:
".. I found an old book called under the library with a bunch of exciting new spells that I'd never seen before! I wanted to try a few of them but everyone has been busy lately, and Spike.. well.. he is a little superstitious of old magic after all that Poison Joke." Twilight explained, pausing to polish off her own wheatjuice before magically discarding the cup and turning, guiding you over to a table covered in a sprawl of parchment and papers.

"You see it works to increase a pony's mass by increasing their..." she begins to explain, although being neither a magic user nor experimental magic buff, you feel your eyes quickly wandering to the table behind her. Various equations, symbols, scribbles sprawl along it perking your interest, even if you can hardly make sense of them. In the center of it all is an old tome propped up like the apex of some shrine, with it's worn, yellowed pages displaying a wealth of knowledge and diagrams in a language you have never seen. The creepiness of it however, does not effect Twilight at all - and her infectious enthusiam soon takes root in you as well.

"And that is how it works! - so what do you say?" Twilight smiles hopefully.

"Sure! I'm really curious to see if it works!" You nod,

"Excellent! Follow me!" Twilight leads you downstairs to the root-roofed cellar of the library where she has various pieces of machinery and equipment stowed away. The distant whoosh and hum of a few instruments making you all the more curious as to their purpose. You make a note to ask the unicorn about them later, when Twilight reveals the real spectacle ; a great circle drawn with blue chalk, sporting a pony-sized center and various symbols reminscent of star-signs and constellations around it. A few dragon footprints are the only thing that mar it - obscuring a line or two from Spike's flight. It must have taken ages to draw.

"Just stand here," Twilight indicates with her horn, as you cautiously trot there, careful not to step on any lines as you look up,

"Alright! Now just stay still for me.." she nods, stepping back and focusing; her horn glowing a radiant display of purples and violets, and the circle does as well, crackling with energy as you swallow nervously. Although before you can voice any concerns, there is a sudden flash and surge of magic that fills you and -
14122.title: Sizing up the situation

choices: ... am feeling famished! I'm gonna need some serious  snacks here!"
... have the worst itch! Would you mind getting up here and giving me a scratch?
141221.content:
There is an intense feeling inside you, a swelling of energy that feels like a cross between a sugar rush and an electric shock. The energy pulses outward into your hooves and tail, making your mane stand on end and your cheeks flush. You suddenly feel quite light-headed, and take in a deep breath. A breath that lasts much longer than you realize.There is a light thud against your scalp, but whatever you've hit quickly gives way with a creak and a snap, feeling no harder than a piece of styrofoam.

Finally, the bright flare of light passes from your eyes, and you can see the bright blue sky again. Wait... The bright blue sky? You were inside the library minutes ago!

"It works! Sweet Celestia it works!" you hear a tiny voice, Twilight's, below you. You look down and see the leafy tops of the library tree, then it hits you. From your sitting position, you're easily head and shoulders above the library, literally! A quick glance around your surroundings proves that you're taller than most of the buildings in Ponyville!

"Peachie! It worked perfectly!" Twilight cheers again. You try to adjust your legs to see her better, but you end up pushing your soft sole up against her, smooshing her gently against the wall. She lets out a pained squeak, and you quickly withdraw. You readjust your self, putting your massive legs on either side of Twilight.

"There," you say, "Not squishing you, am I?"

Twilight doesn't respond. You glance down at her, and she seems to be staring at something, but from your angle you can't see what it is. In fact, from above it seems she's looking right between your... Oh my. You just unwittingly spread your massive legs to her, revealing your womanhood in full. You very quickly bring your knees up to your chest to keep her from staring any longer, blushing heavily.

"I, I think maybe I'll just step outside," you say, nervously. Then you step out and over the library, taking special care not to knock your knees on any nearby buildings or, Celestia forbid, step on a fellow pony. Twilight follows you out, opting to use the front door instead. A small crowd of ponies is beginning to gather around you, making you feel quite nervous at how they might be staring at you.

"Well!" Twilight says, still blushing from before, " I guess we can call that spell a smashing success, right Peachy?"

You nod slowly, stirring up a small breeze, "Yes. All according to plan. Now let's shrink me back down so we can keep testing those spells of yours."

"Um, well you see, that's the thing," Twilight says.

You cut her off, saying exactly what you know she's going to, "You can't change me back."

"Not immediately," Twilight says, feeling quite bashful, she adds in, "But it can be done! You remember that circle we had drawn on the floor? Well, as I mentioned, it uses complex runes and geometries to perform the incantation, but it was smeared by your hooves when you grew. Even with magic it'll take me the better part of a day to redraw. I'm so earnestly sorry."

You give a warm smile, sensing honesty in Twilight's apology, "I suppose it's fine, Twilight. No harm done, and I DID volunteer."

"Is there anything I could do for you to make this enlargement comfortable? I mean, that size must take some getting used to. Perhaps you'd need some nutrition to supplement your large belly? Or maybe the spell has caused some skin irritation, the book did mention that might happen."

"Well," You say, "I...
141221.title: One pony, exta-large!

choices: Sit down and trap him in your rear!
Let the poor dragon go, he's done enough.
1412212.content:
You feel a bit awkward asking, but you really need some help, and your hooves, even if they are giant, can't reach your lower back. Twilight reassures you that you that she'll be right back, saying something about having to pick up a few 'necessary items' as she trots off towards town. She's so helpful for such a nerdy mare.

Though you wish she'd hurry up with whatever she's picking up, your back is killing you. You contemplate sitting down, but given your track record you'd probably squash someone under your big, puffy rear. While you're waiting though, you have a great idea, or at least you think it was a great idea. You lean up against the library, letting those branches scratch up against your back. It seems perfect, until you hear a distinct creaking, and pull away in shock. You nearly tore the tree up by its roots! You quickly reach around the other side and push it back into place, right before Twilight returns too!

She's got Spike, tied up like cattle, "He was hiding in Applejack's barn, but she found him and wrapped him up nicely for us. Now Spike, you're gonna help our friend scratch her itch."

Spike has no idea what that means, but he certainly doesn't like the idea of being tied up with a giant pony, "Aw come on, Twilight," He pleads, "Why do I have to do it? Why not Rainbow Dash or Fluttershy?"

"Well, you were supposed to take her place, but you were a big chicken and she volunteered for our little experiment in your stead. You owe her, Spike, and you're gonna pay Miss Peach back. No arguments."

He almost opens his mouth to argue, but he very quickly gives up any idea of escaping his obligations. Twilight unties his rope with a bit of magic, and then ties it around his waist. Then, with a bit more power, she hoists Spike up by the rope, leaving him hanging in the air beside you.

"Lean down, Peach, we'll tie Spike up so he doesn't fall."

"Or you could use one of your spells to give me wings!" Spike complains, and Twilight shakes her head,

"I don't have time for that, Spike, Peach is itchy now!"

You smile and nod your head, trying to keep from laughing. Twilight ties Spike's "Harness" to your ear, and then levitates Spike onto your back. You look back at him and say,

"Alright little guy, give me a good scratch, right where you're standing."

He looks over the side of your back, and realizes how high up he is. He starts trembling, and clings to your back on all fours, "W-what ev-ver you s-say, giant pony."

You feel him dig his claws into your back, and you're already feeling better.

"Lower!" You shout back.

"Lower, how am I-" He stifles his own question. He honestly just wants to get this over with, and overcomes his fear of heights to scuttle across your back, right on top of your itch. His claws are like magic, digging in and getting right to the source of your itch.

Hm, then again... you thought, Those folks in the park look like they're pretty close...I doubt they'd want somepony like me to intrude on their fun. Sighing resignedly, you turn away from the park's entrance, joining the large crowd traveling toward the town square. Many busy ponies surrounded you, all awkwardly pushing past each other to reach their destination; apparently, whatever was going on in the square was quite important.

Still hopeful to find a new friend, you carefully scanned the crowd, taking care not to look too obvious; among them, you could see a green unicorn accompanied by a white earth pony who seemed to practically hang off of her, a rather ditzy-looking pegasus with perpetually crossed eyes, a youthful orange colt wearing his mane in a mullet...none of them, however, caught your eye quite as much as the fellow off to the side did. To most, he probably would have seemed utterly unremarkable, with his drab, brown coat and spiky mane, but his hourglass-shaped cutie mark and piercing blue eyes seemed to send chills down your back just looking at them...

Wait, looking? Oh, no-- he's staring right at you! Stupid, stupid...now I must look like a total weirdo! you think to yourself, distraught. You quickly turn away, hoping to avoid any confrontation, but it's too late. He's already begun to advance toward you...you prepare yourself for the worst...

"Hullo!"

You open your eyes; the strange colt is now right in front of you, and...smiling? "Um, I say...are you alright?"

"Uh, yes, yes, I'm great, thank you sir!" Smooth. Real smooth.

"Ah-heh...good to hear!" replied your impromptu contact, blushing a bit. "Er, listen, I was just heading out to the square to see what the big attraction was, and...do you wanna maybe go with me? Forgive me for saying so, since we just met and all, but there's just something I...rather like about you, that I can't quite put my hoof on..."

Naturally, you're quite taken aback by how forward he seems. In spite of it, though, you find yourself nodding anyway; after all, how often is it that a new pony actually wants to spend time with you, and without you even doing anything for them, at that? Besides, you had to admit, his soothing accent and polite demeanour are quite inviting, even if you still can't quite shake the feeling that there's something a little off about him. Soon enough, the two of you are happily trotting off to your destination, with your new friend trailing just behind you...somehow, the possibility of him staring doesn't bother you at all.

You find yourself staring into it, the shining light soothes you, and feels like it's enveloping you with its gentle warmth. You're drooling now, you can't help but look deeper into it. She has you utterly mesmerized, all you want to do is bask in the warmth of her bright horn. And then you feel a different warmth. One pooling in the back of your diaper. You've messed yourself. The realization hits you like a ton of bricks and pulls you out of your relaxed state.

You slam your rear down, but it makes an audible squelch when you do. That, combined with the atrocious stench of pony manure, make it a lost cause to try and hide your mess from your mistress. You blush and stare downward at your slowly filling diaper.

Trixie notices your shame and laughs, "Ohoho, has my number-one fan soiled herself? Then I suppose my Incantation of Incontinence worked perfectly. I can't wait to try it out on that Sparkle.."

She's muttering under her breath again, and rubbing her forehooves together menacingly. You truly hope that she's not plotting on what to do to you next. You feel your diaperfront grow moist, you've pissed yourself too. The combination of your own odors is making you sick. You desperately try to pull the diaper off, but you can't manipulate the straps with your hooves, and using your mouth is out of the question. Trixie looks at you, utterly helpless, and brings a hoof up to her mouth to stifle her laughter.

"Hmph, so pathetic. Do you want me to change you, my helpless little foal? That's a special diaper you know, immovable by anything save for unicorn magic."

You nod, to embarrassed to even think about asking her to change your filthy diaper. You feel like you want to cry.

"Oh, alright my dear, but there is just one condition." She says, and then whispers in your ear. Your eyes grow wide, you can't imagine why, but in order to get this diaper off you're going to have to do unspeakable things. But, if you want out you have no choice but to...
15221121.title: She takes control, you lose it.

152211211.content:
She can't possibly be serious, but the look on her face tells you that she is. You hear a rustling, Trixie has just levitated a small brown box from under her sheets. It slides in front of you. Trixie pushes it a bit closer to you with her hoof, just to drive home the point. You nearly cry just looking at that tiny brown parcel. You know exactly what's inside and it scares you too much to open it."

"Come now, take your present and put it on, or momma will get angry."

Trixie's voice manages to blend anger and arousal, and that scares you even more than the thought of modeling for her. You flip the lid open and stare down at the tiny, lacy, pink garments. They're so demeaning you wouldn't put your newborn foal in them. But you've hit rock bottom now, you just want to get this over with as quickly as possible. As you take the clothing out you hear a pop behind you. You look up just in time to see Trixie pour herself a glass from a bottle of high-class champagne. Her eye beckon you onward as her long-stemmed glass tips itself to her lips.

You swallow the last shred of your dignity and begin to slip on the little wool booties. Trixie makes sure to tie them tight around your ankles. Then you place the little pink smock around your midsection, it was embroidered as embarrassingly as possible: Trixie's little angel. That alone was enough to make you blush, but then Trixie pops a tiny bonnet with all the frills on top of you. And then, just when you couldn't be more mortified with the humiliation you're enduring just for a diaper change, Trixie shoves a pacifier in your mouth, completing the infantile look.

"Mm, fabulous. Trixie loves it." She remarks then pauses to sip from her champagne. She's resting her head on one hoof, sitting on her pillows like they're a throne, "Now model for me."

You stand, the padded booties and sagging diaper make it tough to keep balanced though. Trixie seems to be watching with great intent as you struggle to stand with your legs splayed like a filly learning to walk. She twirls her hoof in a circle. You take the hint and start turn around, slowly, for her. When you turn your messy rear towards her she holds the same hoof out, your signal to stop. She gestures upward and you start to arch your back to stick your diaper higher in the air. Your mistress stares into your squishy butt, enthralled by the sight. She takes another gulp of champagne, depleting her glass, and starts to pour herself another.

"Shake it, for Trixie." she commands, and you have no choice but to obey.

You start to wiggle your sagging padding back and forth. It's the most perverse use of the word you could imagine, but you manage to shake it just enough to appear sexy. Trixie starts to grow a lewd smile as she watches you. Though you're not sure if it's your dancing or the champagne.

"Now look over your shoulder and act surprised, like you didn't know Trixie was watching. And don't forget about that pacifier."

You imitate the pose, burning to ashes those shreds of dignity you had left. Every suckle of the pacifier makes you want to cry. To keep her happy, you stretch further so that your diaper is nearly on her lap, which earns you an encouraging slap on the behind. Her forwardness makes you yelp, nearly dropping your pacifier. You glance over your shoulder to look at Trixie. You can already see the blush on her blue face.

"Oh yesh.. Yer Trishie's big baby aren'tcha?"

You don't know how much of that bottle she's downed. You do know, however, that a drunken Trixie is going to cause a lot more trouble than a sober one, especially when you're counting on her to change your diaper. Trixie's hoof moves down you her crotch, massaging it with one hoof while she holds the wobbling glass steady with her other.

"Have a sheet, shish down in that big messhy diaper." She slurrs.

You hesitate. Though, with the liquor loosening her inhibitions, you doubt Trixie would tolerate lollygagging. You slowly squat down, the exertion causing you to squeeze out another load of dung into your huggies. The feeling of the warm pile squishing up against your butt nearly makes you retch as you ease into the mushy seat. You sit spread-legged, hoping to appear as alluring as possible for Trixie.

"Oh yeah.. Mmm, yesh, yesh! You nashty little *Hic* filly!"

A magic force yanks your pacifcer away and you suddenly miss it. You don't get much time to pine for it, because it's quickly replaced by the hard glass mouth of Trixie's champagne bottle. Her magic pulls your head back and forces you to chug, choking and gagging, on the flat alcohol until not a drop is left. Your lightheaded wooziness is quickly replaced by relief as your bladder forces out a deluge of urine into the front of your diaper.

"What the fuuu-" You shudder as the flow picks up, "Do I even have a stomach anymore, or does food just shoot straight through me now?"

"Shhaddap and get ba- *hic* back to p-posin'. I'm losin' my girlboner..."

You whimper and you give her a little pout, but that only arouses her more. Her hoof picks up the pace and soon the entire wagon is filled with the sound of her schlicking. She starts panting, giving you a good whiff of the champagne on her breath,

"Get, huff, get yer fashe in my cunt! Do iiit!" She shouts. You feel her unseen, magical hand force you down into her crotch as she uses your nose to finish off. Trixie belts out one last moan and splatters your face with a squirt of musky pleasure before collapsing in ecstasy. You slowly pull your face up, stretching the clear strands of cum that adhered to your face. You look up to your captor and read her emotions. She...
152211211.title: Messy Modeling

1522112111.content:
Trixie gives a weak smile, still caught in the pleasure of her orgasm. As you look at her pleadingly, she nods approvingly.

"Good filly." She sits up and reaches to tousle your mane affectionately. "Shush a good little filly."

You try to indicate your discomfort non-verbally, still afraid talking will anger her.

"Oh!" She blushes. "Shorry, baby. Mommy forgot all about yer little accshident. Up on the bed, shweetie!"

Though you find her maternal actions and speech a bit odd, you do as you're told- that diaper is getting really uncomfortable. As you lay on your back, you hear Trixie rummaging around. She returns with a fresh garment, a diaper pail, wipes, powder and a (slightly large) baby bottle.

She takes a deep breath and opens your diaper up swiftly, stopping only to note that your accident may not be so little after all. She then wipes you clean of your mess, and while this takes her a while ("Shuch a shtinker, yesh you are!") you find it to be a strangely enjoyable process. She then tosses the used diaper into the pail, sprinkles a lavish amount of powder on your bottom (and gives it a little pat) and puts the fresh diaper on you. "There, there. Now you're all nishe and warm, baby." She leans in and gives you a light peck on your cheek. You notice she didn't exhale- whether this was unintentional or she genuinely cared for your sense of smell you do not know.

"Mommy'sh going to take a nap now, and you should too." She magically lifts the bottle and brings it to your mouth. You let the nipple slip into your mouth and then hold the rest of it with your hooves. You give it a tentative suckle, and find the liquid to be milk- pleasantly warm, at that. You continue suckling as Trixie leaves your side, and gradually fall asleep...

When you awake, you find...
1522112111.title: ...is pleased! You've earned a fresh diaper!

15221121111.content:
Apparently Trixie had put your little bed under her wagon's window, because the warming glow of dawn against your face is the first thing you feel the next morning. You release the empty bottle you had been suckling on from your mouth and yawn, feeling just a little stiff from being curled up all night. You let the milk bottle tumble from your belly and onto the ground. You'd pick it up but you feel far too tired to put in the effort.

"Tixie! Ahm ahp tixie!" You feel like your mouth is full of spittle and your tongue is swollen, "Tixie? Tiiiixie!"

You cry out to Trixie, though you're not even sure why you think to call for her first. It's almost like you need her now. You her a stirring nearby. A pile of sheets shifts and your "mama" Trixie pokes her head out from underneath it. She regards you with a smile and walks over to you as she brushes the crumbs from her eyes. Her face is groggy, but she's happy just to see you.

"Aw, good morning sugardumpling. Did you sleep well?"

"Ah can..can't tak gewd." You know what you want to say, but your soft little mouth just won't cooperate with your mind.

Trixie giggles, and gives you a playful poke on the belly, "You're just a foal! You don't have to talk, Trixie will do all the talking for you."

"But, but ah.." Trixie cuts you off but shoving her face into your belly and blowing a raspberry. The ticklish feeling is too much for you to handle, "Eeeeeheee hee! Stahb! Stahbid! It teekahls! Staahahahaha! Tixie stahb!"

Finally Trixie releases her hold on your belly and instead plants her lips on your forehead. Her kiss seems to calm you down and soothe your mind.

"Trixie loves her little boo, you know that?" She says. You nod proudly in response.

"Is Trixie's angel hungry from all that diaper filling she did last night?"

You know, you didn't think of it up until now but you are strangely hungry. You could definitely go for something to eat right now, "Yah, ahm hungy. Ah! Ah!"

You point at your own mouth and Trixie laughs at your childish display, "Well snookums, if you want something to eat we could go right now. Wanna go with mama to the store? We'll get you some num-nums for your tum-tum!"

You smile, and stand up off your snuggly little bed. But, your legs are unusually wobbly. You buckle and fall back down. Your inability to stand makes you very upset. In fact, you feel like you're going to cry and you would have too. But your mama was there for you the moment you looked upset she was around you in a comforting hug.

"Aw, poor darling. Is Trixie's baby too tired to walk? It's okay! Okay! You're gonna stay here and Mama's gonna get you some delicious num-nums. Shh. Shh..."

She manages to calm you again. A little doll levitates over to you from a chest in the corner. Aw, it's a smarty pants doll! You had one of these when you were a kid! You snuggle it and fall back onto your warm pile of pillows to relax. What cares could you have? Trixie is taking care of everything. Your lovely mama gave you one more peck and left to fetch you some breakfast. Once alone, you fall into a peaceful sleep.
15221121111.title: Trixie's little angel

152211211111.content:
You wake up to the sound of a door closing, followed by hoofsteps in your direction. Lazily, you open your eyes and look up to see who has disturbed you from your slumber- and are pleased to see it's your Mama!

She appears equally glad to see you. “Hey there, sweetie! Did you have a nice nap?”

You're still too drowsy to answer, but you smile and nod.

“Mama didn't know what you liked, so she brought you some nice sweet applesauce. Trixie hopes you enjoy.”

You suddenly hear your stomach growling. It seems breakfast has arrived just in time. Your caretaker has also taken notice, and procured a large, adult-sized bib with the words, “Little Princess” embroidered on it. She places it around your neck gingerly and opens up the jar of applesauce. Then she stops with a confused look. “Something's wrong here... Oh!” She chuckles. “Silly Mama forgot the spoon!” She laughs again and you join in, giggling at your silly Mama.

The spoon is easily found and loaded with a heaping of mushy goodness. You lick your lips eagerly as Trixie brings the utensil to your mouth. A little bit of it dribbles onto your bib but you hardly notice. This goes on systematically until the whole jar has been depleted, and you are left satisfied. Trixie, meanwhile, is left quite amused. “My little foal is a messy eater, yes she is!” She pulls out a mirror and you look into it- there's an orange filly wearing a bib that is just covered in applesauce, not to mention her face! You grin. Then you giggle. And finally you break out into hysterical laughter.

Mama lets you finish and then wipes you clean with a handkerchief or five, then lets you rest in your bed again. As you lay quietly, you hear some rummaging from nearby. Trixie then returns with several brightly-colored toy blocks.

“Bwaks!” you squeal excitedly, and grab some. They are surely the most fascinating thing you've seen today, with some strange markings on them that somehow seem familiar Perhaps you understood them once...

“That's right, baby. Trixie thought you'd like them.”

You giggle senselessly and begin banging them against each other, seeing no other way of using them. The noise is funny, in a weird way, and makes you giggle even more, losing self-awareness. Before you know it, you find yourself in quite a predicament.

You need to go the bathroom. Urgently. And yet, you are wearing a diaper... Without giving it a second thought, you begin grunting and soon have your rump raised in the air as you push out your meal. The smell hits you and you chortle. “Poopies!” you exclaim.

Mama wrinkles her nose and walks over. “Did my widdle baby make stinkies in her diapee? I think she did!” She honks your nose, causing both of you to laugh. “Come on, let's get you changed before you get a nasty diaper rash. Mama wouldn't want that happening to her sweet little bunny!”

She changes your soiled garments as she did the other night, but this time the process seems much more routine, and much more fun. It's just because of your sweet, loving Mama though, it must be.

Having gotten you into a fresh, warm diaper, Trixie decides to...

get the fuck out of here this place is CRAZY!

"come on sweetums." trixie says sta"ring gingerly into your eyes."why don't we go to the park and have some fun". the park sounds like the greatest place in the world to you and you raise your arms in the air and start cheering

"pak, paak, yaaaeee" you fall on your back and giggle a little and trixie gives you a kiss on the fore head. she helps you down off the bed and you sit on the ground. you try standing up and fall a few times. trixie watches and dawws a bit. you finally manage to stand up on your own four hooves and start to waddle around everywhere. trixie opens the door and the two of you make your way to the park. she walks slowly so that you can keep up but you end up falling a few times and trixie is there to comfort you.

when you hit the center of town you and trixie get strange looks from other ponies. especially since your trixies height and wearing diapers and the same embarrassing outfit that she put you in last night. some people are a bit disgusted. but your too ocupied by everything else. it's like everything is new to you and that this is the first time you've ever seen the world. all you can do is stare at everything in awe. you start to wonder a bit and trixie tries to catch you. however befor she can catch up you run right into somebody and hit the ground and loose your wind. your mind goes blank and you snap back to reality.

"come on mow honey lets not cause a scene". she says putting her hoof around your shoulder trying to calm you down. she seems a bit worried. her eyes are darting around at all the other ponies who have started to stare. you see that they all have disgusted faces. you push her away again with more force this time. growing even more angry.you start to rip off the articles of clothing. you manage to bit the diaper and tear it off. luckily it was still fresh. you where a bit of a weird pony. generally so weak and timid, but when you got angry you where a force to be reckoned with and boy where you angry. trixie saw this as she was surprised that you could remove the diaper so easily.

'aw crap' you think to yourself. trixie looks back to you with a bloody nose and hate in her eyes.

"you should have left well enough alone and stayed in your place." before she can finish you off the giant red stallion that you had crashed into tackled trixie to the ground. he pins her down but she starts to levitate him off the ground. before she could hurt him though other ponies in the crowd that where watching. she cant fight them all and eventualy town guards arrive and seize her. one of the ponies comes over to where you where laying and watching(and bleeding) and helps you up.

you stare as the guards escort trixie to the dungeon. she starts screaming and flailing but the guards have her under control. you find your bearings and thank the pony next to you who had helped you. you shake yourself off and realize that you need to...
1522112111111.title: Dress you up and take you into town.

choices: "I can't let this happen! I have to save her!"
