15221121111112.content:
You have to step away from the scene for just a few seconds. Everything seemed to happen so fast; one minute, you were a baby in an adult’s body. The next, you had just sealed the fate of your ‘mother’.

But did she deserve that? Sure, she effectively held you hostage and humiliated you in front half of the town, but there was something else to this sordid practise. Something that made you feel safe and secure. Something that let the troubles of the world just melt away. With ‘Mama Trixie’, nothing else mattered but you and you alone. You loved your time with her, although maybe that was just the magic making you feel that way, and you’re certainly feeling guilty over her arrest, even though she did deserve it.

You approach one of the guards who is still surveying the scene and interviewing a pony who was watching you.

“Excuse me sir,” you ask, “but what’s going to happen to that pony now?”

The guard quickly turns around to face you. “Hmm? Oh, she’ll be at Princess Celestia’s mercy now, just like all criminals. She’ll probably be sentenced to her punishment at dawn tomorrow, if you want to see justice done.”

You quickly ask what sort of punishments the princess usually hands out, and the guard shrugs.

“Her royal highness can be quite unpredictable in what she deems appropriate, miss,” he says, “but she’s often known to adopt the attitude of ‘an eye for an eye and a hoof for a hoof’, so to speak. And usually, the effects are often lasting to make sure the pony won’t forget their crime.” Clearing his throat, he begins to trot away down one of the streets. “Now if you’ll excuse me ma’am, I have to return to my duties.”

You’re left standing alone in the square, pondering over what the guard meant by the ‘attitude’. If what he’s saying is true, then the princess is probably going to... no. She can’t be that cruel can she?

If it’s true, then the princess will permanently alter Trixie’s mind to the level of an infant!
15221121111112.title: A Hoof For A Hoof

choices: ...Fluttershy gazes at you - an adult pony in a used diaper - in horror.
...Fluttershy comes over and cradles you lovingly. You have a new mama!
152211211112.content:
You awake, blinking your eyes in confusion. The warm sun on your face calms you, however. "Tixie...", you mumble happily, waiting for your mama to arrive. You're hungry, and can't wait to see what your mama has brought you.

But there's no answer. Giggling, you swing your head round. Surely your mama's there somewhere? She'd never leave you for long, you know that. The room is blurry, but you can tell something is different. "Tixie! Tixie!", you yell, suddenly in a panic. Nothing. You stumble to your hooves and totter across the room - but stare round in surprise and horror. The wagon is empty - cleaned out. Books, furniture, Trixie's huge magic tricks cabinet, all vanished. Even your doll is gone. All that's left is your bed, and you. Nobody's there for you.

You burst into tears and fall to the floor. Curled up in a ball, you mess yourself, which makes you cry even harder. Sobbing, a helpless foal with no mother. You're hungry, confused, and afraid. You lie there bawling, as the light slowly fades in the room.

But then you hear a sound. She's back! She must be! The door opens. "Mama?", you manage to choke out between sobs. But it's not your mama. A large yellow pegasus pony peers round the door. "Um..."
152211211112.title: You get a different guest!

choices: Yes, you need to be fed.
You need to be changed first
1522112111122.content:
It's not your Mama; it's only some stranger. You've never felt more alone and frightened, and you sob louder. "Mama! Mama Tixie!"

Fluttershy can't believe someone would be so irresponsible as to leave a poor baby filly all by herself; her maternal instincts kick into full gear. "Shhh," she whispers, coming closer. "It's okay. Everything will be okay."

Something about her soft, whispery voice comforts you; you feel you can trust this person. Sniffling, you hold out your arms and Fluttershy pulls you in a hug, nuzzling you tenderly and drying your tears. "There, there, sweetums. I won't leave you."

She gazes into your curious eyes. "I'm Fluttershy!" she says brightly. "I'm your new mama!"

"Mama?" you repeat cautiously, "Mama Fwuttershy?"

"Yes! Mama Fluttershy!" Your mama gives you a kiss and rubs her snout against yours, causing you to giggle joyfully. "You're a good little baby, aren't you? Yes you are! Mama loves you!"

Fluttershy begins to hover around the room, cradling you gently. "Are you hungry? Do you want your ba-ba?"
1522112111122.title: ...Fluttershy comes over and cradles you loving...

choices: Fluttershy heads to Twilight's for help
Fluttershy takes you home as her foal
15221121111222.content:
You let yourself fall on your rump and pat your diaper. “Tange diapee,” you say urgently.

Fluttershy blushes slightly. “O-oh. Alright. Let's get that cleaned up so you're nice and comfortable!”

You lay down completely and though the floor is a little cold it's alright because your new mama is there for you. Your eyes meet and she smiles with glee as she opens up your diaper. “Uh oh, sweetums made a big stinkie!” She giggles at her own words and you join in.

She brings a diaper bag into view, seemingly out of nowhere. Perhaps she found it while searching around. You don't care; you just know it'll help her change you and that means you get to snuggle with her!

She pulls out some wipes and applies them to your bottom, working away at your accident with precision. Your mama is very good at what she does, and yet you do wonder how she learned to do this so well.

She then sprinkles foal powder on your clean behind, though a little bit lands on her nose, causing her to inhale loudly. Expecting a sneeze, you grin- and then burst out laughing as all that comes from it is a little squeak! Fluttershy smiles and chuckles a little too.

As you're laughing, you never notice she's putting a fresh diaper on you. Not until she nuzzles you and gives you a long kiss on the cheek. You look up and see the smallest tears in her eyes. “Mama Fluttershy will never leave you, baby.”

You smile. “Me wuv Mama Fwuttashy.”

Her eyes glitter. “Oh, uh, sweetie, this is going to sound a bit odd, but... Do you have a name?”

“Name?” You strain to think. Yes, somewhere there is a name... “O-owanje... Cweam!” You giggle.

“Orange Cream... My, that's a cute name!”

You nod happily.

She stops, seemingly lost in thought, then gasps. “I- I saw you in the town square, didn't I? You were at Trixie's show... Oh, it all make sense now.”

You give her a confused look. Why is she bring up your old caretaker?

“But, if you were a mare then... I bet Twilight can explain what happened, and help get you back to normal.”

You stick your tongue out at her.

“Oh, but you are so cute. What should mama do?”
15221121111222.title: A Change and Remembrance

choices: Fluttershy goes through with her plan
Fluttershy decides to become a mother of two
152211211112221.content:
As much as she'd like to keep you, Fluttershy knows it's her responsibility to get you back to your former age.

“Orange? We're going to a friend of mine. She's going to help you.”

You don't quit understand what she means, but you're not going to let yourself be left behind again. You reach out to your mama and she lifts you up in her arms gently, smiling; she then takes to the air. The two of you leave the caravan and you close your eyes, letting yourself enjoy the sensation of flying. Your mama isn't flying too fast, but it's a nice pace that makes you feel quite elated. If only you had wings of your own...

You almost doze off by the time you arrive, but Fluttershy's voice awakens you. “We're here, sweetie. Can you walk?”

You nod and hop out of her grasp. Your legs are a bit shaky, but you can make it. Except you have no idea where you're headed. You turn to Fluttershy and give her a confused look.

“Right this way, Orange Cream.”

She walks towards what appears to be a very large tree. With windows. You're sure that one day, you want to live in a tree too; it just seems like so much fun!

You skip after the pegasus, eager to see whom you'll meet. She knocks at the door meekly, and it is soon opened by a purple unicorn. “Oh, hi, Fluttershy!” She opens the door completely, revealing you. You flash her a grin. “Who's this?”

“This is... my foal. Sort of. Um. Can we come inside?”

“Of course.”

You enter the home after your mama.

“So, what's going on, Fluttershy?”

“Well, I was just walking by Trixie's cart and I... heard some crying noises. You know how I don't like seeing things in pain, right?”

“Yes.”

“Well, I went to see what was going on and... I found her. All by herself, in an empty cart. But then I remembered seeing her earlier at Trixie's show, except... older.”

“So she's regressed?” She leans in to look at you closer, and you shrink away. Fluttershy rushes to your side and hugs you.

“Oh, please don't scare her! She's really upset after Trixie left her.”

You look at her sadly. “Mama... Mama Tixie?” She nuzzles you tenderly, doing her best to soothe you. Even though you miss your old mama so much...

After she lets you go, you decided to take your mind off things by exploring the rest of the house. You slip behind the two mares and trot into the living room. There appears to be another pony here, and she's your size too! And not just that, she's

You approach her, and, hearing your clumsy hoofsteps, she turns, a pacifier in her mouth.

Your heart stops. It's Trixie.

She gurgles something at you, then spits out her pacifier. “Do you wanna pway wi' me?”

You give her an odd look. She's gone... there's no way she'll be your mama again. This makes you as sad as you'd expect. You sit down and begin to sniffle a little.

“Does somepony nee' a huggie?” She walks over to you and embraces you, then shortly thereafter loses her balance and tumbles down to the floor. As much as you'd like not to, you giggle a little. Then you sulk again.

She's not one to give up so easily, however. Before you can even see it coming, you find yourself pinned to the ground, as Trixie shoves her face in your belly just as she had before, and blows a playful raspberry. Your giggling explodes and even causes her to laugh. She tires of her act just as you feel as if you might go in your diaper again and relents.

“Ta-haa, Tixie! Da- da' teehkuls!”

“I know!”

The two of you laugh for what seems like hours, before the two mares you had left behind come after you.

“Yup, here they are. Aren't they just wonderful?” That's your mama's voice.

“I do have to admit they're cute. Even little Trixe. She tried to do the same thing she did to poor Orange Cream to me. You said you wanted them turned back to normal?”

“...yes. I think.”

“This is it, Fluttershy. I can give them the antidote now and turn them back, or leave them as foals for you to keep. Which will it be?”

You turn to your mama, a bright smile on your face. You're so happy to see her again, even if she's only been gone a few minutes! You wonder why she's looking so nervous.
152211211112221.title: Big Again?

choices: The spell worked. You and Trixie are back to normal!
Your bodies are back to normal, but you still have the mind of a foal!
1522112111122211.content:
"Oh, I'd love to keep them, but... it's not right. What if they have families? We need to get them back to normal..."

Twilight nods, and starts making preparations for the spell. You look first at Twilight, and then at Fluttershy, confused. "Mama? Mama Fwuttashy?" Fluttershy looks down at you sadly. "Don't worry, my little angel. Mama's here for you. There's nothing to worry about." You glance over at Trixie, who is gurgling away happily and merrily filling her diaper.

But as Twilight starts drawing a chalk circle round you and Trixie, you know something's wrong. You're about to lose your mama for a second time, you just know it. You burst into tears. Trixie takes one look at you, and bursts into tears as well. You both sit there bawling your eyes out, but your Mama crouches down and scoops you both up in her hooves. "It's OK, everything's OK..." You feel the squeeze of your Mama, and look into her eyes. She smiles back at you lovingly. "I love you both, you know that? I will always love you." But just as you begin to calm down, she looks away, over to Twilight. "Ready?"

Twilight finishes the circle. Her horn starts glowing. "Ready. But it needs to be NOW." You look up at your Mama... and she has tears in her eyes. As you reach out for her, you find yourself rudely plonked in the middle of the circle, hooves flailing. "Mama!" She's trotting off to the other room. "MAMA!" You can't let this happen again. You get to your hooves, and try to see through your tears. You take a step forward, and fall over onto Trixie, who is sobbing - and wetting herself - uncontrollably. The pair of you are suddenly engulfed in a cloud of smoke.

When it clears...
1522112111122211.title: Abandoned... again

choices: You ask Twilight to regress you... for good, this time.
A spell is a bit far - but you can still find a way to be Fluttershy's filly...
15221121111222111.content:
You lie there, sobbing your heart out. Your Mama has left you again... hang on, your Mama? As your thoughts clear, you run the sentence over in your head. Fluttershy can't be your Mama... you left home - in disgrace - years ago...

You feel a hoof on your shoulder, and open your eyes. Twilight's concerned face looms into view. "Orange... Cream, wasn't it? It's all OK now. Everything's OK." You look down at yourself. You're normal. You stumble to your hooves, groggy, not quite believing what's just happened. You acted like a silly foal... but it felt OK at the time... nice, even. Truth be told, you're not sure you've been as happy since the first time you were in diapers.

You glance around. "Ma... Fluttershy?", you mumble. Fluttershy's tear-stained face peers out from the other room. "Um... Orange Cream. I'm glad you're OK." Bizarrely, you feel sorry for her; she'd clearly wanted to keep you. As Twilight sits back smugly, basking in her success, you idly wonder whether the reversal spell has done anyone but her any good at all.

"Sparkle... you think you're so clever, don't you?" Trixie - you'd forgotten about her. You glance over, to see a fully-grown pony... still with a diaper on. And a messy diaper at that. You turn to check your own flank in alarm, but you're fine - it's just Trixie. One look at Twilight's face indicates that this anomaly wasn't entirely accidental. The Great and Powerful Trixie needs changing. Badly.

Trixie scowls. She looks to say something, then looks back at her diaper, and seems to rethink. With another scowl and another puff of smoke, she disappears into thin air... if you ignore the swinging window, of course.

Twilight sighs. "That pony..." She looks at you, and smiles. "Are you OK? I saved you! Not that I'm boasting, of course..." You nod, sadly. "What's the matter? You didn't want to stay as a filly the rest of your life, did you?"
15221121111222111.title: You and Trixie are back to normal! More or less.

choices: She rejects you, you complete mad-mare.
She trots over and hugs you. Yep, she's still your mama!
152211211112221112.content:
No, you're not sure you want to actually be magically regressed again; you count yourself lucky you got through it the first time without your brain being completely addled. But you think back to the happy times you spent cuddled up to Fluttershy, and you're not sure you can just give that up. You think you can hear sobbing from the other room, and it's more than you can bear.

"Fluttershy... Mama." Twilight stares at you. "Mama? I want my mama." The words come slowly at first, and feel odd; but you can't let Fluttershy go that easily. You're sick of travelling from place to place, never settled, living off your wits. All you want is to be looked after by your Mama. You giggle slightly at the thought of her, and then are suddenly hit by the panic that she's slipping away... again.

Twilight shuffles her hooves. "Look, Orange Cream, I know you've been through a lot, but this is a bit..." You ignore her. "Mama!" You let yourself go, and fall backwards onto your rump, bawling your eyes out. "Mama Fwuttershy!" As you sob, you can feel your mind slipping away... and yet it feels different, somehow. Your brain is filled with silly, foalish thoughts - and yet there's still a tiny corner there that knows exactly what you're doing.

Fluttershy peers round into room, not quite able to believe what she's hearing. She looks at you, crying your eyes out, looking every bit the oversized foal, and then to Twilight, who shrugs. "I've never seen anything like it. The spell worked, she was fine - and then she started acting like this..."

As you sit there, you suddenly feel the need to... go. The tiny part of your adult brain realises that letting loose on Twilight's floor might not be the best way to repay her for her kindness, but before you know it, it's too late. You've pooped yourself. Even you are slightly alarmed at what's happening; you try to get up, but your hooves are clumsy, and it ends up smeared all over you. You look balefully up at Fluttershy, ignoring the gasps of displeasure from Twilight. "Creamie poop!", you announce to your potential new mama.

Fluttershy looks at you. This will really test her maternal instincts...
152211211112221112.title: A very foalish adult.

choices: "I'm Oranje Creem..."
...No. You make a bolt for it.
1522112111122211121.content:
Fluttershy looks at you, sadly. "...Um... no, Orange Cream. I'm sorry. This is wrong. You're an adult now." For a moment, you think you can convince her, but the look in her eyes... the love for you has gone, replaced with sympathy - and a slight hint of revulsion. She turns away from you, to Twilight. "Can you do something? Um, I mean, I can't have her follow me home..."

You sit there in your own filth, distraught. You clop your hooves together imploringly. "Mama! Come on mama!" Fluttershy ignores you. Twilight glances over. "This is beyond me. She needs psychological help. Maybe Nurse Redheart would know what to do..." Fluttershy nods. "I'll go and get her. She does home visits." She trots to the door... but you scramble to your hooves and get their first, barring the way. You look up at her, eyes full of tears. "Please... Mama... Fwuttershy..."

But it's no use. The loving Mama you once knew doesn't even want to touch you. In fact, she backs away... is she... scared? Your Mama, scared of you? Your head feels like it's going to burst. With a wail, you flail your hooves at Fluttershy, and start screaming. And as you do so, the one remaining bit of your adult mind vanishes, overcome with fear. You don't know what to do.

Twilight comes over. She smiles, slightly too widely. "Come on, Orange Cream. We'll get this sorted. You just need someone to have a look at you." But you're inconsolable. You lash out at Twilight - with an adult pony's strength, She staggers back, dazed. You hardly know what you're doing, as you stumble up, and start crashing into things. Fluttershy shrieks as the ladder crashes to the floor, narrowly missing her. Your mini reign of terror ends as you look up to see a bookcase falling down on top of you. You lie there, sobbing your eyes out underneath a mountain of books.

You don't know how long time passes, when your ears prick up. There's the sound of a door opening, and Twilight's voice grows nearer. "...and she just lost it, Nurse Redheart. We don't know what to do."

The kindly face of Nurse Redheart looms into your vision. "Hello there!", she says brightly. "Who are you?" You look at her. Can you trust her?
1522112111122211121.title: She rejects you, you complete mad-mare.

choices: Try to find Trixie.
Attempt to cure you by force.
15221121111222111211.content:
"I- I'm Owanje Cweem..." You decide the mare looks friendly enough. She's smiling at you, unlike your sweet mama who disappointed you so. You're sure she'll make everything better.

"My name's Nurse Redheart. Do you know what a nurse does, Orange?"

"Uh-huh!" You beam at her proudly. "Hewp ponies with boo-boos!"

She stifles a giggle. "That's right, sweetie. That's why I'm here. Do you have any boo-boos?"

"...no, I'm good." You don't mention that need for Fluttershy's comfort. She wouldn't understand.

"Alright then. I'll be right back, dear." She heads off to talk to the other mares, and you are left pondering this stranger. She seems... nice. Almost nice enough to make you forget about your loss, even. And yet... can you really forget Fluttershy?

"...from what I've observed, she appears to be quite healthy, physically, and mentally at around the age of... two, two and a half. Quite cute, actually. You said she was turned into a foal by a spell?"

"Yes."

"Then I... have a hunch as to what may be it. Miss Sparkle, if you could try something for me..."

"What?"

"Try lifting her into the air with your magic, please."

Twilight obliges and you find yourself floating a few feet of the ground, causing you to laugh with glee. "Fly, fly!" Your laughter spurts out, unrestrained. Then you plop down on your rear. "Oof! Awww... no fly?"

"Ugh. I... don't know what happened, Nurse Redheart. I didn't let go or anything, my magic just... stopped."

"Then I was right. Whoever cast the spell that made her younger also made her more resistant to magic. You managed to get past that, but it seems the spell returned, weakened."

"So... what can we do?"

"Well. We could find the pony who did this to her and have her remove the guard, or we could try to destroy it ourselves, though there's a problem with that."

"Which is...? I don't look forward to seeing Trixie again."

"The spell could have an even more pronounced effect on her."

The trio watches you uncertainly. What are they do to?
15221121111222111211.title: "I'm Oranje Creem..."

choices: It's regressing them too!
It's making them lose control of their bowels!
152211211112221112112.content:
Twilight finally comes forward and says, "I'm going to try to brute force it."

The two others turn to her with concerned looks on their faces. Brute forcing the spell would require Twilight to put every ounce of her magical ability into attempting to dispel the enchantment on you herself. It's terribly risky, though, because the feedback could seriously hurt Twilight if she fails to dispel it. That, and the amount of magical energy expended with absolutely exhaust her, possibly to the point of blacking out. But, when Twilight's decided something, it's better off just to let her go ahead and do it.

"Twilight," Redheart is growing concerned, "darling, you realize that this is going to be every dangerous."

"Of course, but we can't let Trixie's awful spell enslave this poor pony's mind for another minute. Nurse Redheart, Fluttershy, step back. I don't want to risk either of you getting hurt while I'm fixing Orange."

Both of the mares step back away from you, leaving you confused. You don't particularly care though, you're to busy squriming around in your soiled diaper and blowing spit bubbles. You seem quite happy, in fact, but this won't go on, so long as Twilight has her way. And with her being the Element of Magic, it's doubtful there's a spell around she can't undo.

"Alright, wish me luck girls," Twilight's horn begins to glow, "it's going to be an uphill battle for sure!"

She jabs her horn at you, firing off a rush of magic that very quickly engulfs you. Before it touches you, though, it hits a strange blue barrier you never knew you had around you. The two magical forces collide, rushing and swirling all around in a vibrant mix of blue and violet. Twilight is struggling to undo the magical force about you, but it's much stronger than she hoped. She applies more force, pulling deep from her core, but it just doesn't seem to be working.

All the while, you're watching in childish wonder at the pretty colors all around your body, staring at your hooves and laughing like a wild mare, when suddenly you feel a spark of something. A memory. The recollection of how to count, you think. It was fleeting, but it was there. You almost crave that knowledge but that want is quickly overshadowed by something else.

An upset tummy.

Something horrible is brewing in your guts, you think it must be that spell.

"Mama... Mama Fwuttergh..." You clutch your belly and curl around your self, feeling an awful storm rush down your stomach and into your rear. Before you can cry out, you release a pungent fart into your diaper, creating a wet burble as it pushes out against your mess. The thick, reeking stench pours out from under your rear and fills the room. Despite Twilight trying her best to focus in on her spell, she can't concentrate with this stink filling her nostrils. She breaks the spell and falls backward, choking.

"Oh dear Celestia!" Twilight shouts, "My eyes! It burns my eyes!"

Nurse Redheart quickly pulls a cloth over her nose from the desk nearby,

"It must be a security measure of some sort, oh lord that is foul!"

Fluttershy is so repulsed that she actually fled upwards, ducking her head out the window to get some air. You can't understand why, though. You only laugh, clapping your hooves together.

"Creamie fart! Creamie fart!"

Unbeknownst to your simple mind, however, your gas is having a powerful effect on the three ponies who tried to break your spell.
152211211112221112112.title: Firewall

choices: Trixie!
Spike?
1522112111122211121121.content:
You, being the naive little thing you are, have no idea the effects your enchanted flatulence are having on those poor ponies. All you care about is the good feeling of letting out more of the deadly stink from your petite butt and clopping your hooves as you laugh and laugh. Something about all this farting is making you laugh so hard that you fart some more and the cycle continues. There's not a corner in the library that doesn't reek like the inside of your diaper now, but that's the last thing the trio is worried about.

Twilight is the first to go, poor darling, given that she was the one who triggered the trap in the first place and ended up taking the brunt of your foul-smelling retaliation. It starts small, with a little lightheadedness, but it starts getting worse and worse as she struggles to breathe past the stink. Her knees grow weak as the gas creeps into her mind and starts blocking off the annals of her own mind from her. Twilight starts mumbling under her breath, saying mostly nothing as her memories escaped from her. Like little pages in her favorite books, bit by bit, her mind flips away and soon she is left with nothing. Shaking her head dizzily, Twilight Sparkle fallsl on her butt and starts burbling.

Nurse Redheart wasn't far behind. With a bit of cloth over her nose, she thinks she can help Twilight, but your gas is far more caustic than she imagined. It easily seeps through the thin barrier and poisons her body, quickly filling her up with the same enchantment that robbed Twilight of her mind. It happens much quicker than Twilight, within seconds all her composure and poise is ripped from her body and she is reduced to a quivering little lump of foal, laying on her belly and wiggling her hooves about.

Fluttershy, being the nervous wreck she I, made the fatal mistake of panicking. She inhales much more gas than either of her two friends, losing herself in a fit off coughing that forces her to make a crash landing onto Twilight's bed. Struggling and whimpering, Fluttershy rolls around the bed and feels her mind go. Her memories, her confidence, everything is gone and she keeps only her childish fears. The fears that end up making her duck down underneath the covers and hide.

Now, there's four little fillies her with nopony to take care of them! What will you four do? Well, as it is, you're all lucky enough to not have to worry about it, because right then, the door to the library opened up and gas billowed out. Standing there, dizzy but not yet regressed, was...
1522112111122211121121.title: The Ultimate Security measure

choices: ...Princess Celestia?"
...Princess Luna?"
15221121111222111211212.content:
"Twilight, what's going on? I went over to Fluttershy's to pick up those books you asked for, but she wasn't there..." Spike blinks as his eyes fall on the four grown fillies. You sit there in your mess, bawling at the sudden sound; Nurse Redheart giggles as she curiously investigates her hooves, then relieves herself; Fluttershy's whimpers float across the room, and Twilight stares as she takes in Spike. "Dww-agun!" she suddenly screams, and bursts into tears.

Spike cracks up laughing. "This is hilarious! Look at all of you! We got Orange Scream, Nurse Redfart, Fluttercry,, and... uh... I got nothin'. Twilight Sparkle. I mean seriously, I can't even work with that." He takes a step towards Twilight. "Is this one of your spells again? I've told you before, it'd backfire on you one day."

Twilight panics. She tries to get up, but her weak legs promptly plop her straight back onto her rump. So she goes for the next best thing: scooting across the floor. Not that she really knows where to scoot to; and with 95% of the wall covered in bookshelves, it was fairly predictable what was going to happen. As her head pokes up from the pile of books, she looks so scared that even Spike started to feel a bit guilty.

"OK, time to get you lot sorted. Best call for Nurse..." He glances at Redheart, who has moved on from investigating her hooves to blowing what might be the longest raspberry anypony has ever blown. Spike sighs. "But who to call? I can't call Celestia - she's still mad from when Twilight did that whole slasher thing to Applebloom and friends. But it needs a princess to fix this..."

Torn, Spike glances across to the quivering bedclothes. Quivering... damp bedclothes. Muffled sobs cross the room... followed by a steady trail of urine. Spike sighs again. "I'm sure I had more control over my toilet actions when I was younger. And I'm still a baby dragon. I need to get you lot where I can keep an eye on you." With some fairly impressive rounding skills, Spike soon has the four of you sitting huddled in the middle of the room - which would be an achievement if it was four normal fillies considering Spike's size, let alone four oversized foals - at the cost of four sets of lungs bawling in unison. Spike examined Twilight's rump carefully. "Sorry, girls. The bitemarks will fade in no time, I promise. Now, for that letter."

Spike gets out a scroll and starts writing. "Dear...
15221121111222111211212.title: Spike?

choices: Fluttershy dresses you and takes you out for a walk
Your diaper needs to be changed again
152211211112222.content:
Looking at you, Fluttershy knows just what her course of action should be. Whatever you were before you met Trixie, you're Fluttershy's baby now, and she'll never give you up. "Oh Orange Cream," she coos, chucking your chin with her hoof. "You must be so tired of this cramped cart. Let's go back to my tree house! It's nice and cozy, and not very far!"

You like the sound of that idea, and nod your head eagerly; Fluttershy giggles and scoops you up. "Hold still now...good girl!" She hovers out of the cart with you safely tucked away, and you're able to cuddle up against your mama. In no time at all, you've arrived at your destination.

"Welcome to your new home!" Fluttershy says as a white bunny rabbit comes through the door and regards you curiously. "Angel, this our new baby, Orange Cream. She'll be staying with us from now on." You reach out to pet your new friend, but he scampers away, not used to strangers, and you turn back to Fluttershy.

"I'm hungee," you whimper, looking up at her imploringly.

"Don't you worry sweetums! Mama'll warm up a special ba-ba just for you!" Fluttershy places you ever so gently in a rocking cradle, then returns soon after with a bottle of warm milk; you latch onto the nipple and suck greedily while your mama whispers affectionate baby talk to you.

"Okay, Orange Cream, it's nap time." Come to think of it, you're beginning to feel drowsy, and start to close your eyes. But when Fluttershy disappears, your vision becomes blurred with tears and a sob bubbles in the back of your throat; you don't want to be left alone, not after what happened last time.

"Oh!" Fluttershy cries, rushing to your side. "You must be terribly afraid of being abandoned, given what happened with Trixie. Mama's right here, Orange Cream, don't you fret. I'll always be here for you."

"Mama Fwuttershy," you moan, as the pegasus reaches down and begins stroking your mane gently, before crooning a soft lullaby.

"Hush now, quiet now, it's time to lay your sleepy head. Hush now, quiet now, it's time to go to bed..."

Your mama's angelic voice sends you off into dreamland in seconds, and when you wake up...
152211211112222.title: Fluttershy takes you home as her foal

choices: Princess Celestia!?!?
Trixie?!?!
1522112111122221.content:
Mama's beside you! She's still there, thank Celestia Mama didn't leave you. She's been watching you, probably the whole time while you slept. Her warm, loving gaze must have been what made sure you slept so soundly. You reach up and idly pat her cheek with your soft hoof.

"Mama..."

"Did you sleep well sweet pea?"

"Uh huh..."

She pats you softly, then helps you sit up. She rubs your belly and you chuckle happily.

"Hey sweetie," Fluttershy says, "You wanna go out today? Huh? There's a nice little playground outside the school and I bet all the schoolfoals would love to see you!"

"Yah! Yah!" You bounce in your seat and clop your hooves. The thought of going out to a playground makes you giddy with joy while the thought of getting to play with older foals makes you doubly joyful. You have such excitement over the whole idea that there ready to bounce right off the bed, luckily your mama was there to keep you still.

"Alright baby, alright. We're going to get you out so you can have some fun, but first you've gotta get dressed up. You like looking nice, don'tcha? Don'tcha?"

You nod your head and Fluttershy sweeps you off your hooves. Soon, you're dressed in a pink and yellow sundress with a neat little bonnet on your head. Around each of your hooves is a silky bootie, and your diaper was changed after you peed yourself from glee. Now that you were looking your best, your mama was ready to take you out to the playground.

"Ready to go baby?"

You hopped off the changing table, you could stand much easier on your own now. "Yah! Yah!"

"Look at you!" Fluttershy does an over-the-top gasp, "You're such a strong little filly! Can you walk all the way to the playground?"

"Yah! Yah! Ah can dooo eet mama!"

Fluttershy smiles and opens the door to her little cottage so that the two of you can start your little journey to the playground. It was such a bright, beautiful day to be out with your mama. Butterflies swirled around you all the way, the sun warmed your coat and your mother was happily singing to you while you walked. The day only got better when you reached the playground at last, where other fillies and colts were running about, laughing and playing.

"Okay baby, go on and play. Mama will be right here." Your mama took a seat right on the bench nearby and you ran off laughing to find someone to play with. There's a unicorn filly sitting in the sandbox and she looked nice, playing with a little stuffed pony, so you decided to sit with her. She smiled when she saw you, brushed her purple hair out of her eyes and said,

"Hiya! I'm Twiwight Spahkew! You wanna pway wit smawty pants? She's super smawt!"

You'd never seem a Smarty Pants doll, but she does look like fun. You grab the raggy looking doll and turn it over in your hooves a bit, before you decide that the best way to enjoy it would be to suck on it. It's got gritty sand in it, but you kinda like the taste. A little like carpet shavings. Twilight seems to be happy you're enjoying yourself, she's watching you and smiling.

"Oh Twilight dearest!" Twilight turns her head, then smiles and holds her hooves out.

"Mama!"

"There you are sweetie. Did you make a new friend? Who is she?"

"Ah'm Owanje Cweam!" You say, spitting out your doll. You don't even realize until it's too late, but you've just introduced yourself to...
1522112111122221.title: Out on the town

choices: Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo
Rainbow Dash and Rarity
15221121111222211.content:
You sit in the sand looked up to the sky to see a large white majestic pony standing over you, she was so tall she that blocked out the sun. You turned around to see if your mama was still watching and to your surprise, she was quickly trotting over to you with a smile on her face. Deep down inside you began to feel a little scared at the large white pony standing right next to Twilight.

"Orange Cream? Such a lovely name for a cute little baby like you." Celestia craned her head down and cooed.

"Fwuttershy is my mama an' she wikes playing wif me." You point to Fluttershy who trotted over to the scene and looked up at Celestia with a nice big smile, while that was going on, you crawl over to your mama and proceed to wrap your hooves around her legs for comfort.

"Hello Princess Celestia, what a beautiful day we're having." Your mama greeted the tall white pony.

"Yes, I know. It's a perfect day to take your little one out for a stroll in the playground." The large white pony looked down at Twilight and began to pet her mane, it was very strange, you didn't know what the white pony was doing to your friend but it seemed that she liked it because she was smiling.

"I agree, I also took my little one out today and she is loving every minute of it." Fluttershy craned her head down and nuzzled you for affection, you smiled and gurgled a little and began to insert your own hoof into your mouth to suck on. The taste of the doll that Twilight gave you wasn't as good as your own hooves.

As your mama and the tall white pony began to talk to each other, you noticed that Twilight had crawled over and picked up Mr. Smartypants. It didn't bother you, but you had a brilliant idea that involved the sandbox, you start to crawl over to Twilight and you tap her on her leg which gets her attention, you pluck your hoof out of your mouth and look up to the other baby.

"Do you wanna pway in da' sand?" You ask Twilight.

"My mommy says dat my diapee gets weally dirty in da sand..." Twilight explains, holding her stuffed animal close to her chest.

"How about da swings..." You suggest another form of play, you point to the swings at the other side of the park, both you and Twilight look at the swings and see two other foals sitting in the swings.

"Dat sounds fun." Twilight giggled.

You feel really happy that your new friend will play with you, Twilight turned to her mama and lightly tapped her leg.

"And then th- what's the matter Twilight?" Celestia craned her head and affectionately nuzzled her, Twilight giggled.

"Me an Owanje Creem wanna go on da swings!" Twilight squeaked, Celestia rose her head and looked at Fluttershy.

"Do you want to go no the swings Orange Cream?" Fluttershy also craned her head and sweetly asked you if you wanted to go on the swings.

More than anything, you nod up and down with a big smile on your face.

"Yes mama, I wud like to get on da swings!" You raised your voice in excitement.

As Celestia and Fluttershy walk with their babies to the swings, they notice two foals sitting in the swings. Who could they be?
15221121111222211.title: Princess Celestia!?!?

choices: Play Catch
Play dress-up
152211211112222112.content: As you and Twilight walk towards the swingset, you notice two other foals there, a rainbow-maned pegasus and a white-coated unicorn. "Hewwo! Ahm Owange Cweem!" you say. "And ahm Twilight! Wanna pway!" They both silently nod. "Let's go play catch! It gonna be kewl!" says the rainbow-maned one who's name is Ranbow Dash. "I wanna pway dress-up!" said the one named Rarity. Meanwhile, your mama is talking with Twilight's mommy and seems awfully worried.
152211211112222112.title: Rainbow Dash and Rarity

choices: Celestia agrees and takes all the babies with her
Celestia decides to stay at the park longer.
1522112111122221121.content:
Catch.

It's the only game in the whole universe that you didn't know how to play properly, something in you just didn't understand how it worked, but since all of these ponies around you are your new best friends you decide to crawl up to Twilight and tap her on her padded rear. She turned round holding her Smarty Pants doll in one hoof and another is in her mouth being loudly sucked on.

"What's wong Owange Cweam?" Twilight plucked her hoof out of her mouth with a loud pop and drooled.

"I don't know how'ta pway catch..." You feel like crying out for your mommy, she would be there for you, catch is serious business.

"Aww it's eawy! Jus' crwal awound and don't be catched by da evwil monstwer!" Twilight explained.

"M-Monstwer?!" You start to panic, no one told you that a monster would be playing the game, why would it want to play with you? Is it going to gobble you up? You just didn't understand what was going on.

"I dun' wanna pway..." You add as you start to sniffle, you instead crawl away from the group and back to Fluttershy. Twilight and the others watch you as you make your back back over to the bench where your mommy and Celestia sat down together, as you get closer you hear a conversation between the both of them, but you didn't understand what they were talking about.

"This spell made it's way through Canterlot, Manehatten, Trottingville and Ponyville. I don't know how this mental regression spell had spread so far, but only a few ponies have been reported to be affected by it." Celestia said to your mommy.

"Oh my... that's horrible... I feel so sad for Twilight, Rarity and Rainbow Dash... who is looking after them?" Your mommy asks.

"Currently Applejack and Pinkie Pie and a few little fillies from the Ponyville school all take turns in looking after them, luckily, they are the only ponies that I personally know of that have been affected by the spell. I also heard that ponies in Manehatten are rounding up and selling the regressed ponies found on the streets for a price to be looked after by a family, I think it's horrible that my subjects would do such a thing. They all should be working together to make sure everypony is safe and happy."

"I heard that there is an adult foal nursery in Ponyville, would you like to take the babies there?"
1522112111122221121.title: Play Catch

choices: Mama Fluttershy to the rescue!
Trixie takes you and Twilight away by force!
15221121111222212.content:
You stare at her in bewilderment, and she stares right back at you, equally startled. Mama Trixie? Here? But where has she been all this time? Why did she leave you alone? What is she doing taking care of this filly instead of you? You can’t make sense of the situation.

After a pause, though, Trixie smiles warmly. “Orange Cream!” she says in a delighted tone. “Where have you been? Trixie was looking all over for you! She’s been so upset! You remember me, don’t you? I’m your mama!”

Your mama? But that can’t be right. Fluttershy is your mama now, you think. Trixie reaches out her hoof to stroke your cheek, but you pull away, and she looks surprised.

Her face takes on a sad, remorseful, look. “Orange Cream, little boo, you must have been so upset when you woke up and found Trixie gone…but it’s okay! Mama’s back! Come on, she’ll make it up to you! Besides, you have a sister now!”

You do? She must mean that filly, Twilight Sparkle, who called her Mama. Wait a minute. That Smarty Pants doll of hers used to belong to you! Trixie had it in her cart, and when you woke up, it was gone. The pony who claims to be your mama abandoned you and found another filly; she even gave her your toy!

Trixie looks concerned. “Please don’t be upset, Orange Cream. Everything will be fine! Would a treat make you feel better? Ice cream, maybe?” She reaches out to pull you into a comforting hug, but you crawl even further away. You don’t like Trixie anymore; you can’t trust her. The situation is very distressing, and you’re becoming more and more afraid.

With a howl, you burst into tears, creating a scene as everyone else on the playground turns toward the sandbox. Twilight is startled, and Trixie is aghast. But you only cry harder. Surely Fluttershy (your real mama) will notice your predicament and save you?
15221121111222212.title: Trixie?!?!

choices: "...going to be baking cookies!"
"...going to read a story!"
152211211112222122.content:
"No, Orange, sweet pea, stop!" Trixie is sweating bullets now, sitting in the middle of the park with a bawling filly and having everyone stare at her must look incredulous. To make matters worse, it looks like your crying set Twilight off too and she starts wailing as if someone had frightened her. Well, not someone, you. Either way, Mama Trixie is now in a very awkward situation and needs to act fast if she wants to save face.

"Sweetie," she leans down to you, her calm voice cracking with worry, "I'm going to give you until the count of three to be quiet for mama. Please?"

You can barely hear her over your ear-shattering screeching, but you still manage to understand her well enough to know that you won't have any part of her. You keep crying your eyes out.

"One."

Trixie must be crazy if she thinks you'll stop just be she, after after she did, asked nicely.

"Two."

No! Never, you'll scream until your lungs pop and scream some more before you let that awful mare anywhere near you. Your mama is Fluttershy, your mama is sweet and kind and lovely and-

"Three!"

While you had your eyes glued shut with tears, Trixie retrieved some kind of glittery powder and tossed it into your face. Being a foal and all, you're not sure what it is, but you know that it's making you awfully lightheaded and... Sleepy. You sneeze twice, shaking your head to try and stay awake, but it's no use. You nod off right there in the sandbox and last thing you hear is the fading sound of Twilight's cries as you pass into a dreamy unconciousness.

....


You start to drift into reality much later. You're still half-asleep, but you can feel someone rocking you gently. It's your mama. Sweet mama-

Your eyes snap open. Mama Trixie? No, not mama, just Trixie! You groan, trying to wiggle out of her grasp, but that only makes Trixie hold you closer to her breast. You want to cry, but she's so gentle with you that you nearly forget about her stealing you away from your mama. Then again, she was your mama to start with, maybe you could forgive her for all of this.

"How is Trixie's little baby feeling?"

You're not sure. You turn away from her, to get a little time to think, and end up looking around the room you two are in. Three, actually. Twilight is sitting on a carpet nearby, building a fort out of books. You wonder where she got so many books, and then you realize you're surrounded by them. All around you, books! It's some sort of... Book... Place. You forget the word, but that's where you are. You turn back to Trixie, her face nice and warm as she smiles down at you. You think you're forgetting all about Mama Wossname.

"Ahm gud Mama Tixie" You cheer.

"Good! Then you'll be happy to know that you, me and your sister Trixie are..."
152211211112222122.title: Amber Alert!

choices: Pinkie Pie?
Mama Trixie!?!?!?
1522112111122222.content:
You awake to a mushy warm down below your haunches. You struggle to sit up with a messy squish and you become certain that you messed yourself while you slept. Your hoof pats the front of your diaper, it's warm and smelling of pungent pony piss. You shift in your huggies a little, mushing the slop about. It's comfy, but you're afraid you'll get a rash if you're not changed soon. Only one way to handle this,

"Maama! Maaaama fwuttershy!"

Your mother pokes her heard in the doorway and the rest of her follows into the room after. She's got that delightfully warm smile on her face; the one that you think all mothers should have. As she strides into the room you see she's wearing a delightful little pink apron and she smells like cookies. Being the little foal you are, you can't resist tugging on the straps of it as she stands over you.

"Oh, my little Creamie is so playful," Fluttershy giggles, but her smile fades as her nose crinkles at the smell clinging to your diaper, "Oh my, and she's a stinky filly isn't she? Isn't she?"

Fluttershy nuzzles her nose up against your bare belly and you start laughing and kicking wildly.

"Who's my stinky filly? Who's my stinky filly?"

"Ah am! Aaaaahaha am! ah am!"

"Yes you are!" Fluttershy pulls you up and spins around with you before placing you down onto her little changing table. You don't remember her having one of these, but you don't remember how the toilet works either so it could have been here for a while. As you start to daydream about the pretty little mobile that Fluttershy had installed above your head, your mama undoes your diaper straps and gently pulls the messy garment out from underneath you. She then grabs the diaper by the corners with her teeth and deposits it in a nearby diaper pail. She moved quite gracefully for a pony with such a stinky parcel so close to her nose. The stench did nothing to corrode her composure as she cleaned your tush with a lemon scented wipey and started to powder.

With your little rump white with foalpowder, she slipped a fresh pair of fillypants on you and sat you up.

"Feel fresh, nice and fresh and clean?"

"Yah!" You clapped your hooves together and shook with glee. Your momma gave you a honk on your nose and a peck on your forehead before taking you in her hooves and bringing you downstairs to the kitchen. She sang while she did it, swinging you in her arm and practically skipping. Your little nose picks up the scent of chocolate. It looks like you were right, mama was baking cookies! She plops you down in your high chair and takes a still-warm chocolate chip for you to chew on.

"Like that, sweetums?" She asks. You can only nod, your mouth is too full of warm, gooey goodness to answer. Your mama smiles and returns to her baking. For a little while, all you can hear is momma's singing, the gentle hiss of the oven, and the sound of your own chewing until a hard thud scares you and nearly makes you cry. Mama Fluttershy is quick on the draw, she has your head against her breast before you could even so .

"Hush snuggums, it's just the door. I'll go get it, I'll be right back!"

Your mama walks out of the kitchen and you start to panic. If that delicious chunk of chocolate wasn't serving as a pacifier, you'd be crying out for her again. Thankfully mama returns soon enough, alongside her guest...
1522112111122222.title: Duty calls

choices: Be brave. Stay with Pinkie and the food.
You can't risk losing your mama again!
15221121111222221.content:
It’s a good thing your mama has returned to you. You were starting to get worried! But who’s this pony with her? She’s pink, an earth pony with a poofy mane, and looks to be bursting with energy.

“Pinkie,” Fluttershy says by way of introduction. “This is my filly, Orange Cream.” She turns to you, notices your chocolate-covered face, and continues in an exaggerated tone, “And she’s such a mess! Aren’t you, snuggums? Mama needs to clean you up!”

Your mama takes a napkin in her mouth and cleans around yours, causing you to giggle and wave your hooves. Pinkie laughs and comes closer to you. “Hey there, cutie patootie! I’m your Auntie Pinkie!” She honks your nose.

“Pinkie!” You squeal, reaching out to her. Pinkie Pie nuzzles your face affectionately, and Fluttershy scoops you up out of your high chair.

“Why don’t we take Creamie to Sugarcube Corner? There’s so many yummy goodies to eat there she’ll get a pudge and won’t be able to budge!” Pinkie says to her friend,

“A-alright,” Fluttershy agrees. “But not too much. I don’t want her to get a tummy ache.”

You head into town, Fluttershy hovering and spinning with you in her arms, singing all the while as you stare at the birds and butterflies, while “Auntie” Pinkie bounces cheerfully alongside. You finally arrive at the bakery. Pinkie Pie opens the door, and your eyes widen in disbelief at what greets you. More cookies, ice cream of every flavor, cakes, pudding, fritters, and pies as far as the eye can see. Shrieking with glee, you bolt over to the nearest case as soon as Mama sets you on your hooves, almost losing your balance. Gluing yourself to the glass, you lick your lips in anticipation.

Meanwhile, Mama and Auntie Pinkie converse in the background. “Please don’t overfeed Orange Cream Pinkie,” Fluttershy begs, “I can’t stand the thought of her getting sick. Are you sure she’ll be okay? She gets so lonely. Maybe I ought to take her shopping with me…”

“Don’t you worry your pretty little head!” Pinkie says, patting her. “I’ll make sure nothing happens to Creamie or her tum-tum! Besides, if you take her with you everywhere, you’ll never get anything done!”

“Well…” Fluttershy thinks about it, and then walks over to you. You turn your head, smiling, always happy to see your mama. “Orange Cream,” she says, trying to keep the uncertainty out her voice. “Mama’s going to the store to get some things; Auntie Pinkie will stay here with you. I’ll be back in a jiffy, okay?”

You wouldn’t mind staying with all this delicious food and Pinkie for a while. It’ll be fun! Yet…you’re not sure about your precious mama going away, even for a little bit. How do you react?
15221121111222221.title: Pinkie Pie?

choices: "Gained weight. A lot of weight!"
"Messed yourself again, didn't you?"
152211211112222211.content:
No, no you need to be a big filly and do as your mama asks. You nod to let her know that you're going to be okay, and the second you do, Pinkkie scoops you up into her arms and starts rocking you back and forth. She nearly sings as she says,

"See Flutts? Lil' Creamie has no problem staying with Auntie Pinkie, cuz she's a super duper bravey-wavey filly that isn't afraid of nothing, right Creamie?"

Come to think of it, you do feel pretty brave! You nod again, giggling and clopping your hooves together. Pinkie pokes you in the nose with her free hoof, and that sends you into another fit of laughter and clopping.

"Wow," Mama says, "You're right Pinkie, she must have gotten over her abandonment issues much quicker than I thought."

You don't know what that means, but Mama seems to proud of you that you can't help but beam a smile in her direction. Mama leans in to give you a smootch before heading out the door, only stopping to wave at you once more. You wave back and with that you put all your trust in Auntie Pinkie. You sure hope she's as fun as your mama, but you doubt it.

...


"Then you jiggle your rump, oink oink oink, then shout it out, oink oink oink! First your wiggle your tail, oink oink oink..."

Okay, you were wrong, you were wrong a hundred times over. Pinkie is the most fun pony you've ever met in your whole, little bitty life! She's got cookies and candy and tons of toys, plus she loves to sing and to dance just to make you smile and on top of that, she's got tons of funny jokes! They're not all funny, though. Early on she tried pouring some flour on her head to make you laugh, but you didn't really get it. No biggie, though, because you've had so much fun with her you've lost track of time.

Just as you finish off your delicious snickerdoodle and bottle of fresh milk, who else but your Mama comes strolling through the door with saddlebags full of groceries. You down the last gulp of milk and toss your bottle away to dash toward her.

"Pinkie, I'm back! Thanks ever so much for watching after my little sweetums!"

"Mama Fwuttersha!" You cheer, jumping into her hooves. She happily, if not a bit hesitantly, catches you and spins about, much to your delight. She bounces you in her arms and frowns,

"Oh dear Creamie... You, um, you..."
152211211112222211.title: Pinkie's learned a few things since Baby Cakes

choices: "Hey, it's just filly fat! No big deal!"
"I've got a plan to take that tummy off in no time!"
1522112111122222111.content:
It’s true, although it hasn’t really sunk into your infantile mind yet. In fact, you’ve gained so much weight that you look more like an orange bowling ball than a little filly. Inwardly wondering if you can keep your balance for long like this, your sweet mama gently places you back on the floor.

You start to toddle away giggling, but everything suddenly feels so much heavier and sluggish. Stumbling, you fall squarely on your swollen rump. Not only is it painful, the sudden lack of energy you’re feeling combined with Fluttershy’s worried gaze makes you feel very sad and a little afraid. Tears blur your vision and you come close to sobbing.

“Ah-ah’m sorry, mama…” You whimper, ashamed. “Ah can’t…”

“No, no, snuggums, don’t cry!” Fluttershy pulls you into a loving hug and you dry your tears on her pink mane. “Everything will be okay. Mama’s always here for you. Shh, shh, shh…”

You hiccup as your dear mama places you back in your chair, patting your fat tummy gently to comfort you. “Now you stay here, sweet pea, okay? Mama Fluttershy’s just going to talk to Auntie Pinkie for a bit. Don’t worry.” She gives you a long kiss on your cheek that manages to allay your fears before she steps into the other room with Pinkie Pie.

Fluttershy looks at her horrified once out of earshot. “Pinkie, what have you done?! I asked you not to overfeed Orange Cream! Now she’s…she’s…oh, what’s going to happen to my precious baby?”

The pegasus pony casts a fearful glance back in your direction as Pinkie takes a moment to assess the situation before replying.
1522112111122222111.title: "Gained weight. A lot of weight!"

choices: "Ah wan' go home mama!"
"Paydate! Paydate!"
15221121111222221112.content:
"Just leave it all up to Auntie Pie!"

Your Auntie gives you a pat on the head then gives your Mama a pat on the back before she starts work on her next zany scheme. Even as an infant you can figure out that you're not going to like what she's going to have you doing to "shed your baby fat".

...sometime later...


"And to the left, to the left, bring it bring it back to the right. And to the right, to the right, bring it bring it back to the left!"

"Eeeheeeheeaahahaa!"

"...Yay."

You were wrong, you were so wrong! This is the most fun you've ever had ever! Pinkie's got this fun, bouncy music playing and she's got these pretty flashing lamps all around and it's just you, her, and mama dancing like crazy! She even got everyone matching purple and blue jumpsuits to work out in. You're sweating like crazy, but dang if you don't love it.

"And down to your... Hooves! And up to the... Sky! And rest!"

You all plop down, thoroughly exhausted, and the music fades into a low beat just as the normal lights come back on. Remarkably, every last ounce of cookie pudge you put on earlier has faded into nothing more than a little paunch of baby belly. Mama's really happy about that, you can tell by the way she's holding you and smiling and singing a little.

"So," Pinkie says, "happy that Creamie's all tiny again."

"Well, she was very large..."

"I'm just kidding Flutts," she laughs, then pokes you and gets you laughing too, "I'm happy she's not a big, chubby orange blob too! So, what're you gonna do now?"

Fluttershy wipes a bead of sweat out of her mane with one wing, "Oh, I don't know, I think we'll just head home."

"You sure you don't want to stay over? I bet Pound Cake and Pumpkin Cake would love to play with her. It'll be a sleepover playdate!"

"Oh. That does sound lovely but..." she withers a bit, then turns to you, "Creamie, what would you like?"

What would you like? You rub your belly as you mull it over and then smile at your mama and say...
15221121111222221112.title: Pinkie's Foalercise Fiesta (A 3 Disc Set)

choices: ...Mama Fluttershy!
...the pony from your nightmare!
152211211112222211121.content:
As much as you’d like to stay with your new friends and Auntie Pinkie Pie, the exercise has thoroughly worn both you and your mama out. You can barely keep your eyes open as you wish for your mama to pick you up, ushering her with your forelegs.

“Wanna go bed,” you moan as Fluttershy hoists you onto her back, carrying you to your pram.

“Oh... Well, I guess we had fun today anyway!” Pinkie says.

Fluttershy places you in the cart and begins to remove the soaking sweatsuit from your body, handing it over to Pinkie.

“Yes,” Fluttershy says as she peels her own sweaty suit from her coat, “but I think that Creamie is just too pooped for a playdate.” She leans in close to you and sniffs, scrunching her nose. “Speaking of pooped...”

You’re unaware of the fact that during your rigorous workout, you’ve gone and messed from the exertion! Pinkie giggles at your expense and tickles your tummy with swift movements of her hoof. You lie there, rolling and squirming on your back in a fit of squealing laughter.

“Aw, did my fun foal fiesta make Creamie drop a stinky-winky?” she coos. “Well, I know a certain mama who’s just dying to see to that!”

“Well what can I say?” Fluttershy says while blushing a little. “It’s good bonding time. Besides, I think it’s the easiest job as far as being a mother goes.”

Pinkie pokes her head into your pram and takes a sniff of your diaper. You giggle as she recoils slightly... Why is it that whenever you’ve messed, the adults always have to come close and smell you to make sure?

“Blech! It may be easy, but it really isn’t pretty!” she remarks. “Well, I’ll leave you to enjoy the dirty business yourself.”

Fluttershy wheels your pram towards the door while smiling at Pinkie. “I will! See you tomorrow. Say bye to Auntie Pinkie, Creamie!”

You sit up, waving your hooves at the grinning pink pony. “Bai, Awnt Pinkiiiee!”

Before long, both you and Fluttershy arrive back at her cottage. Without wasting any time, your mama whisks you to the changing table and removes your dirty diaper. As Fluttershy gasps from the mixed stench of your mess and sweat from the workout, you’re busy yawning your head off, almost falling asleep. The last thing you see as the world fades to black is your mother’s gentle smile as she whispers into your ear.

“Sleep tight, my little angel...”




It’s some time later before your eyes open to witness... nothing. All around you, there’s nothing but blackness. No light, no objects, nothing. You can feel yourself floating in the air, hanging by some mysterious force. You can see yourself, but nothing else, and there’s no breeze or sound. Everything is silent... and it scares you.

“Mama! Mama Fwuttershy?!” you cry out, tears forming in your eyes. Your childlike voice echoes in the void, remaining unanswered as you begin to whimper.

“Mommy! Fwuttershyyy!”

It’s no use. Your bawling is getting you nowhere, and you can’t help but let the floodgates loose. As you cry and sniffle, you look up... A light! Something is coming towards you.

“...Mama?”

Yes, it’s a pony! In the faint green light, you can see the silhouette of a creature. There’s no mistaking that shape. It’s definitely Mama!

Without a moment to lose, you try to crawl towards her. However, all you can do is remain still while you’re suspending in mid-air.

“Mama, pwease!” you cry. You hold out your hooves as the darkened figure comes towards you... wait... what the...

The green light becomes more intense, lighting up the shadowy figure. Your eyes widen in horror... That’s not mama! The pony before you has a gnarled, twisted horn filled with holes, just like her black legs, and her wings are like those of bugs rather than being made of feathers. Her eyes are a piercing green, unlike her marshy green mane, and her mouth has two small fangs, one on each side. As this... monster comes closer to you, all you can do is scream.

“Mamaaa! Fwuttershyyyy!” you cry in desperation as the pony is almost touching you. You begin to sweat and whimper, your bladder emptying from sheer fright into your diaper. The last thing you see is the maw of this abomination almost envelop your head before-

“Aaahhhh!”

-you spring up in your crib, breathing frantically. You barely take in the fact that you’re back in your own room before you’re sent into a fit of screaming and tears. You’ve wet your diaper from the shocking nightmare, and now you need your mother more than ever.

“Mamaaa!”

Suddenly, the door to your room bursts open. Standing in the doorway is...
152211211112222211121.title: An Early Night, An Early Nightmare

choices: A party, for you!
A whole nursery set up for you!
1522112111122222112.content:
You blush bright red and stick your hoof in your smiling gob. Yes, yes you did. Mama could smell the little surprise you'd baked for her in your diaper a mile away, even with the smell of baked goods heavy in the air. She lifts you over her shoulder and pats you all the way over to the counter to give you another change. Off come the straps and the smell of your mess hits Fluttershy hard. She winces.

"Oh dear, what did you feed her Pinkie?"

"Just my special cinnamon Snickerdoodles, why do you ask?"

"Oh...ugh." Fluttershy shakes her head to keep herself from fainting, "It sure doesn't smell like cinnamon now..."

She was right. The stench of the deposit was absolutely atrocious, but Mama Fluttershy shows exactly why she was voted "Most Likely to Love Motherhood" back in high school when she bundles up your fetid diaper, tosses it aside, powders you, diapers you and gives you a delightful little pat on the head using her nothing but her mouth and wings. Pretty impressive.

"All better, sweetie." Mama says, hoisting you back onto her shoulder. She starts trotting to the door with you in tow, turning her attention to Pinkie as she leaves, "Thanks again for watching her, Pinkie; she looks like she had a lot of fun."

"Oh she did, Flutts. But not nearly as much fun as she has when you're around."

You agree, nodding through your mouthful of mama's mane.

Pinkie rubs your mane and adds, "You must be the best mom in all of Ponyville. The little darling seems to think so, at least."

Fluttershy blushes at the heap of flattery and makes her way out the door with her last goodbyes. This time, on the way home she flittered into the air(just a bit) and hovered her way home. You love it; you cheer the whole way back home because you just couldn't get over the incredible feeling of weightlessness. If you have a fear of heights, it certainly isn't getting in the way of this source of delight.

"Creamie, I've got a surprise for you," your momma says as she lands in front of her cottage, "and it's right in here. I wasn't sure I wanted to do it, but a few of my friends insisted..."

She pushes the door open and your jaw drops when you see...
1522112111122222112.title: The Cycle of Foalhood

choices: "It's time for a puppet show!"
"I've got you a new playmate!"
15221121111222221122.content:
Holy Hayseed! You can't believe it! The whole room, from wall to wall, has been completely redone to be absolutely perfect for a foal like yourself. Plush carpeting, decorative curtains, mounds of toys and a big beautiful crib. It's all perfect! You wriggle out of your mama's hooves and tumble towards your new wonderland, giggling and squealing all the way. You're not sure where to start first. The toybox? The pile of blankets?

"Oh dear, please be careful..." Your mama whispers behind you.

Of course she'd never stop you from having the time of your little foalish life. Squealing in joy you tumble towards the blanket pile and send it falling down on top of yourself until you look like a big lump of cotton fluff. You continue like this, skirting across the floor like a joyous amoeba, until you trip and fall over into a big ball. That doesn't stop you for a moment though, because you quickly scoop yourself up (still wearing a blankie as a hat) and charge the toybox. From it, you pull a stuffed ursa minor and a pile of blocks out, then hurriedly set about stacking them, giggling all the way.
