Oh horseapples. Standing a mere five feet away from your hiding spot amongst the shrubs is a little, redheaded filly. She's dumbfounded, her eyes dart beneath her glasses to examine your hoof(still resting on your honeypot) and you face (flushed with exhaustion and embarrassment). As much as you'd love for her to be ignorant to what you were doing it's clear she understands far too well.

Her jaw drops, "Pervert! Rapitht! You were clopping out here, like thome awful exhibitionitht! And now you're going to moletht me!"

"Pardon me?"

"You dethpicable mare, you!" She's definitely hamming it up, she looks like she about to fake fainting, "You're going to take advantage of poor little me, throw me to the ground and violate my virgin candyvag!"

She can't be serious. The filly turns, making sure to raise her plot into the air, and says,

"But I can thtill get away, if I can jutht, whoopthie!" The little mare purposefully trips over her own hooves and lands on her face, with her rear still sticking up towards you, "Oh no! I've fallen and there'th no way I can ethcape now! I'm going to be ravithed right here, where nopony can hear me thcream for help!"

Silence. You honestly have no idea what to say to this. She wiggles her rump at you a couple times, first in a bizarrely seductive manner and then out of obvious frustration

"I thaid," she's getting impatient, " that I'm going to be ravithed out here where nopony can hear me thcream! Why won't you ravith me?!"

"Twist!"

The filly freezes up at the sound of an older mare's voice. Soon after, the mare makes herself apparent to you. She's a magenta pony with a pair of saddlebags that you can clearly see things like rulers, pencils and sheets of paper. She grabs Twist by her ear and pulls her up.

"What did I tell you about trying to seduce older ponies into sexually assaulting you!"

"Thorry Mith Cheerilee," Twist idly twists her hoof into the ground while avoiding her teacher's gaze.

"Don't apologize to me, apologize to her!"

Twist turns and looks at you with her best guilty face, "I'm thorry ma'am."

Cheerilee gives her a shove with her hoof and Twist runs off to join her other classmates playing nearby. She then offers you a hoof to help you stand and(after quickly wiping off the orange juice on your hand) you stand.

"You'll have to excuse Twist," she says, "a while back she got into Twilight Sparkle's collection of romance novels. She's been clopping during nap time and taking passes at everything that moves."

"Oh. Wow."

"Um, yes, they can be quite the handful. Which reminds me, I should really get back to watching them." She turns to walk away, but stops herself, "I just realized, I never got your name."

"Tango, pleasure to meet you."

"Likewise, though I'd love to have more time to speak with you. Perhaps after my classes?"
1533.title: Last-minute Substitution

choices: Go to his place, maybe you can have "fun" together if you play your cards right.
Decline his invitation, you're more interested in Cheerilee.
15331.content:
Excited by the fact that you finally managed to hit it off with another pony without making a complete fool of yourself, you gladly accept Cheerilee's invitation to meet here again later.

Judging from the length of the average school day, you have a good six hours to go about to your own intentions. Yielding to your curiosity, you decide to snoop on a young male pony with a yellow-brown coat. Something about his face just feels so enticing, half of you feels the need to really get to know him while the other half is an antisocial wreck who is way too shy to get near him. Pondering your next course of action, you lose yourself in thought and blatantly bump into the pony.

"Oh, hello there!" he said once he whipped around to see who you were.

Your heart rate as high as the sky, you can do little more than stare at him wide-eyed and petrified.

He cocked his head to one side and smiled. "Come on now, I'm usually the shy one around here!"

"W-well, hi. My name is Tango." you barely manage to stutter out. 

"That's a cute name! People around here call me Caramel.  I like to consider myself a local entrepreneur, although more often than not I end up working with the Apple family for a paycheck. You're new around here, right?"

"Yeah, I actually just arrived today. The folk here are a great deal more kind than from where I came from, I'll give you that." you tell him. "Things were a little rough back then, the main reason I came around here was to start my life over." A few nasty flashbacks from your previous life fill your consciousness, but you shoo them away as you don't want to get emotional around someone you just met.

"You poor thing!" Caramel projects with compassionate emotion expressed on his face. "It sure is a good thing you came here over other places, you have nothing to be scared of with all of the friendly ponies here. Your past is as good as gone now."

Reassured and smiling in joy, you cant help but to reach over and hug Caramel. You're very happy you met someone like him. 

"So what were you doing before you ran into me? Would you maybe be interested in coming over to the Apples' place to spend time with me?"
15331.title: Is it a date?

choices: Visit the sweets shop, you are getting a bit hungry.
Head back and wait at the school, before you can get carried away.
153312.content:
"Uh, sorry" you say calmly, "I have somebody I need to go and see". With that, you left Caramel and were off. You would need to visit him some time later, he was pretty nice. You soon realize that you still have some time on your hooves, "hmm, where should I go", you think to yourself. You keep trotting and soon find yourself in the middle of town. You see a couple places that look interesting, but maybe you should make your sure you can visit Cherilee as soon as possible.


You decide to...
153312.title: Decline his invitation, you're more interes...

choices: ITS PARTY TIME!!!
You nearly forgot about Cheerilee!
1533121.content:
Well, getting a few sweets couldn't hurt. Besides, you still had a couple hours before school let out. You entered the shop , only to be tackled by a blob of pink. You get up slightly annoyed, and approach the figure. "Are you new here"? You respond yes and it gets loud in an instant, as the poofy haired pony barrages you with questions. You don't hear much, on account of how fast she is speaking, but you eventually stop her and ask for something to eat. You see a huge cupcake, and noticing this she gets it out. As you reach into your bags you are stopped, "Its on the house silly". You smile at her offer and decide to introduce yourself. "My names Tango", you say as she grabs the treat. "My names Pinkie" she says, "and this is sugarcube corner".
As you finish up your snack and prepare to leave, You are stopped right away. Pinkie blocks your path, "we haven't had the party yet ya goof". You begin to wonder if you want to have a party with somepony so crazy. You decide to stay for the moment (as if you had a choice) and you hear about the preparations. As Pinkie goes on about the foods shes going to serve and her friends who are going to come, you honestly feel a bit exited.


It gets a bit later and then you realize...
1533121.title: A snack wont stop you...

choices: Cheerilee... she looks a bit down
Caramel, looking lonely
15331211.content:
You know what, forget Cheerilee. This party sounds too nice to pass up, and it would be rude to decline. You chat with Pinkie and greet the guests as they begin to arrive. As the party starts, you see the 5 friends that Pinkie went on about, they seemed nice enough. You soon as you keep talking with them, you cant shake the feeling that they're familiar. Then it hits you, THESE GIRLS HOLD THE ELEMENTS OF HARMONY.


As you prepare to bring up the subject, you are stopped at the sight of...
15331211.title: Party time

choices: Have some fun with the fillies
Just be patient, wait for the school day to end
1533122.content:
You notice your heading a bit to deep into town. If you kept going you may not get to meet up with Cheerilee. After some backtracking, you find yourself back at the school. All the little fillies are outside, presumably having recess.


School isn't ending yet, you should...
1533122.title: Head back to school

choices: The sound of the colts clopping to you two!
The sound of the class; they're realized one of the fillies has gone missing!
15332.content:
"You do?" Cheerilee's face fills with giddy delight, "Well that's great, you can help keep an eye on the kids during free reading time for me while I grade their tests! After all, that's all there is left for the school day."

She takes your hoof and leads you into the schoolhouse, where several of the younger ponies have already spread out their mats and taken out their books to start their quiet reading time. It doesn't seem like it's going to be too hard of a task, just have to watch them while Cheerilee does her work and then you get to spend some time afterschool with teacher. Sounds delightful.

So you sit, waiting. They're probably going to read for an hour or so, so you'll have to keep yourself busy. At first you try watching the kids while they're reading, but a reading foal is one of the dullest things you've ever seen in your life. You skim some of their books, like "The Three Little Diamond Dogs" and "The Cockatrice's Woods", but you read these things back in elementary school, so it's a moot point. Eventually you just settle back into your chair, eating some graham crackers you swipped from a chubby colt's lunchbox and watching the clock.

"Sigh." This is gonna be a looooong hour...

Psst

Your eyes snap open and you turn towards the noise; it's Cheeriliee, staring right and you and chewing on the end of her pencil. She raises one hoof, plants a kiss on it, then blows it to you. You blush and turn towards the foals.

They're still reading, none the wiser.

Your eyes lead back to Cheerilee, still giving you the bedroom eyes from across the room. She licks her pencil, then her hoof, and slowly brings it down under her desk. She bites her lower lip, sweating. She's... She's clopping! Mother of Celestia! Your eyes nervously dart to the kids and back to Cheerilee, but they still have no idea and you can't pull your eyes away from her even if you try.

She starts making little coos, testing the luck that's gotten her this far, moaning almost to mock you and the whole class of naive little ponies. She strokes her sex as slowly as she can, making sure you feel every little slick touch. You feel yourself start to moisten, and very quickly cover your bits with a copy of "The Three Little Diamond Dogs." Against every bit of shame you have, you start to rub the soft leather cover of the book against your cooter.

You feel like Cheerilee's about to blow, her face red and contorted. You won't last much longer, but before either of you can taste the bliss of orgasm, something pulls your attention away from her. It's...
15332.title: A Filly Mare

choices: It's Twist
They're Scootaloo, Sweetie Belle, and Applebloom
153322.content:
"O...okay, stay calm, everypony," Cheerilee said, coming down from her almost-orgasm and focusing on the matter at hand.

As she distracts the colts and fillies in the room with a quick head count, you use the wheels on the chair you were sitting on to roll behind the desk. Seeing a box of tissues, you grab a few and and quickly rub the wetness of your neither regions, cleaning up yourself. As you finish, Cheerilee turns towards you.

"I figured out who's missing," she said, as you throw the tissues away. "Can you go out and look? I'll stay with the kids."

"Sure," you say. "Who's missing?"

info.brief_description: "My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic" fetish fun. Anything goes so long as it's pony!
info.description:
Gentlemen.

Let's get something clear, we all know why we're here. Let's not sugarcoat it.

CLOPPING

That being said, I hope we can all have an enjoyable time. If you're just here to read, continue on to the story.

But those intent on adding, read on.

And trust me, additions are welcome. Very welcome.



I like to think myself a pornographic renaissance man, and with the growing interest in MLP:FiM, we need a QUALITY fetish interactive. That is why I'm going to tell you what I want to see out there. You may call them rules, I will call them STANDARDS.

I will be striving to keep this content-centric,meaning there will be few points of intersection and choices will be integrated as smoothly as possible. I will not stand for heavy-handed slogs through constant choices of characters and fetishes. Keep the story running. You wanna see something happen, make it happen. Don't ask for permission. There will always be an alternate path to pursue should the reader not like the direction you take the story in. And don't just add a choice and hope someone else will fill it in, that's just lazy.

Which brings me to my next point, options. Make 'em branch, make 'em wide, use every path you can use. Think of alternate ways for the setting to go. I hate seeing dead ends, and I will personally ensure that they are filled. If one option is left out, it shouldn't be there, so if you create a path, use it.

Rebound off of others, but keep it fresh. Collaborate and build off of what we've got. I'll start us off strong, you need to do your best to continue it. The best person to write is someone who enjoys the subject, so if you feel like this is something you can get passionate about, do it!

Here, in this circle of love and tolerance, you will not be judged by the nature of your fetishes, but by the quality of your writing! I will not tolerate flamewars. We are all bronies here.

Should I(And let's hope it does not come to this) have to bring my ax down on a chapter, it is because I feel it could be done better, and I hope in my heart that you are not discouraged by my actions, but that you re-do it to the best of your abilities!

Finally, and most importantly. Wash your damn hands before you start typing. Your keyboard is something you need to respect and love, not slap with your grease-stained monkey paws. It deserves your care, and in turn it gives to you the ability to write. Treat it well, and it will perform twice as well.

Now get out there and make me proud.



Edit-Fillies and Gentlecolts! We have officially broken 1,000 chapters!
We lost a bit of steam towards the end, but ah the hell with it.
info.pretty_title: My Little Fetish: Friendship is Kinky
